2209  q_dird2 = dird(ndir)
2210 !
2211 ! assign unit numbers for QUAD related files
2212 !
2213 ! If IUFIND=0, fixed prespecified unit numbers must be given
2214 ! IUFIND=1, the numbers are searched automatically
2215 !
2216  if(iufind==0) then
2217  luq_err = 103
2218  luq_tst = 104
2219  luq_int = 105
2220  luq_log = 106
2221  luq_prt = 107
2222  luq_cfg = 108
2223  luq_bqf = 109
2224  luq_grd = 110
2225  luq_txt = 111
2226  luq_loc = 112
2227  luq_trf = 113
2228  luq_t13 = 114
2229  luq_fil = 117
2230  end if
2231 !
2232 ! delete old Error file, if it exists
2233 !
2234  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.err'
2235  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DF',iufind,luq_err,iuerr)
2236  if(iuerr/=0) then
2237  call q_error('e','FILEIO','Problem in deleting error file *.ERR')
2238  ierror = 4
2239  goto 9999
2240  end if
2241 !
2242 ! create new files, first create logging file
2243 !
2244  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.log'
2245  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_log,iuerr) ! logging
2246  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.prt'
2247  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_prt,iuerr) ! general print file
2248  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.tst'
2249  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_tst,iuerr) ! test output
2250 !
2251  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.int'
2252  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_int,iuerr) ! logging for locus integration
2253  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.trf'
2254  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_trf,iuerr) ! transformation test
2255  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.t13'
2256  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_t13,iuerr) ! test output for integration of T13
2257 !
2258  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2259  trim(qbase)//'.log connected to :',luq_log
2260  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2261  trim(qbase)//'.prt connected to :',luq_prt
2262  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2263  trim(qbase)//'.tst connected to :',luq_tst
2264 !
2265  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2266  trim(qbase)//'.int connected to :',luq_int
2267  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2268  trim(qbase)//'.trf connected to :',luq_trf
2269  write(luq_log,'(2a,i4)') 'XNL_INIT: ', &
2270  trim(qbase)//'.t13 connected to :',luq_t13
2271 !
2272  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
2273  '---------------------------------------------------------------'
2274  write(luq_prt,'(a)') trim(q_version)
2275  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
2276  'Solution of Boltzmann integral using Webb/Resio/Tracy method'
2277  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
2278  '---------------------------------------------------------------'
2279  write(luq_prt,*)
2280  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Initialisation'
2281  write(luq_prt,*)
2282 !
2283 ! if(iproc >=0) write(luq_prt,'(a,i5)') '(MPI) processor number:',iproc
2284 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2285 ! Reset configuration from file, using a backdoor
2286 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2287  call q_setconfig(jquad)
2288  if (iq_err /=0) then
2289  ierror = 5
2290  goto 9999
2291  end if
2292 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2293 ! check settings for inconsistencies
2294 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2295  call q_chkconfig
2296  if (iq_err /=0) then
2297  ierror = 6
2298  goto 9999
2299  end if
2300 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2301 ! determine minimum size of number of points on locus as stored in database
2302 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2303  klocus = nlocus0
2304  if(iq_gauleg > 0) klocus = min(iq_gauleg,klocus)
2305  if(iq_lump > 0) klocus = min(iq_lump,klocus)
2306 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2307 ! write summary of program settings
2308 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2309  call q_summary
2310 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2311 ! allocate data arrays
2312 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2313  call q_allocate
2314 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2315 ! Generate interaction grid and coefficients for each valid water depth
2316 ! Q_CTRGRID controls grid generation
2317 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2318  do idepth=1,ndepth
2319  q_depth = depth(idepth)
2320 !
2321  if(jquad==1 .or. jquad==2) q_depth = q_maxdepth
2322 !
2323  if(q_depth <= q_mindepth) then
2324  call q_error('w','DEPTH','Invalid depth')
2325  write(luq_err,'(a,e12.5,f10.2)') 'Incorrect depth & minimum:', &
2326  q_depth,q_mindepth
2327  else
2328  call q_init
2329  call q_ctrgrid(2,igrid)
2330  if(iq_err /= 0) then
2331  ierror = 7
2332  goto 9999
2333  end if
2334  end if
2335 !
2336  if(jquad==1 .and. ndepth > 0) then
2337  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
2338  'XNL_INIT: For deep water only one grid suffices'
2339  exit
2340  end if
2341  end do
2342 !
2343 !
2344 ! Create or open triplet output data file if iq_triq > 0
2345 !
2346 !
2347  9999 continue
2348 !
2349 !! if (iq_log ==0) call z_fileio(trim(qbase)//'.log','DF',iufind,luq_log,iuerr)
2350 !! if (iq_prt ==0) call z_fileio(trim(qbase)//'.prt','DF',iufind,luq_prt,iuerr)
2351 !
2352  if (iq_integ==0) then
2353  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.int'
2354  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DF',iufind,luq_int,iuerr)
2355  end if
2356  if (iq_test ==0) then
2357  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.tst'
2358  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DF',iufind,luq_tst,iuerr)
2359  end if
2360  if (iq_trf ==0) then
2361  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.trf'
2362  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DF',iufind,luq_trf,iuerr)
2363  end if
2364  if (iq_t13 ==0) then
2365  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.t13'
2366  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DF',iufind,luq_t13,iuerr)
2367  end if
2368 !
2369  return
2370  end subroutine
2371 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------!
2372  subroutine xnl_main(aspec,sigma,angle,nsig,ndir,depth,iquad,xnl, &
2373  diag,iproc,ierror)
2374 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------!
2375 !
2376 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
2377 ! | | Gerbrant Ph. van Vledder
2378 ! | +---+
2379 ! | | +---+ Last update: 7 May 2004
2380 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
2381 ! +---+
2382 !
2383 !
2384 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
2385 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
2386 !
2387 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
2388 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
2389 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
2390 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
2391 !
2392 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
2393 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
2394 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
2395 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
2396 !
2397 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
2398 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
2399 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2400 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
2401 !
2402 !
2403 ! do not use m_xnldata
2404  use serv_xnl4v5
2405 !
2406  implicit none
2407 !
2408 ! 0. Update history
2409 !
2410 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
2411 ! 25/07/1999 Various restructurations
2412 ! 12/10/1999 Error handling improved
2413 ! 15/10/1999 Existing test file deleted
2414 ! 25/10/1999 Parameter iq_filt added
2415 ! 29/10/1999 iq_call renamed to i_qmain and save statement added
2416 ! 08/12/1999 Call to CHKLAW included
2417 ! 16/12/1999 Extra output and check for wave number range
2418 ! 27/12/1999 Expansion of k-grid now in new subroutine Q_EXPAND
2419 ! 06/01/2000 Deallocate of KX and NSPECX removed
2420 ! 08/01/2000 Recontructed, subroutine Q_WRTVV splitted off
2421 ! 12/01/2000 Diagonal term added to interface
2422 ! 26/06/2000 Name changed to XNL_MAIN
2423 ! 01/02/2001 Interface change, spectrum must be given as Action density(sigma,theta)
2424 ! 06/11/2001 Water depth forced to 1000 when IQUAD==1,2
2425 ! 13/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
2426 ! 20/08/2002 Action density array copied to internal A-array
2427 ! 09/09/2002 Upgrade to release 5
2428 ! 16/09/2002 Parameter IPROC included to take care of MPI processors
2429 ! 27/09/2002 Description of input argument SIGMA corrected
2430 ! 30/12/2003 Call to subroutine Q_ADDTAIL added
2431 ! 07/05/2004 Depth set to Q_MAXDEPTH for iquad=1,2
2432 !
2433 ! 1. Purpose:
2434 !
2435 ! Compute nonlinear transfer for a given action density spectrum
2436 ! on a given sigma and direction grid
2437 !
2438 ! 2. Method
2439 !
2440 ! Webb/Resio/Tracy/Van Vledder
2441 !
2442 ! 3. Parameter list:
2443 !
2444 ! Type I/O Name Description
2445 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2446  integer,intent(in) :: nsig ! number of frequencies (sigma)
2447  integer,intent(in) :: ndir ! number of directions
2448  integer,intent(in) :: iquad ! method of computing nonlinear quadruplet interactions
2449  integer, intent(in) :: iproc ! MPI processor number
2450 !
2451  real, intent(in) :: aspec(nsig,ndir) ! Action density spectrum as a function of (sigma,theta)
2452  real, intent(in) :: sigma(nsig) ! radian frequencies
2453  real, intent(in) :: angle(ndir) ! directions in radians (sector or full circle)
2454  real, intent(in) :: depth ! water depth in m
2455  real, intent(out) :: xnl(nsig,ndir) ! nonlinear quadruplet interaction computed with
2456 ! a certain exact method (k,theta)
2457  real, intent(out) :: diag(nsig,ndir) ! diagonal term for semi-implicit integration
2458  integer, intent(out) :: ierror ! error indicator
2459 !
2460 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2461 !
2462 ! 4. Error messages
2463 !
2464 ! 5. Called by:
2465 !
2466 ! host program
2467 !
2468 ! 6. Subroutines used
2469 !
2470 ! Q_DSCALE WAM depth scaling
2471 ! Q_XNL4V4 Xnl using Webb/Resio/Tracy/VanVledder
2472 ! Q_STACK Stack administration
2473 ! Q_CHKCONS Check conservation of energy, action and momentum
2474 !
2475 ! 7. Remarks
2476 !
2477 ! 8. Structure
2478 !
2479 ! 9. Switches
2480 !
2481 ! 10. Source code:
2482 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2483 ! local variables
2484 !
2485  integer, save :: i_qmain ! counter number of calls of XNL_MAIN
2486  integer i_qlast ! value of iquad in last call
2487 !
2488  integer isig ! counter for sigma values
2489  integer idir ! counter of directions
2490  real q_dfac ! depth scale factor for nonlinear transfer
2491 !
2492  real sum_e ! sum of energy
2493  real sum_a ! sum of action
2494  real sum_mx ! sum of momentum in x-direction
2495  real sum_my ! sum of momentum in y-direction
2496 !
2497  data i_qmain /0/ ! keep track of number of calls of XNL_MAIN
2498  data i_qlast /0/ ! keep track of last call with IQUAD
2499 !
2500 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2501 !
2502  iq_stack =0 ! initialize stack order every time qmain is called
2503 !
2504  call q_stack('+xnl_main')
2505 !
2506  i_qmain = i_qmain + 1
2507 !
2508  if(iq_prt>=1) then
2509  write(luq_prt,*)
2510  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,f16.3,i4)') &
2511  'XNL_MAIN: Input arguments: iquad depth iproc:', &
2512  iquad,depth,iproc
2513  end if
2514 !
2515 ! initialisations for error handling
2516 !
2517  iq_err = 0 ! No errors detected at start
2518  q_depth = depth ! water depth to be used in computation
2519 !
2520  if(iquad==1 .or. iquad==2) q_depth=q_maxdepth
2521 ! !
2522 ! check water depth to be used in computation
2523 !
2524  if(q_depth <= q_mindepth) then
2525  xnl = 0.
2526  call q_error('w','DEPTH','Zero transfer returned')
2527  goto 9999
2528  end if
2529 !
2530 ! check if iquad has changed since last call, this is no more allowed
2531 !
2532 !! if (iquad /= i_qlast .and. i_qmain/=1) then
2533 !! call q_error('e','IQUAD','Value of IQUAD differs from initial value')
2534 !! ierror = 1
2535 !! goto 9999
2536 !! end if
2537 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
2538 ! main choice between various options |
2539 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
2540 !
2541  if(iquad>=1 .and. iquad <=3) then
2542 !
2543  a = aspec
2544  call q_xnl4v4(aspec,sigma,angle,nsig,ndir,depth,xnl,diag,ierror)
2545 !
2546  if(ierror/=0) then
2547  call q_error('e','wrtvv','Problem in Q_XNL4V4')
2548  goto 9999
2549  end if
2550 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2551 ! add parametric tail to transfer rate and diagonal term
2552 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2553 !
2554  if(iq_tail==1) call q_addtail(xnl,diag,nsig,ndir,qf_tail)
2555 !
2556 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2557 ! compute scale factor to include WAM depth scaling
2558 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2559 !
2560  if(iq_dscale ==1) then
2561  call q_dscale(aspec,sigma,angle,nsig,ndir,depth,q_grav,q_dfac)
2562 !
2563  xnl = xnl*q_dfac
2564 !
2565  if(iq_prt >=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,f7.4)') &
2566  'XNL_MAIN depth scale factor:',q_dfac
2567  end if
2568  end if
2569 !
2570 ! check conservation laws
2571 !
2572  call q_chkcons(xnl,nsig,ndir,sum_e,sum_a,sum_mx,sum_my)
2573 !
2574  if(iq_prt >= 1) then
2575  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'XNL_MAIN: Conservation checks'
2576  write(luq_prt,'(a,4e13.5)') 'XNL_MAIN: E/A/MOMX/MOMY:', &
2577  sum_e,sum_a,sum_mx,sum_my
2578  end if
2579 !
2580  9999 continue
2581 !
2582  ierror = iq_err
2583 !
2584  if(iq_log >= 1) then
2585  write(luq_log,*)
2586  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'XNL_MAIN: Number of warnings:',iq_warn
2587  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'XNL_MAIN: Number of errors :',iq_err
2588  end if
2589 !
2590 !! i_qlast = iquad
2591 !
2592  call q_stack('-xnl_main')
2593 !
2594  return
2595  end subroutine
2596 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2597  subroutine q_addtail(xnl,diag,nsig,na,pf_tail)
2598 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2599 !
2600 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
2601 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
2602 ! | +---+
2603 ! | | +---+ Last update: 27 April 2004
2604 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
2605 ! +---+
2606 !
2607 !
2608 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
2609 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
2610 !
2611 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
2612 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
2613 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
2614 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
2615 !
2616 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
2617 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
2618 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
2619 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
2620 !
2621 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
2622 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
2623 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2624 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
2625 !
2626 !
2627 ! do not use m_xnldata
2628  implicit none
2629 !
2630 ! 0. Update history
2631 !
2632 ! 30/12/2003 Initial version
2633 ! 27/04/2004 Parameter FF_TAIL activated
2634 !
2635 ! 1. Purpose:
2636 !
2637 ! Add parametric tail of tranfer rate consistent with the nonlinear
2638 ! transfer rate in a parameteric spectral tail
2639 !
2640 ! 2. Method
2641 !
2642 !
2643 ! 3. Parameter list:
2644 !
2645 ! Type I/O Name Description
2646 !----------------------------------------------------------------------
2647 !
2648  integer, intent(in) :: nsig ! Number of wave numbers
2649  integer, intent(in) :: na ! Number of directions
2650  real, intent(inout) :: xnl(nsig,na) ! Non-linear transfer rate
2651  real, intent(inout) :: diag(nsig,na) ! Diagonal term
2652  real, intent(in) :: pf_tail ! power of tail of E(f)
2653 !
2654 !
2655 ! 4. Error messages
2656 !
2657 ! 5. Subroutines used
2658 !
2659 !
2660 ! 6. Called by:
2661 !
2662 ! XNL_MAIN
2663 !
2664 ! 7. Remarks
2665 !
2666 ! 8. Structure
2667 !
2668 ! 9. Switches
2669 !
2670 ! 10. Source code
2671 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2672 ! Local variables
2673 !
2674  integer ia,isig ! counters for directions and wave numbers
2675  integer isig_tail ! index of bin where tail starts
2676 !
2677  real xnl_tail(nsig) ! tail factors for transfer rate
2678  real diag_tail(nsig) ! tail factors for diagonal term
2679  real x_tail ! power in tail of nonlinear transfer rate
2680  real d_tail ! power in tail of diagonal term
2681  real sig_tail ! threshold sigma for start of parametric tail
2682 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2683 !
2684  call q_stack('+q_addtail')
2685 !
2686 ! determine index where parametric tail starts
2687 !
2688  sig_tail = ff_tail*q_sig(nsig)
2689  do isig=1,nsig
2690  if(q_sig(isig)<sig_tail) isig_tail = isig
2691  end do
2692 !
2693  xnl_tail = 1.
2694  diag_tail = 1.
2695 !
2696 ! set tail factors
2697 !
2698  x_tail = 11+3*pf_tail-1
2699  d_tail = 12+2*pf_tail-1
2700 !
2701  if(iq_test>=2) then
2702  write(iscreen,'(a,2i4,2f8.2)') &
2703  'Q_ADDTAIL nsig,isig_tail,qf_tail:',nsig,isig_tail,pf_tail
2704  write(iscreen,'(a,3f8.2)') 'Q_ADDTAIL qf_tail, x_tail d_tail:', &
2705  pf_tail,x_tail,d_tail
2706  end if
2707 !
2708  do isig=isig_tail,nsig
2709  xnl_tail(isig) = (q_sig(isig)/q_sig(isig_tail))**x_tail
2710  diag_tail(isig) = (q_sig(isig)/q_sig(isig_tail))**d_tail
2711  end do
2712 !
2713 ! apply tail factors to transfer rate and diagonal term
2714 !
2715  do isig=isig_tail,nsig
2716  do ia=1,na
2717  xnl(isig,ia) = xnl(isig_tail,ia) *xnl_tail(isig)
2718  diag(isig,ia) = diag(isig_tail,ia)*diag_tail(isig)
2719  end do
2720  end do
2721 !
2722  9999 continue
2723 !
2724  call q_stack('-q_addtail')
2725  return
2726  end subroutine
2727 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2728  subroutine q_allocate
2729 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2730 !
2731 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
2732 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
2733 ! | +---+
2734 ! | | +---+ Last update: 24 December 2004
2735 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
2736 ! +---+
2737 !
2738 !
2739 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
2740 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
2741 !
2742 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
2743 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
2744 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
2745 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
2746 !
2747 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
2748 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
2749 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
2750 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
2751 !
2752 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
2753 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
2754 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2755 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
2756 !
2757 !
2758 ! do not use m_xnldata
2759  implicit none
2760 !
2761 !
2762 ! 0. Update history
2763 !
2764 ! 05/10/1999 initial version
2765 ! 25/11/1999 logging output added
2766 ! 10/01/2001 Inconsistency fixed
2767 ! 01/10/2001 Array's for k4-locus added
2768 ! 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
2769 ! 20/08/2002 Internal action density spectrum added A
2770 ! 11/09/2002 q_kpow added
2771 ! 25/04/2003 Name modified from q_alloc -> q_allocate
2772 ! Triplet array added
2773 ! 02/05/2003 Bug fixed in allocate of triplet arrays
2774 ! 11/06/2003 Array SYM_LOC added
2775 ! Parameter KLOCUS introduced for actual maximum size of locus
2776 ! 16/06/2003 Loci information included, moved from Q_XNL4V4
2777 ! 08/08/2003 Value of MLOCUS modified, now 1.3*NLOCUS0, was 1.2
2778 ! 24/12/2003 Tail factors r/t_tail2/4 added
2779 !
2780 ! 1. Purpose:
2781 !
2782 ! Check configuration for non-linear transfer
2783 !
2784 ! 2. Method
2785 !
2786 ! Allocate data arrays
2787 !
2788 ! 3. Parameters used
2789 !
2790 ! 4. Error messaged
2791 !
2792 ! 5. Called by:
2793 !
2794 ! XNL_INIT
2795 !
2796 ! 6. Subroutines used
2797 !
2798 ! Q_STACK
2799 !
2800 ! 7. Remarks
2801 !
2802 ! 8. Stucture
2803 !
2804 ! 9. Switches
2805 !
2806 ! /S Subroutine tracing
2807 !
2808 ! 10. Source code
2809 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2810 !
2811 ! Local variables
2812 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2813  integer maq ! number of theta elements in grid matrix
2814  integer mkq ! number of k-elements in grid matrix
2815 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2816  call q_stack('+q_allocate')
2817 !
2818  if(iq_geom==0) then
2819  mkq = nkq*(nkq+1)/2
2820  else
2821  mkq = nkq
2822  end if
2823 !
2824  maq = naq/2+1
2825  mlocus = 1.3*nlocus0
2826 !
2827  if(iq_log >=1) write(luq_log,'(a,4i4)') &
2828  'Q_ALLOCATE: mkq maq mlocus klocus:',mkq,maq,mlocus,klocus
2829 !
2830  if (allocated (q_xk)) deallocate (q_xk)
2831  allocate(q_xk(0:nkq))
2832  if (allocated (q_sk)) deallocate (q_sk)
2833  allocate(q_sk(0:nkq))
2834 !
2835  if (allocated (quad_nloc)) deallocate (quad_nloc)
2836  allocate (quad_nloc(mkq,maq))
2837  if (allocated (quad_ik2)) deallocate (quad_ik2)
2838  allocate (quad_ik2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2839  if (allocated (quad_ia2)) deallocate (quad_ia2)
2840  allocate (quad_ia2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2841  if (allocated (quad_ik4)) deallocate (quad_ik4)
2842  allocate (quad_ik4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2843  if (allocated (quad_ia4)) deallocate (quad_ia4)
2844  allocate (quad_ia4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2845  if (allocated (quad_w1k2)) deallocate (quad_w1k2)
2846  allocate (quad_w1k2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2847  if (allocated (quad_w2k2)) deallocate (quad_w2k2)
2848  allocate (quad_w2k2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2849  if (allocated (quad_w3k2)) deallocate (quad_w3k2)
2850  allocate (quad_w3k2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2851  if (allocated (quad_w4k2)) deallocate (quad_w4k2)
2852  allocate (quad_w4k2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2853  if (allocated (quad_w1k4)) deallocate (quad_w1k4)
2854  allocate (quad_w1k4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2855  if (allocated (quad_w2k4)) deallocate (quad_w2k4)
2856  allocate (quad_w2k4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2857  if (allocated (quad_w3k4)) deallocate (quad_w3k4)
2858  allocate (quad_w3k4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2859  if (allocated (quad_w4k4)) deallocate (quad_w4k4)
2860  allocate (quad_w4k4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2861  if (allocated (quad_zz)) deallocate (quad_zz)
2862  allocate (quad_zz(mkq,maq,klocus))
2863  if (allocated (quad_t2)) deallocate (quad_t2)
2864  allocate (quad_t2(mkq,maq,klocus))
2865  if (allocated (quad_t4)) deallocate (quad_t4)
2866  allocate (quad_t4(mkq,maq,klocus))
2867  if (allocated (quad_cple)) deallocate (quad_cple)
2868  allocate (quad_cple(mkq,maq,klocus))
2869  if (allocated (quad_jac)) deallocate (quad_jac)
2870  allocate (quad_jac(mkq,maq,klocus))
2871  if (allocated (quad_sym)) deallocate (quad_sym)
2872  allocate (quad_sym(mkq,maq,klocus))
2873  if (allocated (quad_ws)) deallocate (quad_ws)
2874  allocate (quad_ws(mkq,maq,klocus))
2875 !
2876  if (allocated(x2_loc)) deallocate(x2_loc)
2877  allocate (x2_loc(mlocus))
2878  if (allocated(y2_loc)) deallocate(y2_loc)
2879  allocate (y2_loc(mlocus))
2880  if (allocated(x4_loc)) deallocate(x4_loc)
2881  allocate (x4_loc(mlocus))
2882  if (allocated(y4_loc)) deallocate(y4_loc)
2883  allocate (y4_loc(mlocus))
2884  if (allocated(z_loc)) deallocate(z_loc)
2885  allocate (z_loc(mlocus))
2886  if (allocated(s_loc)) deallocate(s_loc)
2887  allocate (s_loc(mlocus))
2888  if (allocated(ds_loc)) deallocate(ds_loc)
2889  allocate (ds_loc(mlocus))
2890  if (allocated(jac_loc)) deallocate(jac_loc)
2891  allocate (jac_loc(mlocus))
2892  if (allocated(cple_loc)) deallocate(cple_loc)
2893  allocate (cple_loc(mlocus))
2894  if (allocated(a_pol)) deallocate(a_pol)
2895  allocate (a_pol(mlocus))
2896  if (allocated(c_pol)) deallocate(c_pol)
2897  allocate (c_pol(mlocus))
2898  if (allocated(k_pol)) deallocate(k_pol)
2899  allocate (k_pol(mlocus))
2900  if (allocated(sym_loc)) deallocate (sym_loc)
2901  allocate (sym_loc(mlocus))
2902 !
2903  if (allocated(x2_mod)) deallocate (x2_mod)
2904  allocate (x2_mod(mlocus))
2905  if (allocated(y2_mod)) deallocate (y2_mod)
2906  allocate (y2_mod(mlocus))
2907  if (allocated(x4_mod)) deallocate (x4_mod)
2908  allocate (x4_mod(mlocus))
2909  if (allocated(y4_mod)) deallocate (y4_mod)
2910  allocate (y4_mod(mlocus))
2911  if (allocated(z_mod)) deallocate (z_mod)
2912  allocate (z_mod(mlocus))
2913  if (allocated(s_mod)) deallocate (s_mod)
2914  allocate (s_mod(mlocus))
2915  if (allocated(ds_mod)) deallocate (ds_mod)
2916  allocate (ds_mod(mlocus))
2917  if (allocated(jac_mod)) deallocate (jac_mod)
2918  allocate (jac_mod(mlocus))
2919  if (allocated(cple_mod)) deallocate (cple_mod)
2920  allocate (cple_mod(mlocus))
2921  if (allocated(sym_mod)) deallocate (sym_mod)
2922  allocate (sym_mod(mlocus))
2923 !
2924  if (allocated(k2m_mod)) deallocate (k2m_mod)
2925  allocate (k2m_mod(mlocus))
2926  if (allocated(k2a_mod)) deallocate (k2a_mod)
2927  allocate (k2a_mod(mlocus))
2928  if (allocated(k4m_mod)) deallocate (k4m_mod)
2929  allocate (k4m_mod(mlocus))
2930  if (allocated(k4a_mod)) deallocate (k4a_mod)
2931  allocate (k4a_mod(mlocus))
2932 !
2933  if (allocated(wk_k2)) deallocate(wk_k2)
2934  allocate (wk_k2(mlocus))
2935  if (allocated(wa_k2)) deallocate(wa_k2)
2936  allocate (wa_k2(mlocus))
2937  if (allocated(wt_k2)) deallocate(wt_k2)
2938  allocate (wt_k2(mlocus))
2939  if (allocated(wk_k4)) deallocate(wk_k4)
2940  allocate (wk_k4(mlocus))
2941  if (allocated(wa_k4)) deallocate(wa_k4)
2942  allocate (wa_k4(mlocus))
2943  if (allocated(wt_k4)) deallocate(wt_k4)
2944  allocate (wt_k4(mlocus))
2945 !
2946 ! if (allocated(t_wk2)) deallocate (t_wk2)
2947 ! allocate (t_wk2(mlocus))
2948 ! if (allocated(t_wa2)) deallocate (t_wa2)
2949 ! allocate (t_wa2(mlocus))
2950 ! if (allocated(t_wt2)) deallocate (t_wt2)
2951 ! allocate (t_wt2(mlocus))
2952 ! if (allocated(t_wk4)) deallocate (t_wk4)
2953 ! allocate (t_wk4(mlocus))
2954 ! if (allocated(t_wa4)) deallocate (t_wa4)
2955 ! allocate (t_wa4(mlocus))
2956 ! if (allocated(t_wt4)) deallocate (t_wt4)
2957 ! allocate (t_wt4(mlocus))
2958 ! if (allocated(t_sym)) deallocate (t_sym)
2959 ! allocate (t_sym(mlocus))
2960 ! if (allocated(t_grad)) deallocate (t_grad)
2961 ! allocate (t_grad(mlocus))
2962 ! if (allocated(t_cple)) deallocate (t_cple)
2963 ! allocate (t_cple(mlocus))
2964 ! if (allocated(t_s)) deallocate (t_s)
2965 ! allocate (t_s(mlocus))
2966 ! if (allocated(t_ds)) deallocate (t_ds)
2967 ! allocate (t_ds(mlocus))
2968 !
2969 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2970 ! allocate data arrays for transformation of locus information
2971 ! and integration along locus
2972 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2973  if (allocated(r_ik2)) deallocate (r_ik2)
2974  allocate (r_ik2(klocus))
2975  if (allocated(r_ia2)) deallocate (r_ia2)
2976  allocate (r_ia2(klocus))
2977  if (allocated(r_ik4)) deallocate (r_ik4)
2978  allocate (r_ik4(klocus))
2979  if (allocated(r_ia4)) deallocate (r_ia4)
2980  allocate (r_ia4(klocus))
2981  if (allocated(r_w1k2)) deallocate (r_w1k2)
2982  allocate (r_w1k2(klocus))
2983  if (allocated(r_w2k2)) deallocate (r_w2k2)
2984  allocate (r_w2k2(klocus))
2985  if (allocated(r_w3k2)) deallocate (r_w3k2)
2986  allocate (r_w3k2(klocus))
2987  if (allocated(r_w4k2)) deallocate (r_w4k2)
2988  allocate (r_w4k2(klocus))
2989  if (allocated(r_w1k4)) deallocate (r_w1k4)
2990  allocate (r_w1k4(klocus))
2991  if (allocated(r_w2k4)) deallocate (r_w2k4)
2992  allocate (r_w2k4(klocus))
2993  if (allocated(r_w3k4)) deallocate (r_w3k4)
2994  allocate (r_w3k4(klocus))
2995  if (allocated(r_w4k4)) deallocate (r_w4k4)
2996  allocate (r_w4k4(klocus))
2997  if (allocated(r_zz)) deallocate (r_zz)
2998  allocate (r_zz(klocus))
2999 !
3000  if (allocated(r_tail2)) deallocate (r_tail2)
3001  allocate (r_tail2(klocus))
3002  if (allocated(r_tail4)) deallocate (r_tail4)
3003  allocate (r_tail4(klocus))
3004  if (allocated(t_tail2)) deallocate (t_tail2)
3005  allocate (t_tail2(klocus))
3006  if (allocated(t_tail4)) deallocate (t_tail4)
3007  allocate (t_tail4(klocus))
3008 !
3009  if (allocated( r_cple)) deallocate (r_cple)
3010  allocate (r_cple(klocus))
3011  if (allocated( r_jac)) deallocate (r_jac)
3012  allocate (r_jac(klocus))
3013  if (allocated( r_ws)) deallocate (r_ws)
3014  allocate (r_ws(klocus))
3015  if (allocated( r_sym)) deallocate (r_sym)
3016  allocate (r_sym(klocus))
3017 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3018  if (allocated(t_ik2)) deallocate (t_ik2)
3019  allocate (t_ik2(klocus))
3020  if (allocated(t_ia2)) deallocate (t_ia2)
3021  allocate (t_ia2(klocus))
3022  if (allocated(t_ik4)) deallocate (t_ik4)
3023  allocate (t_ik4(klocus))
3024  if (allocated(t_ia4)) deallocate (t_ia4)
3025  allocate (t_ia4(klocus))
3026  if (allocated(t_w1k2)) deallocate (t_w1k2)
3027  allocate (t_w1k2(klocus))
3028  if (allocated(t_w2k2)) deallocate (t_w2k2)
3029  allocate (t_w2k2(klocus))
3030  if (allocated(t_w3k2)) deallocate (t_w3k2)
3031  allocate (t_w3k2(klocus))
3032  if (allocated(t_w4k2)) deallocate (t_w4k2)
3033  allocate (t_w4k2(klocus))
3034  if (allocated(t_w1k4)) deallocate (t_w1k4)
3035  allocate (t_w1k4(klocus))
3036  if (allocated(t_w2k4)) deallocate (t_w2k4)
3037  allocate (t_w2k4(klocus))
3038  if (allocated(t_w3k4)) deallocate (t_w3k4)
3039  allocate (t_w3k4(klocus))
3040  if (allocated(t_w4k4)) deallocate (t_w4k4)
3041  allocate (t_w4k4(klocus))
3042  if (allocated(t_zz)) deallocate (t_zz)
3043  allocate (t_zz(klocus))
3044  if (allocated(t_cple)) deallocate (t_cple)
3045  allocate (t_cple(klocus))
3046  if (allocated(t_jac)) deallocate (t_jac)
3047  allocate (t_jac(klocus))
3048  if (allocated(t_ws)) deallocate (t_ws)
3049  allocate (t_ws(klocus))
3050  if (allocated(t_sym)) deallocate (t_sym)
3051  allocate (t_sym(klocus))
3052 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3053  if (allocated(dt13)) deallocate (dt13)
3054  allocate(dt13(klocus))
3055 !
3056 !------------------- spectral grid data ------------------------
3057 !
3058  if (allocated(q_k)) deallocate (q_k)
3059  allocate (q_k(nkq))
3060  if (allocated(q_dk)) deallocate (q_dk)
3061  allocate (q_dk(nkq))
3062  if (allocated(q_kpow)) deallocate (q_kpow)
3063  allocate (q_kpow(nkq))
3064  if (allocated(q_f)) deallocate (q_f)
3065  allocate (q_f(nkq))
3066  if (allocated(q_df)) deallocate (q_df)
3067  allocate (q_df(nkq))
3068  if (allocated(q_sig)) deallocate (q_sig)
3069  allocate (q_sig(nkq))
3070  if (allocated(q_dsig)) deallocate (q_dsig)
3071  allocate (q_dsig(nkq))
3072  if (allocated(q_cg)) deallocate (q_cg)
3073  allocate (q_cg(nkq))
3074  if (allocated(q_a)) deallocate (q_a)
3075  allocate (q_a(naq))
3076  if (allocated(q_ad)) deallocate (q_ad)
3077  allocate (q_ad(naq))
3078 !
3079 !
3080  if (allocated(nspec)) deallocate (nspec)
3081  allocate (nspec(nkq,naq))
3082  if (allocated(a)) deallocate (a)
3083  allocate (a(nkq,naq))
3084  if (allocated(nk1d)) deallocate (nk1d)
3085  allocate (nk1d(nkq))
3086 !! if (allocated(qnl)) deallocate (qnl)
3087 !! allocate (qnl(nkq,naq))
3088 !
3089  if(iq_log >=1) then
3090  write(luq_log,'(a)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: size of arrays'
3091  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: mkq :',mkq
3092  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: maq :',maq
3093  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: nkq :',nkq
3094  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: naq :',naq
3095  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: mlocus:',mlocus
3096  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_ALLOCATE: klocus:',klocus
3097  end if
3098 !
3099  call q_stack('-q_allocate')
3100 !
3101  return
3102  end subroutine
3103 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3104  subroutine q_chkconfig
3105 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3106 !
3107 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
3108 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
3109 ! | +---+
3110 ! | | +---+ Last update: 7 May 2004
3111 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
3112 ! +---+
3113 !
3114 !
3115 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
3116 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
3117 !
3118 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
3119 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
3120 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
3121 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
3122 !
3123 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3124 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3125 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3126 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
3127 !
3128 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
3129 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
3130 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
3131 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
3132 !
3133 !
3134 ! 0. Update history
3135 !
3136 ! 28/12/1999 Initial version
3137 ! 05/10/1999 Test for iq_filt included
3138 ! 01/11/1999 Implicit none introduced
3139 ! 12/11/1999 Update of tests
3140 ! 22/11/1999 Update of tests
3141 ! 28/12/1999 Check of IQ_LOCUS added
3142 ! 02/01/2000 IQ_START removed
3143 ! 05/01/2000 IQ_INT added
3144 ! 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4
3145 ! 22/08/2002 Extra checks included
3146 ! 04/06/2003 parameter IQ_INT renamed IQ_INTEG
3147 ! Switches IQ_GAULEG, IQ_LUMP added
3148 ! 11/06/2003 Name changed from Q_CHKCFG to Q_CHKCONFIG
3149 ! Parameter iq_space removed
3150 ! 12/06/2003 Extra check on IMOD, KLOCUS and NLOCUS0
3151 ! 16/06/2003 Switch IQ_SYM added
3152 ! 27/04/2004 Check added for range of Q_DSTEP
3153 ! 07/05/2004 Check added for range of IQ_DSCALE
3154 !
3155 ! 1. Purpose:
3156 !
3157 ! Check configuration for computation of non-linear transfer
3158 !
3159 ! 2. Method
3160 !
3161 ! Check of each parameter setting
3162 !
3163 ! 3. Parameters used
3164 !
3165 ! 4. Error messages
3166 !
3167 ! 5. Called by:
3168 !
3169 ! XNL_INIT
3170 !
3171 ! 6. Subroutines used:
3172 !
3173 ! Q_ERROR
3174 !
3175 ! 7. Remarkds
3176 !
3177 ! 8. Structure
3178 !
3179 ! 9. Switches
3180 !
3181 ! /S enable subroutine tracing
3182 !
3183 ! 10. Source code
3184 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3185 ! do not use m_xnldata
3186  implicit none
3187 !
3188  call q_stack('+Q_CHKCONFIG')
3189 !
3190  if(qf_tail > -1.) &
3191  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect power of spectral: qf_tail')
3192 !
3193  if(iq_cple < 1 .or. iq_cple > 3) &
3194  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3195  'Invalid option for coupling coefficient iq_cple')
3196 !
3197  if(iq_compact < 0 .or. iq_compact > 1) &
3198  call q_error('e','CONFIG','iq_compact /= 0,1')
3199 !
3200  if(iq_filt < 0 .or. iq_filt > 1) &
3201  call q_error('e','CONFIG','iq_filt /= 0,1')
3202 !
3203  if(iq_gauleg < 0) &
3204  call q_error('e','CONFIG','iq_gauleg <0')
3205 !
3206  if(iq_geom < 0 .or. iq_geom > 1) &
3207  call q_error('e','CONFIG','iq_geom /= 0,1')
3208 !
3209  if(iq_interp < 1 .or. iq_interp > 2) &
3210  call q_error('e','CONFIG','iq_interp /= 1,2')
3211 !
3212  if(iq_disp > 1 .and. iq_geom ==1) then
3213  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3214  'Invalid combination of iq_disp & iq_geom')
3215  write(luq_err,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: iq_disp iq_geom:', &
3216  iq_disp,iq_geom
3217  end if
3218 !
3219  if(iq_dscale < 0 .or. iq_dscale>1) then
3220  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Invalid value for IQ_DSCALE')
3221  write(luq_err,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: iq_dscale:',iq_dscale
3222  end if
3223 !
3224  if(iq_lump>0 .and. iq_gauleg>0) then
3225  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3226  'Lumping and Gauss-Legendre interpolation not together')
3227  write(luq_err,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: iq_lump iq_gauleg:', &
3228  iq_lump,iq_gauleg
3229  end if
3230 !
3231  if(iq_dscale < 0 .or. iq_dscale > 1) &
3232  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3233  'Incorrect value for IQ_DSCALE, (0,1)')
3234 !
3235  if(iq_disp < 1 .or. iq_disp >2 ) &
3236  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3237  'Incorrect value for IQ_DISP [DISP],(1,2) ')
3238 !
3239  if(iq_grid <1 .or. iq_grid > 3) &
3240  call q_error('e', &
3241  'CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_GRID, (1,2,3)')
3242 !
3243  if(iq_integ < 0 .or. iq_make > 3) then
3244  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Invalid value for iq_integ')
3245  write(luq_err,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: iq_integ:',iq_integ
3246  end if
3247 !
3248  if(iq_log < 0) &
3249  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_LOG, (>=0) ')
3250 !
3251  if(iq_locus < 0 .or. iq_locus > 3) &
3252  call q_error('e', &
3253  'CONFIG','Incorrect specifier for locus method')
3254 !
3255  if(iq_lump<0) then
3256  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Invalid value for iq_lump')
3257  write(luq_err,'(1x,a,2i4)') 'iq_lump:',iq_lump
3258  end if
3259 !
3260  if(iq_make < 1 .or. iq_make > 3) then
3261  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Invalid value for iq_make')
3262  write(luq_err,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: iq_make:',iq_make
3263  end if
3264 !
3265  if(iq_mod < 0 .or. iq_mod > 1) &
3266  call q_error('e', &
3267  'CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_MOD [MOD] (0,1)')
3268 !
3269  if(iq_mod==0 .and. klocus<nlocus0) then
3270  call q_error('e','CONFIG','klocus < nlocus0')
3271  write(luq_err,'(a)') &
3272  'Q_CHKCONFIG: Lumping or Gauss-Integration enabled when IMOD=0'
3273  end if
3274 !
3275  if(iq_prt < 0) &
3276  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_PRT, (>=0) ')
3277 !
3278 !! if(iq_search==1 .and. iq_type/=3)
3279 !! & call q_error('w','CONFIG','search option only active when IQUAD=3')
3280 !
3281  if(iq_sym <0 .or. iq_sym > 1) &
3282  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value of IQ_SYM /=[0,1]')
3283 !
3284  if(iq_test < 0) &
3285  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_TEST, (>=0) ')
3286 !
3287  if(iq_trf < 0 .or. iq_trf > 3) &
3288  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for IQ_TRF ')
3289 !------------------------------------------------------------------------
3290 ! parameter settings
3291 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3292 !
3293  if(fqmin < 0) &
3294  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for FQMIN')
3295 !
3296  if(fqmax < 0) &
3297  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Incorrect value for FQMAX')
3298 !
3299  if(fqmax <= fqmin) &
3300  call q_error('e','CONFIG','fmax <= fmin')
3301 !
3302  if(nkq < 1) &
3303  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Number of wave numbers NKQ < 0')
3304 !
3305  if(naq < 1) &
3306  call q_error('e','CONFIG','Number of directions NKQ < 0')
3307 !
3308  if(nlocus0 < 6) &
3309  call q_error('e', &
3310  'CONFIG','Preferred number of points on locus NLOCUS0 < 6')
3311 !
3312  if(q_sector < 40. .or. q_sector > 180.) &
3313  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3314  'Sector too small (<40) or too large (>180)')
3315 !
3316  if(q_dstep <0.1 .or. q_dstep>1000) then
3317  call q_error('e','CONFIG', &
3318  'Value of Q_DSTEP outside range 0.1 - 1000')
3319  write(luq_err,'(a,f8.2)') 'Q_CHKCONFIG: Q_DSTEP:',q_dstep
3320  end if
3321 !
3322  call q_stack('-Q_CHKCONFIG')
3323 !
3324  return
3325  end subroutine
3326 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3327  subroutine q_chkcons(xnl,nk,ndir,sum_e,sum_a,sum_mx,sum_my)
3328 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3329 !
3330 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
3331 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
3332 ! | +---+
3333 ! | | +---+ Last Update: 13 Aug. 2002
3334 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
3335 ! +---+
3336 !
3337 !
3338 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
3339 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
3340 !
3341 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
3342 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
3343 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
3344 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
3345 !
3346 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3347 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3348 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3349 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
3350 !
3351 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
3352 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
3353 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
3354 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
3355 !
3356 !
3357 ! do not use m_xnldata
3358  implicit none
3359 !
3360 ! 0. Update history
3361 !
3362 ! 29/07/1999 Initial version
3363 ! 01/11/1999 Implicit none introduced
3364 ! 08/12/1999 Bug fixed in definition os momentum sum
3365 ! 13/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
3366 !
3367 ! 1. Purpose:
3368 !
3369 ! Check conservation laws of non-linear transfer
3370 !
3371 ! 2. Method
3372 !
3373 ! The following conservation laws should be fulfilled:
3374 !
3375 ! Wave Energy SUME=0
3376 ! Wave Action SUMA=0
3377 ! Momentum vector SUMMX,SUMMY=0
3378 !
3379 !
3380 ! 3. Parameter list:
3381 !
3382 !Type I/O Name Description
3383 !
3384  integer, intent(in) :: nk ! number of wave numbers
3385  integer, intent(in) :: ndir ! number of directions
3386  real, intent(in) :: xnl(nk,ndir) ! transfer rate
3387  real, intent(out) :: sum_e ! sum of wave energy
3388  real, intent(out) :: sum_a ! sum of wave action
3389  real, intent(out) :: sum_mx ! sum of momentum in x-direction
3390  real, intent(out) :: sum_my ! sum of momentum in y-direction
3391 !
3392 ! 4. Error messages
3393 !
3394 ! 5. Called by:
3395 !
3396 ! XNL_MAIN
3397 !
3398 ! 6. Subroutines used
3399 !
3400 ! Q_STACK
3401 !
3402 ! 7. Remarks
3403 !
3404 ! 8. Structure
3405 !
3406 ! 9. Switches
3407 !
3408 ! 10. Source code
3409 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3410 ! Local variables
3411 !
3412  real aa ! action density
3413  real ee ! energy density
3414  real kk ! wave number
3415  real momx ! momentum in x-direction
3416  real momy ! momentum in y-direction
3417  real qq ! bin size
3418 !
3419  integer ia ! counter over directions
3420  integer ik ! counter over wave numbers
3421 !
3422 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3423 !
3424  call q_stack('+q_chklaw')
3425 !
3426 ! initialize summations
3427 !
3428  sum_a = 0.
3429  sum_e = 0.
3430  sum_mx = 0.
3431  sum_my = 0.
3432 !
3433  do ik=1,nkq
3434  qq = q_delta*q_dk(ik)
3435  kk = q_k(ik)
3436 !
3437  do ia = 1,naq
3438  aa = xnl(ik,ia)
3439  ee = aa*q_sig(ik)
3440  momx = aa*kk*cos(q_a(ia))
3441  momy = aa*kk*sin(q_a(ia))
3442 !
3443  sum_a = sum_a + aa*qq
3444  sum_e = sum_e + ee*qq
3445  sum_mx = sum_mx + momx*qq
3446  sum_my = sum_my + momy*qq
3447  end do
3448  end do
3449 !
3450  call q_stack('-q_chklaw')
3451 !
3452  return
3453  end subroutine
3454 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3455  subroutine q_chkres(k1x,k1y,k2x,k2y,k3x,k3y,k4x,k4y,dep, &
3456  sum_kx,sum_ky,sum_w)
3457 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3458 !
3459 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
3460 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
3461 ! | +---+
3462 ! | | +---+ Last update: 9 Aug. 2002
3463 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
3464 ! +---+
3465 !
3466 !
3467 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
3468 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
3469 !
3470 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
3471 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
3472 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
3473 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
3474 !
3475 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3476 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3477 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3478 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
3479 !
3480 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
3481 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
3482 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
3483 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
3484 !
3485 !
3486  implicit none
3487 !
3488 ! 0. Update history
3489 !
3490 ! 16/02/2001 Initial version
3491 ! 01/11/2001 Implicit none introduced
3492 ! 09/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
3493 !
3494 ! 1. Purpose:
3495 !
3496 ! Check resonance conditions of 4 interacting wave numbers
3497 ! for a given water depth and dispersion relation
3498 !
3499 ! 2. Method
3500 !
3501 ! The sum of wave number vectors and associated radian frequencies
3502 ! are computed:
3503 !
3504 ! k1 + k2 - (k3 + k4)
3505 ! w1 + w2 - (w3 + w4)
3506 !
3507 ! in which w_i = g k_i tanh(k_i d)
3508 !
3509 ! 3. Parameter list:
3510 !
3511 ! Type I/O Name Description
3512 !----------------------------------------------------------------------
3513  real, intent(in) :: k1x ! x-component of wave number vector k1
3514  real, intent(in) :: k1y ! y-component of wave number vector k1
3515  real, intent(in) :: k2x ! x-component of wave number vector k2
3516  real, intent(in) :: k2y ! y-component of wave number vector k2
3517  real, intent(in) :: k3x ! x-component of wave number vector k3
3518  real, intent(in) :: k3y ! y-component of wave number vector k3
3519  real, intent(in) :: k4x ! x-component of wave number vector k4
3520  real, intent(in) :: k4y ! y-component of wave number vector k4
3521  real, intent(in) :: dep ! depth in m
3522  real, intent(out) :: sum_kx ! sum of x-components of quadruplet
3523  real, intent(out) :: sum_ky ! sum of y-components of quadruplet
3524  real, intent(out) :: sum_w ! sum of radian frequencies
3525 !
3526 ! 4. Error messages
3527 !
3528 ! 5. Subroutines used
3529 !
3530 ! X_DISPER
3531 !
3532 ! 6. Called by:
3533 !
3534 ! Q_MAKEGRID
3535 !
3536 ! 7. Remarks
3537 !
3538 ! 8. Structure
3539 !
3540 ! 9. Switches
3541 !
3542 ! 10. Source code
3543 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3544 ! Local variables
3545 !
3546  real w1,w2,w3,w4 ! radian frequecies of wave numbers
3547 !! real x_disper ! dispersion relation
3548  sum_kx = (k1x + k2x) - (k3x + k4x)
3549  sum_ky = (k1y + k2y) - (k3y + k4y)
3550 !
3551 ! compute radian frequency on the basis of current dispersion relation
3552 !
3553  w1 = x_disper(sqrt(k1x**2 + k1y**2),dep)
3554  w2 = x_disper(sqrt(k2x**2 + k2y**2),dep)
3555  w3 = x_disper(sqrt(k3x**2 + k3y**2),dep)
3556  w4 = x_disper(sqrt(k4x**2 + k4y**2),dep)
3557 !
3558  sum_w = w1 + w2 - (w3 + w4)
3559 !
3560  return
3561  end subroutine
3562 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3563  subroutine q_cmplocus(ka,kb,km,kw,loclen)
3564 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3565 !
3566 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
3567 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
3568 ! | +---+
3569 ! | | +---+ Last update: 8 August 2003
3570 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
3571 ! +---+
3572 !
3573 !
3574 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
3575 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
3576 !
3577 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
3578 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
3579 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
3580 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
3581 !
3582 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3583 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3584 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3585 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
3586 !
3587 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
3588 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
3589 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
3590 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
3591 !
3592 !
3593 ! do not use m_xnldata
3594  use m_constants
3595  use serv_xnl4v5
3596  implicit none
3597 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3598 ! 0. Update history
3599 !
3600 ! Date Description
3601 !
3602 ! 18/11/1999 Initial version
3603 ! 08/12/1999 Tracing of locus updated and Q_TRACE included
3604 ! 22/12/1999 Option Q_POLAR included
3605 ! 05/01/2000 LOCLEN added in interface
3606 ! 09/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
3607 ! 10/09/2002 g added to interface with X_CPLE
3608 ! test output modified
3609 ! 12/06/2003 Call to Z_POYAREA added to check POLAR2
3610 ! 08/08/2003 Check on areas only for loci with k3m/k1m < 100
3611 ! Otherwise machine accuracy plays a role
3612 !
3613 ! 1. Purpose:
3614 !
3615 ! Compute locus function used for the determination of the
3616 ! resonnance condition
3617 !
3618 ! 2. Method
3619 !
3620 ! See ALKYON, 1999
3621 !
3622 ! 3. Parameter list:
3623 !
3624 !Type I/O Name Description
3625 !----------!----------------------------------------------------------------------------
3626  real, intent(out) :: ka,kb ! lowest and highest wave number magnitude of k2-locus
3627  real, intent(out) :: km ! wave number magnitude at mid point
3628  real, intent(out) :: kw ! half width of locus
3629  real, intent(out) :: loclen ! estimated length of locus
3630 !
3631 ! 4. Error messages
3632 !
3633 ! 5. Called by:
3634 !
3635 ! Q_MAKEGRID
3636 !
3637 ! 6. Subroutines used
3638 !
3639 ! z_zero1
3640 !
3641 !
3642 !
3643 ! 7. Remarks
3644 !
3645 ! 8. Structure
3646 !
3647 ! 9. Switches
3648 !
3649 ! 10. Source code
3650 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3651 ! Local variables
3652 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3653  real k1m ! magnitude of wave number k1
3654  real k3m ! magnitude of wave number k3
3655  real pcos,psin ! cosine and sine of normalize angle of P
3656  real klen ! total length of line locus for case w1=w3
3657 !
3658  real kx_beg ! x-component at start point
3659  real ky_beg ! y-component at start point
3660  real kx_end ! x-component at end point
3661  real ky_end ! y-component at end point
3662 !
3663  real dsp,dsm ! distances in plus and minus direction
3664  real sum ! total length of locus
3665 !
3666  real w1,w3 ! radian frequencies of wave numbers k1 and k3
3667  real eps ! local accuracy for determination of roots
3668  real area1 ! area of locus as computed
3669  real area2 ! area of locus as based on LOCPOS and ellipse
3670  real ratio ! maximum ratio between area1 and area2
3671 !
3672  integer ierr ! local error level
3673  integer iloc,jloc ! counters along locus
3674  integer itest ! local test level for test output to unit luqtst
3675  integer ip1 ! index +1
3676  integer im1 ! index -1
3677  integer jj ! counter
3678 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3679 ! function declarations
3680 !
3681 !! real x_disper ! dispersion relation
3682 !! real x_cple ! coupling coefficient
3683 !! real x_jacobian ! Jacobian term
3684 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3685  call q_stack('+q_cmplocus')
3686 !
3687 ! set initial values
3688 !
3689  eps = 10.*epsilon(1.) ! set accuracy 10 times machine accuracy
3690  itest = iq_test ! assign test level from overall setting
3691 !! itest = 1 ! (re)set local test level
3692 !
3693 ! compute characteristics of configuration
3694 !
3695  px = k1x - k3x
3696  py = k1y - k3y
3697  pmag = sqrt(px**2 + py**2)
3698  xang = atan2(-px,py)
3699  pang = atan2(py,px)
3700  k1m = sqrt(k1x**2 + k1y**2)
3701  k3m = sqrt(k3x**2 + k3y**2)
3702  w1 = x_disper(k1m,q_depth)
3703  w3 = x_disper(k3m,q_depth)
3704  q = w1-w3
3705 !
3706 ! compute cosine and sine of direction of P-vector
3707 ! reverse direction for the case q<0
3708 !
3709  if(q < 0) then
3710  sang = pang+2.*pih
3711  pcos = cos(pang+2.*pih)
3712  psin = sin(pang+2.*pih)
3713  else
3714  sang = pang
3715  pcos = cos(pang)
3716  psin = sin(pang)
3717  end if
3718 !
3719  if(itest >= 1) then
3720  write(luq_tst,'(a,4f11.5)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: k1x/y k3x/y :', &
3721  k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y
3722  write(luq_tst,'(a,3f11.5)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: Px Py Pmag :', &
3723  px,py,pmag
3724  write(luq_tst,'(a,3f11.4)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: Pang Sang Xang :', &
3725  pang*rade,sang*rade,xang*rade
3726  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f11.5)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: k1m,k3m :', &
3727  k1m,k3m
3728  write(luq_tst,'(a,f11.5)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: q :',q
3729  end if
3730 !
3731 ! first solution along locus: k2 = k3
3732 !
3733 ! check for special case if q = 0
3734 !
3735  if (abs(q) < eps_q) then
3736 !
3737  call q_loc_w1w3(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,nlocus0,x2_loc,y2_loc,x4_loc, &
3738  y4_loc,s_loc)
3739  nlocus1 = nlocus0
3740  ds_loc = s_loc(2)-s_loc(1)
3741  klen = s_loc(nlocus0)
3742  ka = 0.
3743  kb = 0.
3744  km = 0.
3745  kw = 0.
3746  sang = xang
3747 !
3748  else
3749 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3750 ! compute characteristics of locus, such as its position in
3751 ! wave number space
3752 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3753 !
3754  call q_locpos(ka,kb,km,kw,loclen)
3755  if(iq_err/=0) goto 9999
3756 !
3757 ! compute position of start and end point for tracing
3758 ! the locus
3759 !
3760  kx_beg = ka*pcos
3761  ky_beg = ka*psin
3762  kx_end = kb*pcos
3763  ky_end = kb*psin
3764 !
3765 ! compute position of locus using polar method
3766 ! see Van Vledder (2000)
3767 !
3768 !% call q_polar(ka,kb,kx_beg,ky_beg,kx_end,ky_end,loclen,ierr)
3769  call q_polar2(ka,kb,kx_beg,ky_beg,kx_end,ky_end,loclen,ierr)
3770 !
3771 ! check area of locus by a simple test (added 12 June 2003)
3772 !
3773  call z_polyarea(x2_loc,y2_loc,nlocus1,area1)
3774  area2 = 2.*pih*(kb-ka)*0.5*kw
3775  ratio = max(area1/area2,area2/area1)
3776 !
3777  if(iq_test>=2 .and.ratio>1.5) then
3778  write(luq_tst,'(a,4i4,2e12.4,4f12.5)') &
3779  'Q_CMPLOCUS: Area1/2:',ik_k1,ia_k1,ik_k3,ia_k3,area1,area2, &
3780  ratio,ka,kb,kw
3781  if(ik_k1==1 .and. ia_k1==1 .and. ik_k3==8 .and. ia_k3==9) then
3782  do iloc = 1,nlocus1
3783  write(luq_prt,'(i4,4f12.5)') iloc,x2_loc(iloc), &
3784  y2_loc(iloc),sqrt(x2_loc(iloc)**2 + y2_loc(iloc)),&
3785  atan2(y2_loc(iloc),x2_loc(iloc))*rade
3786  end do
3787  end if
3788  end if
3789 !
3790  if(ratio>1.5 .and. k3m/k1m < 100.) then
3791  call q_error('e','LOCUS','Severe problem in POLAR2')
3792  write(luq_err,'(a)') 'Q_CMPLOCUS: ratio > 1.5'
3793 !
3794  if(iq_test>=2) then
3795  write(luq_tst,'(2i5)') nlocus1,2
3796  do iloc = 1,nlocus1
3797  write(luq_tst,'(2f12.5)') x2_loc(iloc),y2_loc(iloc)
3798  end do
3799  end if
3800  goto 9999
3801  end if
3802 !
3803 ! 01/10/2001
3804 ! compute position of k4 locus by a simple translation
3805 !
3806  do iloc=1,nlocus1
3807  x4_loc(iloc) = x2_loc(iloc) + px
3808  y4_loc(iloc) = y2_loc(iloc) + py
3809  end do
3810 !
3811  end if
3812 !
3813  if (iq_test >=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f12.5,i4)') &
3814  'Q_CMPLOCUS: k1x/y k3x/y nlocus:',k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,nlocus1
3815 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3816 ! compute characteristics around locus
3817 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3818 !
3819  s_loc(1) = 0.
3820  sum = 0
3821 !
3822  do iloc=1,nlocus1
3823 !
3824 ! compute step sizes
3825 !
3826  if (abs(q) < eps_q) then
3827 !
3828 ! for this case the sum of ds_loc is unequal to s_loc(nlocus1)
3829 !
3830  sum = s_loc(nlocus1)
3831  else
3832 !
3833 ! compute indices of previous and next index on locus
3834 !
3835  ip1 = iloc+1
3836  if (ip1 > nlocus1) ip1 = 1
3837  im1 = iloc-1
3838  if (im1 < 1) im1 = nlocus1
3839 !
3840  dsp = sqrt((x2_loc(iloc)-x2_loc(ip1))**2 + &
3841  (y2_loc(iloc)-y2_loc(ip1))**2)
3842  dsm = sqrt((x2_loc(iloc)-x2_loc(im1))**2 + &
3843  (y2_loc(iloc)-y2_loc(im1))**2)
3844  if(iloc < nlocus1) s_loc(iloc + 1) = s_loc(iloc) + dsp
3845  ds_loc(iloc) = 0.5*(dsp + dsm)
3846  sum = sum+ds_loc(iloc)
3847  end if
3848 !
3849 ! compute gradient/Jacobian terms along locus
3850 !
3851  jac_loc(iloc) = x_jacobian(x2_loc(iloc),y2_loc(iloc), &
3852  x4_loc(iloc),y4_loc(iloc))
3853 !
3854 ! compute coupling coefficients along locus
3855 !
3856  k2x = x2_loc(iloc)
3857  k2y = y2_loc(iloc)
3858  k4x = x4_loc(iloc)
3859  k4y = y4_loc(iloc)
3860 !
3861  cple_loc(iloc) = x_cple(k1x,k1y,k2x,k2y,k3x,k3y,k4x,k4y, &
3862  iq_cple,q_depth,q_grav)
3863 !
3864  end do
3865 !
3866  if(itest >= 2) then
3867  do iloc = 1,nlocus1
3868  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,4f10.5,2e12.5)') &
3869  'Q_CMPLOCUS: k2x k2y ds s jac cp:', &
3870  iloc,x2_loc(iloc),y2_loc(iloc),ds_loc(iloc),s_loc(iloc), &
3871  jac_loc(iloc),cple_loc(iloc)
3872  end do
3873  end if
3874  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,2f10.5)') &
3875  'Q_CMPLOCUS: length of locus:',sum, &
3876  s_loc(nlocus1)+dsp !0.5*(ds_loc(1)+ds_loc(nlocus1))
3877 !
3878  9999 continue
3879 !
3880  call q_stack('-q_cmplocus')
3881 !
3882  return
3883  end subroutine
3884 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3885  subroutine q_ctrgrid(itask,igrid)
3886 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3887 !
3888 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
3889 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
3890 ! | +---+
3891 ! | | +---+ Last update: 27 April 2004
3892 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
3893 ! +---+
3894 !
3895 !
3896 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
3897 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
3898 !
3899 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
3900 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
3901 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
3902 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
3903 !
3904 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
3905 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
3906 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
3907 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
3908 !
3909 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
3910 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
3911 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
3912 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
3913 !
3914 !
3915 ! do not use m_xnldata
3916  use m_fileio
3917  implicit none
3918 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3919 ! 0. Update history
3920 !
3921 ! Version Date Modification
3922 !
3923 ! 29/07/1999 Initial version
3924 ! 11/10/1999 Error messages via module
3925 ! 12/10/1999 File I/O of interaction grid files added, and consistency check
3926 ! 25/10/1999 Contents of q_header extended with iq_grid & iq_start & nlocus0
3927 ! 27/10/1999 Close statement after reading BQF file
3928 ! 01/11/1999 Close statments after call of Q_GRID
3929 ! 03/11/1999 Parameter IQ_MAKE included
3930 ! 22/11/1999 Use of z_fileio modified, use parameter IUERR if an attempt
3931 ! to open a non-existing file was made
3932 ! 30/11/1999 Extra messages to logging file when file are closed
3933 ! 03/01/2000 IQ_START replaced by IQ_LOCUS
3934 ! 12/01/2001 Output parameter IGRID added
3935 ! igrid=0: a proper grid exists or has been made, and will be read
3936 ! =1: grid file does not exist
3937 ! =2: grid file exists, but it is incorrect
3938 ! 8/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
3939 ! 15/08/2002 Bug fixed ininitialisation of igrid
3940 ! 19/08/2002 header extended with parameter IQ_INTERP
3941 ! 20/08/2002 wave number array replaced by sigma array in grid file
3942 ! 22/08/2002 Extra i/o check when reading BQF file
3943 ! 23/08/2002 retrieve number of point on locus from BQF file
3944 ! 09/09/2002 aqfile and bqfile 5 units for depth
3945 ! 10/09/2002 new algorithm for coding depth
3946 ! Test added to avoid rereading of last read/generated BQF file
3947 ! 08/10/2002 Output to test file made conditional
3948 ! 05/09/2003 Water depth for creating and testing BQF file DSTEP dependend
3949 ! 09/09/2003 Bug fixed in assigning IGRID=0 when BQF still in memory
3950 ! 13/09/2003 When BFQ incorrupt, it is deleted and a new one is created
3951 ! Bug fixed in setting of s_depth when iq_disp==1
3952 ! 24/12/2003 QUAD_T2 and QUAD_T4 always in BQF
3953 ! 30/12/2003 Bug fixed in reading test data from BQF
3954 ! 27/04/2004 Bug fixed when depth < q_dstep
3955 !
3956 ! 1. Purpose:
3957 !
3958 ! Control of interaction grid administration
3959 !
3960 ! 2. Method
3961 !
3962 ! 3. Parameters used
3963 !
3964  integer, intent(in) :: itask ! task to perform by Q_CTRGRID
3965 ! ==1: read and check header block
3966 ! ==2: read and write grid file, according to
3967 ! setting of IQ_MAKE
3968  integer, intent(out) :: igrid ! status of grid checking
3969 ! ==0: a proper grid exists
3970 ! ==1: grid file does not exist
3971 ! ==2: grid file exists, but it is incorrect
3972 ! ==3: read error in accessing grid information
3973 !
3974 ! 4. Error messages
3975 !
3976 ! 5. Called by:
3977 !
3978 ! XNL_INIT
3979 ! Q_SEARCHGRID
3980 !
3981 ! 6. Subroutines used
3982 !
3983 ! Q_STACK
3984 ! Q_ERROR
3985 ! Q_MAKEGRID
3986 !
3987 ! 7. Remarks
3988 !
3989 ! The generation of the database file depend on the control varaible of IQ_MAKE
3990 ! if IQ_MAKE==1, make a grid when needed
3991 ! 2, always make grid
3992 ! 3, make a grid and stop, useful for test purposes
3993 !
3994 ! The maximum number of points on the locus, as stored in the BQF file
3995 ! is read from the header and stored in the variable NLOCUS
3996 !
3997 ! 8. Structure
3998 !
3999 ! Make header of grid file
4000 ! Construct name of grid file
4001 ! Check existence of grid file
4002 ! if grid file exists
4003 ! read header
4004 ! check header
4005 ! read first data block
4006 ! check first data block
4007 ! - directions
4008 ! - wave numbers
4009 ! - depth
4010 ! set status of grid file
4011 ! else
4012 ! set status of grid file
4013 ! end if
4014 !
4015 ! set status of generating/reading grid file
4016 !
4017 ! if make new grid
4018 ! compute grid parameters
4019 ! write grid parameters to file
4020 ! else
4021 ! read grid parameters from file
4022 ! end if
4023 !
4024 !
4025 ! 9. Switches
4026 !
4027 ! 10. Source code
4028 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4029 ! Local variables
4030 !
4031  integer iaz,ikz,jaz,jkz ! counters for checking header of BQF file
4032  integer iz_geom,iz_disp,iz_cple ! values as read in BQF file
4033  integer naz ! number of directions in BQF file
4034  integer nkz ! number of wave numbers in BQF file
4035  integer idep,jdep ! coding for depth in BQF file
4036 !
4037  logical lbqf ! flag for existence of BQF file
4038  real s_depth ! (stepped) depth
4039  real q_depth_saved ! save input water depth, needed after call to Q_MAKEGRID
4040  real z_depth ! water depth in BQF file
4041  real, allocatable :: z_ad(:),z_sig(:) ! directions and radian frequencies of grid in BQF file
4042  integer ierr,iuerr ! error variables
4043 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4044 !
4045  call q_stack('+q_ctrgrid')
4046 !
4047 ! echo input arguments
4048 !
4049  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,f16.3)') &
4050  'Q_CTRGRID: input arguments: itask depth:',itask,q_depth
4051 !
4052  q_depth_saved = q_depth
4053 !
4054 ! generate header of BQF file
4055 !
4056  q_header = '000000000000000000000'
4057 ! 123456789012345678901
4058 ! 1 2
4059  write(q_header,'(3i3.3,6i2.2)') naq,nkq,nlocus0, &
4060  iq_grid,iq_geom,iq_disp,iq_cple,iq_locus,iq_interp
4061 !
4062  if(iq_prt>=2) then
4063  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: header info:',trim(q_header)
4064  write(luq_prt,'(a,3i5)') 'Q_CTRGRID: naq nkq nlocus0:',naq,nkq, &
4065  nlocus0
4066  write(luq_prt,'(a,3i3)') 'Q_CTRGRID: iq_grid,iq_geom,iq_disp:', &
4067  iq_grid,iq_geom,iq_disp
4068  write(luq_prt,'(a,3i3)') &
4069  'Q_CTRGRID: iq_cple,iq_locus,iq_interp:',iq_cple,iq_locus, &
4070  iq_interp
4071  end if
4072 !
4073 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4074 ! construct name of grid file
4075 !
4076  if(iq_disp==1) then
4077  bqname = 'quad99999.bqf'
4078  s_depth = q_maxdepth
4079 !
4080  elseif(iq_disp==2) then
4081 !
4082 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4083 ! generate code for actual depth
4084 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4085  idep = int(q_depth/q_dstep+0.5)
4086  idep = max(1,idep)
4087  jdep = idep*int(10.*q_dstep)
4088  jdep = max(1,jdep)
4089  jdep = min(99999,jdep)
4090 !
4091  s_depth = real(idep)*q_dstep
4092 !
4093  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,3f10.2,2i6)') &
4094  'Q_CTRGRID: q_depth q_dstep s_depth idep jdep:', &
4095  q_depth,q_dstep,s_depth,idep,jdep
4096 !
4097  bqname = 'quad00000.bqf'
4098  write(bqname(5:9),'(i5.5)') min(int(q_maxdepth*10),jdep)
4099 !
4100  else
4101  call q_error('e','DISPER','Incorrect value for IQ_DISP')
4102  write(luq_err,'(a,i4)') 'IQ_DISP=',iq_disp
4103  goto 9999
4104  end if
4105 !
4106 !
4107 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4108 ! Compare LASTQUADFILE with bqname
4109 ! if equal skip reading of BQF file, including checks of header
4110 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4111  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(4a)') &
4112  'Q_CTRGRID: Last and actual BQF file: ', &
4113  trim(lastquadfile),' & ',trim(bqname)
4114 !
4115  if(lastquadfile==bqname) then
4116  if(iq_screen>0) write(iscreen,'(2a)') &
4117  'Q_CTRGRID: Rereading of bqfile skipped: ',lastquadfile
4118  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(2a)') &
4119  'Q_CTRGRID: Rereading of bqfile skipped: ',lastquadfile
4120  igrid = 0
4121  goto 9999
4122  end if
4123 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4124  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
4125  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Header line of grid file:', &
4126  trim(q_header)
4127  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Name of BINARY grid file:', &
4128  trim(bqname)
4129  end if
4130 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4131 !
4132 ! check if binary data file exists
4133 !
4134  tempfile=bqname
4135  call z_fileio(tempfile,'OU',iufind,luq_bqf,iuerr) ! binary quadruplet file
4136 !
4137  if(iq_prt >= 2) write(luq_prt,'(2a,2x,2i4)') &
4138  'Q_CTRGRID: BQNAME:',trim(bqname),luq_bqf,iuerr
4139 !
4140  if(itask==2 .and. iq_make==2) luq_bqf=-1
4141 !
4142 ! if the file exists,
4143 ! read header information
4144 ! check header of file
4145 ! end
4146 !
4147 ! If header is incorrect, set flag IQ_GRID to TRUE for generating new grid
4148 !
4149  if(luq_bqf > 0 .and. iuerr ==0) then
4150  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
4151  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') &
4152  'Q_CTRGRID: Binary grid file detected: ',trim(bqname)
4153  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Connected to unit:', &
4154  luq_bqf
4155  end if
4156 !
4157 !
4158 ! grid file exists, unless proven otherwise
4159 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4160 !
4161  lq_grid = .false.
4162  igrid = 0
4163  read(luq_bqf,iostat=ierr) r_header
4164  if(ierr/=0) then
4165  call q_error('w','READBQF','Read error for header in BQF file')
4166  write(luq_err,'(a)') 'BQF file deleted'
4167  tempfile=bqname
4168  call z_fileio(tempfile,'DU',iufind,luq_bqf,iuerr) ! binary quadruplet file
4169  igrid = 3
4170  lq_grid = .true.
4171  else
4172  read(r_header,'(6x,i3)') nlocus
4173 !
4174  if(iq_prt>=2) then
4175  write(luq_prt,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: luq_bqf ierr:',luq_bqf, &
4176  ierr
4177  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: r_header: ',trim(r_header)
4178  end if
4179 
4180  if(iq_prt >= 1) then
4181  write(luq_prt,'(4a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: bqname : ',trim(bqname)
4182  write(luq_prt,'(4a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: q_header: ',trim(q_header)
4183  write(luq_prt,'(4a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: r_header: ',trim(r_header)
4184  end if
4185  end if
4186 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4187 ! check header of grid file
4188 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4189 !
4190  if(trim(r_header)/=trim(q_header).and. .not.lq_grid) then
4191  lq_grid = .true.
4192  igrid = 2
4193  if(iq_prt >=2) then
4194  write(luq_prt,'(a,1x,a)') &
4195  'Q_CTRGRID: Header in binary quad file :', &
4196  trim(r_header)
4197  write(luq_prt,'(a,1x,a)') &
4198  'Q_CTRGRID: Expected header of binary quad file:', &
4199  trim(q_header)
4200  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: The file headers disagree'
4201  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
4202  'Q_CTRGRID: A new grid will be generated'
4203  end if
4204  end if
4205 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4206 ! check other parts of binary grid file
4207 !
4208  if(.not.lq_grid) then
4209  read(luq_bqf) naz,nkz
4210  allocate (z_sig(nkz),z_ad(naz))
4211  read(luq_bqf) z_sig
4212  read(luq_bqf) z_ad
4213  read(luq_bqf) iz_geom,iz_disp,iz_cple
4214  read(luq_bqf) z_depth
4215 !
4216  if(iq_prt >=2) then
4217  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Contents of BQF file'
4218  write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Header:',trim(r_header)
4219  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: NK:',nkz
4220  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: NA:',naz
4221  end if
4222  end if
4223 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4224 ! check spectral interaction grid and depth for consistency
4225 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4226  if(.not. lq_grid) then
4227  do iaz = 1,naz
4228  if(abs(q_ad(iaz)-z_ad(iaz)) > 0.01) then
4229  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Directions do not agree'
4230  do jaz=1,naz
4231  write(luq_prt,'(1x,a,i4,2f10.3)') 'iaz q_ad z_ad:',jaz, &
4232  q_ad(jaz),z_ad(jaz)
4233  end do
4234  lq_grid = .true.
4235  igrid = 2
4236  exit
4237  end if
4238  end do
4239  end if
4240 !
4241  if(.not. lq_grid) then
4242  do ikz = 1,nkz
4243  if(abs(q_sig(ikz)-z_sig(ikz)) > 0.01) then
4244  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Wave numbers do not agree'
4245  do jkz=1,nkz
4246  write(luq_prt,'(1x,a,i4,2f10.3)') 'ikz q_k z_sig:',jkz, &
4247  q_sig(jkz),z_sig(jkz)
4248  end do
4249  lq_grid = .true.
4250  igrid = 2
4251  exit
4252  end if
4253  end do
4254  end if
4255 !
4256 ! compare water depths
4257 !
4258  if(abs(z_depth-s_depth) > 0.09 .and. iq_disp > 1 .and. &
4259  .not. lq_grid) then
4260  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Water depths do not agree'
4261  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f16.2)') 'Q_CTRGRID: q_depth z_depth:', &
4262  q_depth,z_depth
4263  lq_grid = .true.
4264  igrid = 2
4265  end if
4266 !
4267  if(lq_grid) then
4268  close(luq_bqf)
4269  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(a)') &
4270  'Q_CTRGRID: Existing BQF-file invalid, it will be closed'
4271  end if
4272 !
4273  else
4274  lq_grid = .true.
4275  igrid = 1
4276  end if
4277 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4278  if(itask==1) then
4279  if(luq_bqf>0) call z_fclose(luq_bqf)
4280  goto 9999
4281  end if
4282 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4283 ! if lq_grid==true a new grid has to be generated
4284 ! if not, read the grid information into memory
4285 ! or iq_make==2 always make an interaction grid
4286 ! or iq_make==3 as 2, plus stop after making grid
4287 !
4288  if(lq_grid .or. iq_make==2 .or. iq_make==3) then
4289 !
4290  if(luq_bqf>0) call z_fclose(luq_bqf)
4291  tempfile=bqname
4292  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UU',iufind,luq_bqf,iuerr) ! binary quadruplet file
4293 !
4294  if(iq_log >= 1) then
4295  write(luq_log,*)
4296  write(luq_log,'(a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: New grid will be generated'
4297  write(luq_log,'(a,a)') 'Q_CTRGRID: Name of BQF file:', &
4298  trim(bqname)
4299  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: '//trim(bqname)// &
4300  ' connected to :',luq_bqf
4301  end if
4302 !
4303  if(iq_screen >= 1) write(iscreen,'(2a)') &
4304  'Q_CTRGRID: Generating wave number grid for '// &
4305  'quadruplet interactions: ',trim(bqname)
4306 !
4307  q_depth = s_depth
4308  call q_makegrid
4309  q_depth = q_depth_saved
4310 !
4311  if(iq_err /=0) then
4312  lastquadfile = 'quad_err_.bqf'
4313  goto 9999
4314  end if
4315 !
4316  igrid = 0
4317 !
4318  close(luq_bqf)
4319 !
4320  if(iq_log >=1) then
4321  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: '//trim(bqname)// &
4322  ' disconnected from:',luq_bqf
4323  end if
4324 !
4325  if(iq_screen >=1) write(iscreen,'(a)') &
4326  'Q_CTRGRID: Grid generation completed succesfully'
4327 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4328 !
4329 ! check of header and spectral grid succesfull
4330 ! such that data can be read from BQF file
4331 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4332 !
4333  else
4334  if(iq_screen >= 1) write(iscreen,'(2a)') &
4335  'Q_CTRGRID: Reading existing grid: ',trim(bqname)
4336  if(iq_prt >= 1) write(luq_prt,'(2a)') &
4337  'Q_CTRGRID: Existing grid will be read:',trim(bqname)
4338  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(2a)') &
4339  'Q_CTRGRID: Existing grid will be read:',trim(bqname)
4340 !
4341  read(luq_bqf) quad_nloc
4342  read(luq_bqf) quad_ik2
4343  read(luq_bqf) quad_ia2
4344  read(luq_bqf) quad_ik4
4345  read(luq_bqf) quad_ia4
4346  read(luq_bqf) quad_w1k2
4347  read(luq_bqf) quad_w2k2
4348  read(luq_bqf) quad_w3k2
4349  read(luq_bqf) quad_w4k2
4350  read(luq_bqf) quad_w1k4
4351  read(luq_bqf) quad_w2k4
4352  read(luq_bqf) quad_w3k4
4353  read(luq_bqf) quad_w4k4
4354  read(luq_bqf) quad_zz
4355  read(luq_bqf) quad_t2
4356  read(luq_bqf) quad_t4
4357 
4358 
4359  read(luq_bqf,iostat=ierr) quad_jac
4360  if(ierr/=0) then
4361  call q_error('e','READBQF', &
4362  'Read error for test data in BQF file')
4363  write(luq_err,'(a)') &
4364  'BQF file probably generated with test option off'
4365  igrid = 3
4366  goto 9999
4367  end if
4368  read(luq_bqf) quad_cple
4369  read(luq_bqf) quad_sym
4370  read(luq_bqf) quad_ws
4371 !
4372  lastquadfile = bqname
4373 !
4374  close(luq_bqf)
4375 !
4376  if(iq_log >=1) then
4377  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_CTRGRID: '//trim(bqname)// &
4378  ' disconnected from:',luq_bqf
4379  end if
4380 
4381  end if
4382 !
4383  9999 continue
4384  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,f10.2)') &
4385  'Q_CTRGRID: on exit igrid & q_depth:',igrid,q_depth
4386 !
4387  if (allocated(z_ad)) deallocate(z_ad,z_sig)
4388 !
4389  if(iq_screen > 2) write(iscreen,'(2a,2x,f12.2)') &
4390  'Q_CTRGRID: On exit LASTQUADFILE & q_depth: ',lastquadfile, &
4391  q_depth
4392  if(iq_prt >=2) write(luq_prt,'(2a,2x,f12.2)') &
4393  'Q_CTRGRID: On exit LASTQUADFILE & q_depth: ',lastquadfile, &
4394  q_depth
4395 !
4396  call q_stack('-q_ctrgrid')
4397 !
4398  return
4399  end subroutine
4400 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4401  subroutine q_dscale(n,sigma,angle,nsig,nang,depth,grav_w,q_dfac)
4402 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4403 !
4404 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
4405 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
4406 ! | +---+
4407 ! | | +---+ Last update: 23 Aug. 2002
4408 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
4409 ! +---+
4410 !
4411 !
4412 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
4413 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
4414 !
4415 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
4416 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
4417 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
4418 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
4419 !
4420 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
4421 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
4422 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
4423 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
4424 !
4425 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
4426 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
4427 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
4428 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
4429 !
4430 !
4431  use serv_xnl4v5
4432  implicit none
4433 !
4434 ! 0. Update history
4435 !
4436 ! Date Modification
4437 !
4438 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
4439 ! 2/12/1999 Result modified if total energy <= 0
4440 ! Cosmetic changes
4441 ! 13/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
4442 ! 23/09/2002 Mean wave number multiplied by 0.75
4443 !
4444 ! 1. Purpose:
4445 !
4446 ! Compute scaling factor for nonlinear transfer in finite depth
4447 !
4448 ! 2. Method
4449 !
4450 ! Compute mean wave number km
4451 !
4452 ! Compute scale factor based on parameterized function of (km*d)
4453 ! according to Herterich and Hasselmann
4454 ! and parameterisation from WAM model
4455 !
4456 !
4457 ! 3. Interface parameter list:
4458 !
4459 ! Type I/O Name Description
4460 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
4461  integer, intent (in) :: nsig ! Number of sigma-values
4462  integer, intent (in) :: nang ! Number of directions
4463  real, intent(in) :: n(nsig,nang) ! N(nsig,nang) Action density
4464  real, intent(in) :: sigma(nsig) ! sigma values
4465  real, intent(in) :: angle(nang) ! directions in (radians)
4466  real, intent(in) :: depth ! Depth (m)
4467  real, intent(in) :: grav_w ! Gravitational acceleration
4468  real, intent(out) :: q_dfac ! scale factor
4469 !
4470 ! 4. Error messages
4471 !
4472 ! 5. Called by:
4473 !
4474 ! XNL_MAIN
4475 !
4476 ! 6. Subroutines used
4477 !
4478 ! x_wnumb
4479 ! z_steps
4480 ! q_stack
4481 !
4482 ! 7. Remarks
4483 !
4484 ! 8. Structure
4485 !
4486 ! 9. Switches
4487 !
4488 ! 10. Source code
4489 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4490 ! local variables
4491 !
4492  real w ! radian frequency
4493  real kk ! local wave number
4494  real sqkk ! square root of local wave number
4495  real dnn ! summation quantity
4496  real kms ! mean wave number
4497  real kd ! depth*mean wave number product
4498  real sum0 ! summation variable for total energy
4499  real sumk ! summation variable for wave number
4500  real delta ! directional step, in radians
4501 !
4502  integer isig ! counter over sigma loop
4503  integer iang ! counter over direction loop
4504 !
4505 ! functions
4506 !!! real z_wnumb ! function to compute wave number
4507 !
4508 ! temporary data
4509 !
4510  real dsigma(nsig) ! step size of sigma array, used for integration
4511 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4512 !
4513  call q_stack('+q_dscale')
4514 !
