4515  call z_steps(sigma,dsigma,nsig) ! compute step size of sigma's
4516  delta = angle(2)-angle(1) ! compute directional step (radians)
4517 !
4518  sum0 = 0.
4519  sumk = 0.
4520 !
4521 ! compute sums for total energy andwave number
4522 !
4523  do isig = 1,nsig
4524  w = sigma(isig)
4525  kk = z_wnumb(w,depth,grav_w) ! compute wave number for given sigma,depth
4526  sqkk = sqrt(kk)
4527  do iang=1,nang
4528  dnn = n(isig,iang)*dsigma(isig)*delta
4529  sum0 = sum0 + dnn
4530  sumk = sumk + 1./sqkk*dnn
4531  end do
4532  end do
4533 !
4534 ! compute mean wave number and scale factor based
4535 ! on the WAM approximation
4536 !
4537  if(sum0 > 0) then
4538  kms = (sum0/sumk)**2
4539  kd = max(0.5,0.75*kms*depth)
4540  q_dfac = 1+5.5/kd*(1.-5./6.*kd)*exp(-5./4.*kd)
4541  if(iq_test>=1) write(luq_tst,'(a,3f10.4)') 'Q_DSCALE kms,kd, &
4542  q_dfac:', &
4543  kms,kd,q_dfac
4544 ! pause
4545  else
4546  kms = 0.
4547  kd = 0.
4548  q_dfac = 1.
4549  end if
4550 !
4551  call q_stack('-q_dscale')
4552 !
4553  return
4554  end subroutine
4555 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4556  subroutine q_error(err_type,err_name,err_msg)
4557 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4558 !
4559 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
4560 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
4561 ! | +---+
4562 ! | | +---+ Last update 8 Aug. 2002
4563 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
4564 ! +---+
4565 !
4566 !
4567 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
4568 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
4569 !
4570 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
4571 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
4572 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
4573 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
4574 !
4575 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
4576 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
4577 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
4578 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
4579 !
4580 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
4581 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
4582 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
4583 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
4584 !
4585 !
4586 ! do not use m_xnldata
4587  use m_fileio
4588  implicit none
4589 !
4590 ! 0. Update history
4591 !
4592 ! 0.01 22/06/1999 Initial version
4593 ! 0.02 20/07/1999 Error message included
4594 ! 0.03 24/09/1999 Full message read from file Q_ERROR.TXT
4595 ! input argument ERR_NAME added
4596 ! 0.04 13/10/1999 Reading of multiple lines in Q_ERROR.TXT file
4597 ! 0.05 26/11/1999 Layout modified
4598 ! 0.06 30/11/1999 Extra output added, also to screen
4599 ! 4.01 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4
4600 !
4601 ! 1. Purpose:
4602 !
4603 ! Error handling routine, produces a warning to an error
4604 ! that has occured prints the error message and print
4605 ! module stack to trace the origin of the error/
4606 !
4607 ! 3. Parameter list:
4608 !
4609 !Type I/O Name Description
4610 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4611  character(len=1), intent(in) :: err_type ! type of error
4612 ! w or W: Warning or non-terminating error
4613 ! e or E: terminating error
4614  character(len=*), intent(in) :: err_name ! reference to error message
4615  character(len=*), intent(in) :: err_msg ! Optional additional error message
4616 !
4617 ! 4. Error messages
4618 !
4619 ! 5. Called by:
4620 !
4621 ! All q_** subroutines
4622 !
4623 ! 6. Subroutines used
4624 !
4625 ! 7. Remarks
4626 !
4627 ! The reference to an error message is stored in the
4628 ! string ERR_NAME. For each error number an associated
4629 ! error is given.
4630 !
4631 ! No call is made to subroutine q_trace to avoid
4632 ! infinite recursion
4633 !
4634  character(len=80) qline ! Input line from file with error messges
4635  integer ntext ! number of text line
4636  integer iend ! indicator for end of line
4637  integer iutxt ! unit number for text file
4638  integer iuerr ! indicator for error
4639  integer j_stack ! counter in printing stack
4640  integer ispace ! indicates that first character of line is space
4641 !
4642  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.err'
4643  call z_fileio(tempfile,'UF',iufind,luq_err,iuerr) ! error messages
4644 !
4645 ! logging of unit number
4646 !
4647  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') &
4648  'Q_ERROR: '//trim(qbase)//'.ERR connected to unit:',luq_err
4649 !
4650 ! write general information, when the first error or
4651 !
4652  if(iq_warn ==0 .and. iq_err==0) then
4653  write(luq_err,'(a)') q_version
4654  write(luq_err,'(a)') &
4655  '------------------------------------------------------------'
4656  end if
4657 !
4658 ! check type of error
4659 !
4660  if(index('wW',err_type) > 0) then
4661  iq_warn = iq_warn + 1
4662  write(luq_err,'(a,i4)') 'Warning or non-terminating error:', &
4663  iq_warn
4664  write(luq_err,'(a,a)') 'Name of error:',trim(err_name)
4665 !
4666  elseif(index('eE',err_type) > 0) then
4667  iq_err = iq_err + 1
4668  write(luq_err,'(a,i4)') 'Terminating error:',iq_err
4669  write(luq_err,'(a,a)') 'Name of error:',trim(err_name)
4670  write(*,'(1x,a,i4)') 'Terminating error:',iq_err
4671  write(*,'(1x,a,a)') 'Name of error:',trim(err_name)
4672  end if
4673 !
4674 ! search explanation of error message in the file
4675 ! QF_ERROR, set in XNL_INIT
4676 !
4677  ntext = len_trim(err_name)
4678 !
4679  if(ntext > 0) then
4680  tempfile=qf_error
4681  call z_fileio(tempfile,'OF',iufind,luq_txt,iutxt)
4682 !
4683  if(iutxt < 0) then
4684  if(iq_log > 0) write(luq_log,'(3a)') &
4685  'Q_ERROR: File ',trim(qf_error), &
4686  ' does not exist in current directory'
4687 !
4688  else
4689  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') &
4690  'Q_ERROR: File Q_ERROR.TXT connected to unit:',luq_txt
4691  iend=0
4692 !
4693 ! scan all lines in the text file with error messages
4694 !
4695  do while (iend==0)
4696  read(luq_txt,'(a)',iostat=iend) qline
4697  if(iend==0) then
4698 !
4699 ! check code word exists in text file
4700 !
4701  if(qline(1:ntext) == err_name(1:ntext)) then
4702  write(luq_err,*)
4703  write(luq_err,'(a)') &
4704  'Explanation of error, and recommended action'
4705  write(luq_err,'(a)') &
4706  '--------------------------------------------'
4707  write(luq_err,'(a)') trim(qline)
4708 !
4709 ! read following lines until end of file or a non-space in column 1
4710 !
4711  ispace = 1
4712  do while (ispace ==1)
4713  read(luq_txt,'(a)',iostat=iend) qline
4714 !
4715 ! check conditions
4716 !
4717  if(iend==0) then
4718  if(qline(1:1) == ' ') then
4719  write(luq_err,'(a)') trim(qline)
4720  else
4721  ispace = 0
4722  end if
4723  else
4724  ispace = 0
4725  end if
4726  end do
4727  end if
4728  end if
4729  end do
4730 !
4731 ! close text file with error messages
4732 !
4733  close(luq_txt)
4734  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(3a,i4)') &
4735  'Q_ERROR: File ',trim(qf_error),' disconnected from unit:', &
4736  luq_txt
4737  end if
4738  end if
4739 !
4740  if(len_trim(err_msg) > 0) then
4741  write(luq_err,*)
4742  write(luq_err,'(a)') 'Additional message from point of occurrence:'
4743  write(luq_err,'(a)') trim(err_msg)
4744  write(luq_err,*)
4745  end if
4746 !
4747 ! print stack of subroutines to trace the location where the
4748 ! error occurred
4749 !
4750  write(luq_err,'(a)') 'Trace of error'
4751  write(luq_err,'(a)') '--------------'
4752  do j_stack=1,iq_stack
4753  write(luq_err,'(1x,i4,2x,a)') j_stack,trim(cstack(j_stack))
4754  end do
4755 !
4756  write(luq_err,*)
4757 !
4758  if(iq_warn > 10) stop 'Too many warnings'
4759 !
4760  return
4761  end subroutine
4762 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4763  subroutine q_getlocus(ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3,ifnd)
4764 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4765 !
4766 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
4767 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
4768 ! | +---+
4769 ! | | +---+ Last update: 24 December 2003
4770 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
4771 ! +---+
4772 !
4773 !
4774 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
4775 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
4776 !
4777 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
4778 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
4779 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
4780 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
4781 !
4782 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
4783 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
4784 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
4785 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
4786 !
4787 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
4788 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
4789 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
4790 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
4791 !
4792 !
4793 ! do not use m_xnldata
4794  use m_constants
4795  use serv_xnl4v5
4796 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4797  implicit none
4798 !
4799 ! 0. Update history
4800 !
4801 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
4802 ! 15/04/1999 Extra parameter IFND to indicate if a
4803 ! reference locus exists in the data base
4804 ! 19/07/1999 Restructured and some bugs removed
4805 ! 20/07/1999 Option added to compute locus directly, no database
4806 ! or scaling involved. IFND < 0
4807 ! 15/10/1999 Information to transformation file updated
4808 ! 16/10/1999 Equation for computing address for storage updated
4809 ! 25/10/1999 Transformations updated
4810 ! 28/10/1999 Local variables ia1 and ia3 may not be changed, temp. variables
4811 ! it1 and it3 included
4812 ! 29/10/1999 Use of IQ_TRF modified
4813 ! EPSK introduced to check equality of loci
4814 ! 28/12/1999 A_CMPLOC renamed to Q_CMPLOC
4815 ! 03/01/2000 IQ_START replaced by IQ_LOCUS
4816 ! 05/01/2000 Interface with Q_CMPLOC modified
4817 ! 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
4818 ! 13/08/2002 Indexing in terms of integers and real weights
4819 ! upgrade to release 4.0
4820 ! 19/08/2002 Bug fixed in transforming CASE 6
4821 ! Interpolation option added
4822 ! 12/06/2003 Parameter t_ws set equal to r_ws
4823 ! 13/06/2003 Parameter t_cple, t_jac and t_sym assigned
4824 ! Bug fixed in nearest bin approach, symmetry regained
4825 ! 27/08/2003 Short-cut when number of points on locus is ZERO
4826 ! 24/12/2003 Tail factors for k2 and k4 addied
4827 !
4828 ! 1. Purpose:
4829 !
4830 ! Retrieve locus from basic locus as stored in the database
4831 !
4832 ! 2. Method
4833 !
4834 ! In the case of geometric scaling, k-scaling is used using scale laws
4835 ! described by Tracy
4836 !
4837 ! Directional transformation using linear transformations, shifting and mirror
4838 ! imaging.
4839 !
4840 !
4841 ! 3. Parameter list:
4842 !
4843 !Type I/O name Description
4844 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4845  integer, intent(in) :: ik1 ! k-index of wave number k1
4846  integer, intent(in) :: ia1 ! theta-index of wave number k1
4847  integer, intent(in) :: ik3 ! k-index of wave number k3
4848  integer, intent(in) :: ia3 ! theta-index of wave number k3
4849  integer, intent(out) :: ifnd ! indicator if reference locus exists in database
4850 !
4851 ! 4. Error messages
4852 !
4853 ! 5. Called by
4854 !
4855 ! Q_T13V4
4856 !
4857 ! 6. Subroutines used
4858 !
4859 ! 7. Remarks
4860 !
4861 ! 8. Structure
4862 !
4863 ! 9. Switches
4864 !
4865 ! 10. Source code
4866 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4867 ! Local variables
4868 !
4869  integer it1,it3 ! work indices for directions, copy of ia1 and ia3
4870  integer idir ! switch to indicate if locus should be inverted
4871  integer itrans ! type of transformation
4872  integer iloc,jloc ! counters along locus
4873  integer iadif,ikdif ! difference in angular and k-index
4874  integer ja1r,ja3r
4875  integer imirror ! extra step when locus is mirrorred
4876 !
4877  integer ibeta,kdif
4878  integer nloc ! number of points on locus
4879 !
4880  integer ierr
4881  integer kmem ! index for storing 2-d matrix in 1-d array
4882  integer amem ! index for storing direction of reference wave number k3
4883 !
4884  real lambda ! geometric scale factor
4885  real j_lambda ! scale factor for Jacobian term
4886  real c_lambda ! scale factor for coupling coefficient
4887  real zz_lambda ! combined scale factor
4888 !
4889  real xt2(nlocus),yt2(nlocus) ! xy-components of test k2-locus
4890  real xt4(nlocus),yt4(nlocus) ! xy-components of test k4-locus
4891  real wk,wa,vk,va
4892 !! \A
4893 !! real x_kfunc ! real function to compute wave number
4894 !! \Z
4895 !
4896  integer ikmin,ja1,ja3,jk1,jk3,itmin
4897  integer ibdif,nhalf
4898  integer iaq,ikq ! counters for loop over direction and wave numbers
4899 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4900 !
4901 !! data i_getloc /0/ ! Initialise counter
4902 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4903  call q_stack('+q_getlocus')
4904 !
4905 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4906 ! initialisations
4907 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4908 !
4909  it1 = ia1
4910  it3 = ia3
4911 !
4912  imirror = 1
4913  imirror = 2 - iq_interp
4914 !
4915  ikmin = min(ik1,ik3) ! compute minimum of wave number index
4916  ikdif = abs(ik1-ik3) ! compute difference between wave number indices
4917 !
4918  if (iq_geom ==0) then
4919  jk1 = min(ik1,ik3)
4920  jk3 = max(ik1,ik3)
4921  else
4922  jk1 = 1
4923  jk3 = ikdif + 1 ! compute k-index of wave number k3 relative to reference wave number
4924  end if
4925 !
4926  itmin = min(it1,it3) ! compute minimum angle of k1 and k3
4927  iadif = abs(it1-it3) ! difference index
4928  ja1 = 1 ! index of direction of reference wave number k1
4929  ja3 = iadif+iaref ! compute theta-index of direction of wave number k3
4930 !
4931  if(iq_test >=1) write(luq_tst,'(a,6i4)') &
4932  'Q_GETLOCUS: it1,it3,itmin,iadif,ja1,ja3:',it1,it3,itmin,iadif, &
4933  ja1,ja3
4934 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4935 ! circle grid, modify ranges and transformation variables
4936 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4937 !
4938  if (iq_grid==3) then
4939  nhalf = naq/2
4940  if (iadif > nhalf) then
4941  if(it1 > nhalf) it1 = it1 - naq
4942  if(it3 > nhalf) it3 = it3 - naq
4943  end if
4944  itmin = min(it1,it3)
4945  ibdif = (naq - abs(naq-2*abs(it1-it3)))/2 ! compute shortest difference in indices
4946  ! while taking care of periodicity
4947  ja3 = ibdif + 1
4948  iadif = ibdif
4949  end if
4950 !
4951  ja1r = 1
4952  ja3r = iadif + 1
4953  amem = iadif + 1 ! compute index of reference wave number k3 in interaction grid
4954 !
4955 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4956 ! obtain k-index of reference wave number
4957 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4958 !
4959  if(iq_geom==0) then
4960  kmem = (jk3-jk1+1) - (jk1-2*nkq-2)*(jk1-1)/2
4961  else
4962  kmem = ikdif+1
4963  end if
4964 !
4965  if(iq_test >=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,6i5)') &
4966  'Q_GETLOCUS: ik1 ia1 ik3 ia3 kmem amem:',ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3,kmem,amem
4967 !
4968 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4969 ! check memory indexing
4970 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4971 !
4972  if (amem > iamax) then
4973  ifnd = 0
4974  call q_error('e','MEMORY','Incorrect addres')
4975  write(luq_err,'(a,2i4)') 'Q_GETLOCUS: iamax,amem:',iamax,amem
4976  goto 9999
4977  end if
4978 !
4979 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
4980 ! retrieve info from reference locus
4981 ! get actual number of valid points along locus (NLOCUSZ)
4982 ! depending on value of switch IQ_COMPACT
4983 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4984 !
4985  nloc = quad_nloc(kmem,amem)
4986  if(iq_test>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_GETLOCUS: nloc:',nloc
4987  nlocusx = nloc
4988 !
4989 ! short-cut when number of NON-ZERO points on locus is ZERO [27/8/2003]
4990 !
4991  if(nlocusx==0) goto 9999
4992 !
4993  r_ik2(1:nloc) = quad_ik2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
4994  r_ia2(1:nloc) = quad_ia2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
4995  r_ik4(1:nloc) = quad_ik4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
4996  r_ia4(1:nloc) = quad_ia4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
4997 !
4998  r_w1k2(1:nloc) = quad_w1k2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
4999  r_w2k2(1:nloc) = quad_w2k2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5000  r_w3k2(1:nloc) = quad_w3k2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5001  r_w4k2(1:nloc) = quad_w4k2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5002 !
5003  r_w1k4(1:nloc) = quad_w1k4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5004  r_w2k4(1:nloc) = quad_w2k4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5005  r_w3k4(1:nloc) = quad_w3k4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5006  r_w4k4(1:nloc) = quad_w4k4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5007 !
5008  r_zz(1:nloc) = quad_zz(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5009 !
5010  r_tail2(1:nloc) = quad_t2(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5011  r_tail4(1:nloc) = quad_t4(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5012 !
5013  r_jac(1:nloc) = quad_jac(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5014  r_cple(1:nloc) = quad_cple(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5015  r_sym(1:nloc) = quad_sym(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5016  r_ws(1:nloc) = quad_ws(kmem,amem,1:nloc)
5017 !
5018 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5019  kdif = ikmin - 1
5020  if(iq_geom==0) then
5021  lambda = 1.
5022  kdif = 0.
5023  else
5024  lambda = q_kfac**(ikmin-1.)
5025  end if
5026 !
5027  j_lambda = 1./sqrt(lambda)
5028  c_lambda = lambda**6
5029 !
5030 ! compute combined scale factor
5031 !
5032  zz_lambda = lambda*c_lambda/j_lambda
5033 !
5034 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5035 ! select case to transform reference locus
5036 !
5037 ! Transformation of weights reduces to an addition or subtraction
5038 ! because of log-spacing of wave numbers in the case of deep water
5039 ! and geometric scaling
5040 !
5041  if(ik3 > ik1 .and. it3 >= it1) then ! Case 1
5042  itrans = 1
5043  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5044  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5045  ibeta = itmin-iaref
5046  t_ia2(1:nloc) = r_ia2(1:nloc) + ibeta
5047  t_ia4(1:nloc) = r_ia4(1:nloc) + ibeta
5048  idir = 1
5049  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5050  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5051  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5052  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5053  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5054  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5055  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5056  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5057 !
5058  elseif(ik3 > ik1 .and. it3 < it1) then ! Case 2
5059  itrans = 2
5060  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5061  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5062  ibeta = int(q_ad(ia1)/q_deltad+0.01)
5063  t_ia2(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia2(1:nloc) -imirror
5064  t_ia4(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia4(1:nloc) -imirror
5065  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5066  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5067  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5068  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5069  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5070  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5071  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5072  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5073  idir = -1 ! according to theory
5074 ! idir = 1 ! as it should be to get symmetry
5075 !
5076  elseif(ik1 > ik3 .and. it3 >= it1) then ! Case 3
5077  itrans = 3
5078  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5079  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5080  ibeta = int(q_ad(ia3)/q_deltad+0.01)
5081  t_ia2(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia4(1:nloc) -imirror
5082  t_ia4(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia2(1:nloc) -imirror
5083  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5084  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5085  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5086  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5087  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5088  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5089  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5090  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5091  idir = 1
5092 !
5093  elseif(ik1 > ik3 .and. it1 > it3) then ! Case 4
5094  itrans = 4
5095  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5096  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5097  ibeta = itmin-iaref
5098  t_ia2(1:nloc) = ibeta + r_ia4(1:nloc)
5099  t_ia4(1:nloc) = ibeta + r_ia2(1:nloc)
5100  idir = -1
5101  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5102  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5103  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5104  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5105  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5106  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5107  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5108  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5109 !
5110  elseif(ik1==ik3 .and. it3 > it1) then ! Case 5
5111  itrans = 5
5112  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5113  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5114  ibeta = itmin-iaref
5115  t_ia2(1:nloc) = r_ia2(1:nloc) + ibeta
5116  t_ia4(1:nloc) = r_ia4(1:nloc) + ibeta
5117  idir = 1
5118  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5119  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5120  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5121  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5122  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5123  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5124  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5125  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5126 !
5127  elseif(ik1==ik3 .and. it1 > it3) then ! Case 6
5128  itrans = 6
5129  t_ik2(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik4(1:nloc)
5130  t_ik4(1:nloc) = kdif + r_ik2(1:nloc)
5131  ibeta = int(q_ad(ia1)/q_deltad+0.01)
5132  t_ia2(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia2(1:nloc) -imirror
5133  t_ia4(1:nloc) = ibeta + 2.*iaref - r_ia4(1:nloc) -imirror
5134 !! ibeta = itmin-iaref
5135 !! t_ia2(1:nloc) = r_ia4(1:nloc) + ibeta
5136 !! t_ia4(1:nloc) = r_ia2(1:nloc) + ibeta
5137  idir = -1
5138  t_w1k2(1:nloc) = r_w3k2(1:nloc)
5139  t_w2k2(1:nloc) = r_w4k2(1:nloc)
5140  t_w3k2(1:nloc) = r_w1k2(1:nloc)
5141  t_w4k2(1:nloc) = r_w2k2(1:nloc)
5142  t_w1k4(1:nloc) = r_w3k4(1:nloc)
5143  t_w2k4(1:nloc) = r_w4k4(1:nloc)
5144  t_w3k4(1:nloc) = r_w1k4(1:nloc)
5145  t_w4k4(1:nloc) = r_w2k4(1:nloc)
5146  end if
5147 !
5148  t_zz(1:nloc) = lambda*c_lambda/j_lambda * r_zz(1:nloc)
5149 !
5150  t_tail2(1:nloc) = r_tail2(1:nloc)
5151  t_tail4(1:nloc) = r_tail4(1:nloc)
5152 !
5153  t_ws(1:nloc) = r_ws(1:nloc)
5154  t_jac(1:nloc) = r_jac(1:nloc)*j_lambda
5155  t_cple(1:nloc) = r_cple(1:nloc)*c_lambda
5156  t_sym(1:nloc) = r_sym(1:nloc)
5157 !
5158  ifnd = 1
5159 !
5160 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5161  if(iq_trf>=1.and.(ik1>=mk1a .and. ik1<=mk1b) .and. &
5162  (ik3>=mk3a .and. ik3<=mk3b)) then
5163  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '! ik1 ia1 ik3 ia3'
5164  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '! k1x k1y k3x k3y'
5165  write(luq_trf,'(a)') &
5166  '! itrans kmem amem kdif iaref ibeta imirror it1 it3'
5167  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '! lambda depth'
5168  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '! nlocus'
5169  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '! k2x k2y k4x k4y ds jac cple sym zz'
5170 !
5171  write(luq_trf,'(a1,2i3.3,a1,2i3.3,a1)') '(',ik1,ia1,'-',ik3, &
5172  ia3,')'
5173  write(luq_trf,'(4f10.4)') q_k(ik1)*cos(q_a(ia1)), &
5174  q_k(ik1)*sin(q_a(ia1)), &
5175  q_k(ik3)*cos(q_a(ia3)), &
5176  q_k(ik3)*sin(q_a(ia3))
5177  write(luq_trf,'(9i5)') itrans,kmem,amem,kdif,iaref,ibeta, &
5178  imirror,it1,it3
5179  write(luq_trf,'(2f10.3)') lambda,q_depth
5180 !
5181  where(t_ia2 < 1)
5182  t_ia2 = t_ia2 + ncirc
5183  end where
5184 !
5185  where(t_ia2 > ncirc)
5186  t_ia2 = t_ia2 - ncirc
5187  end where
5188 !
5189  where(t_ia4 < 1)
5190  t_ia4 = t_ia4 + ncirc
5191  end where
5192 !
5193  where(t_ia4 > ncirc)
5194  t_ia4 = t_ia4 - ncirc
5195  end where
5196  if(iq_trf==2) then
5197  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '#TRF1#'
5198  write(luq_trf,'(2i5)') nlocusx,8
5199  do iloc=1,nlocusx
5200  write(luq_trf,'(3i6,4f10.4,e13.5)') iloc,r_ik2(iloc), &
5201  r_ia2(iloc), &
5202  r_w1k2(iloc),r_w2k2(iloc),r_w3k2(iloc),r_w4k2(iloc), &
5203  r_zz(iloc)
5204  end do
5205 !
5206  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '#TRF2#'
5207  write(luq_trf,'(2i5)') nlocusx,8
5208  do iloc=1,nlocusx
5209  write(luq_trf,'(3i6,4f10.4,e13.5)') iloc,t_ik2(iloc), &
5210  t_ia2(iloc), &
5211  t_w1k2(iloc),t_w2k2(iloc),t_w3k2(iloc),t_w4k2(iloc), &
5212  t_zz(iloc)
5213  end do
5214  end if
5215 !
5216  if(iq_trf>=3) then
5217  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '#TRF3#'
5218  write(luq_trf,'(2i5)') nlocusx,9
5219  do iloc=1,nlocus
5220  wk = t_w2k2(iloc) + t_w4k2(iloc)
5221  wa = t_w3k2(iloc) + t_w4k2(iloc)
5222  vk = q_k(t_ik2(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik2(iloc))
5223  va = q_a(t_ia2(iloc)) + wa*q_delta
5224  xt2(iloc) = vk*cos(va)
5225  yt2(iloc) = vk*sin(va)
5226 !
5227  wk = t_w2k4(iloc) + t_w4k4(iloc)
5228  wa = t_w3k4(iloc) + t_w4k4(iloc)
5229  vk = q_k(t_ik4(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik4(iloc))
5230  va = q_a(t_ia4(iloc)) + wa*q_delta
5231  xt4(iloc) = vk*cos(va)
5232  yt4(iloc) = vk*sin(va)
5233  write(luq_trf,'(5f10.4,5e13.5)') xt2(iloc),yt2(iloc), &
5234  xt4(iloc),yt4(iloc), &
5235  t_ws(iloc),t_cple(iloc),t_jac(iloc),t_sym(iloc), &
5236  t_zz(iloc)
5237  end do
5238  end if
5239 !
5240  end if
5241 !
5242  9999 continue
5243 !
5244  call q_stack('-q_getlocus')
5245 !
5246  return
5247  end subroutine
5248 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5249  subroutine q_init
5250 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5251 !
5252 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
5253 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
5254 ! | +---+
5255 ! | | +---+ Last update: 22 December 2003
5256 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
5257 ! +---+
5258 !
5259 !
5260 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
5261 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
5262 !
5263 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
5264 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
5265 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
5266 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
5267 !
5268 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
5269 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
5270 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
5271 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
5272 !
5273 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
5274 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
5275 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
5276 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
5277 !
5278 !
5279 ! do not use m_xnldata
5280  use m_fileio
5281  use m_constants
5282  use serv_xnl4v5
5283  implicit none
5284 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5285 ! 0. Update history
5286 !
5287 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
5288 ! 13/10/1999 Error handling improved
5289 ! 18/10/1999 Test output to MATCHK.GRD added
5290 ! 21/10/1999 Extra output to MATCHK.GRD, iaref=1 for circle grids
5291 ! 01/11/1999 Allocatable arrays Q_XK and Q_SK added
5292 ! 14/02/2001 Version ready for WAVEWATCH III
5293 ! 8/08/2002 Release 4.
5294 ! 16/08/2002 Group velocity computed
5295 ! 22/08/2002 First and last used defined direction accounted for
5296 ! 11/09/2002 Call of Q_ALOC moved to higher level, viz. XNL_INIT
5297 ! q_kpow initialized
5298 ! 25/09/2002 User defined directions used in the case of a sector grid
5299 ! 22/12/2003 sk_max increased from 50 to 500
5300 !
5301 ! 1. Purpose:
5302 !
5303 ! Initializing module for quadruplets
5304 ! and setting default settings
5305 !
5306 ! 2. Method
5307 !
5308 ! Conversion of power of spectral tail from E(f) to N(k) using the following
5309 ! relations:
5310 !
5311 ! E(f) ~ f^qf_tail
5312 !
5313 ! N(k) ~ k^qk_tail
5314 !
5315 ! qk_tail = qf_tail/2 -1
5316 !
5317 ! See also Note 13 of G.Ph. van Vledder
5318 !
5319 ! 3. Parameter list:
5320 !
5321 ! Name I/O Type Description
5322 !
5323 !
5324 ! 4. error meassage
5325 !
5326 ! 5. Called by
5327 !
5328 ! XNL_INIT
5329 !
5330 ! 6. Subroutines used
5331 !
5332 ! Q_STACK
5333 ! Z_CMPCG
5334 ! Z_STEPS
5335 ! Z_WNUMB
5336 !
5337 ! 7. Remarks
5338 !
5339 ! 8. Structure
5340 !
5341 ! 9. Switches
5342 !
5343 ! /S Enable subroutine tracing
5344 !
5345 ! 10. Source code
5346 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5347 ! Local variables
5348 !
5349  integer iaq,ikq ! counters for loops over directions and wave numbers
5350  real ff ! frequency
5351 !!!real z_wnumb ! service function to compute wave number
5352 !
5353  integer iuerr ! error indicator for i/o
5354 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5355 !
5356  call q_stack('+q_init')
5357 !
5358 ! set general settings
5359 !
5360 ! convert power of E(f) f^qf_tail to power of N(k) k^qk_tail
5361 ! See Note 13 of G.Ph. van Vledder
5362 !
5363  qk_tail = (qf_tail-2.)/2. ! power of spectral tail, of N(k)
5364 !
5365  if(iq_prt >=2) then
5366  write(luq_prt,*)
5367  write(luq_prt,'(a,f6.1)') 'Q_INIT: E(f)_tail: ',qf_tail
5368  write(luq_prt,'(a,f6.1)') 'Q_INIT: N(k)_tail: ',qk_tail
5369  end if
5370 !
5371 ! set absolute and relative accuracies
5372 !
5373  eps_q = 0.001 ! absolute accuracy for check of q==0
5374  eps_k = 1.e-5 ! absolute accuracy for equality check of k
5375  rel_k = 0.001 ! relative accuracy for equality check of k
5376 !
5377  sk_max = 500. ! set maximum waver number
5378  wk_max = real(nkq+0.9999) ! set maximum wave number index
5379 !
5380 ! compute frequency and wave number grid
5381 ! assume that frequencies are always geometrically spaced,
5382 ! in the case of deep water this also holds for the wave numbers
5383 !
5384  q_ffac = (fqmax/fqmin)**real(1./(nkq-1.)) ! geometric spacing factor of frequencies
5385 !
5386  ff = fqmin ! set minimum frequency
5387 !
5388  if(iq_prt>=2) then
5389  write(luq_prt,*)
5390  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Basic wave numbers, frequencies'
5391  end if
5392 !
5393  do ikq=1,nkq ! Generate wave number dependent variables
5394  q_f(ikq) = ff ! Frequency
5395  q_sig(ikq) = ff*4.*pih ! Radian frequency
5396  q_k(ikq) = z_wnumb(q_sig(ikq),q_depth,q_grav) ! compute wave number
5397  q_kpow(ikq) = (q_k(1)/q_k(ikq))**7.5 ! used in filtering
5398  ff = ff*q_ffac ! Increase frequency
5399 !
5400  call z_cmpcg(q_sig(ikq),q_depth,q_grav,q_cg(ikq))
5401  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
5402  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,3f10.5,e12.4)') &
5403  'Q_INIT: ikq f sigma k k^p:', &
5404  ikq,q_f(ikq),q_sig(ikq),q_k(ikq),q_kpow(ikq)
5405  end if
5406  end do
5407 !
5408 ! compute characteristics of extended k-array
5409 !
5410  if(iq_prt>=2) then
5411  write(luq_prt,*)
5412  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Extended wave numbers and spacing'
5413  end if
5414 !
5415  do ikq=0,nkq
5416  if(ikq==0) then
5417  q_xk(ikq) = 0.
5418  q_sk(ikq) = q_k(1)
5419  elseif(ikq==nkq) then
5420  q_xk(ikq) = q_k(ikq)
5421  q_sk(ikq) = sk_max
5422  else
5423  q_xk(ikq) = q_k(ikq)
5424  q_sk(ikq) = q_k(ikq+1) - q_k(ikq)
5425  end if
5426 !
5427  end do
5428 !
5429 !
5430  kqmin = q_k(1)
5431  kqmax = q_k(nkq)
5432  q_kfac = (kqmax/kqmin)**real(1./(nkq-1)) ! this value makes only sense in the
5433  ! case of deep water, IQ_DISP==1
5434 !
5435 ! compute step size of frequency grids and wave number grid
5436 !
5437  call z_steps(q_f, q_df, nkq) ! step size of frequencies
5438  call z_steps(q_sig,q_dsig,nkq) ! step size of radian frequencies
5439  call z_steps(q_k, q_dk, nkq) ! step size of wave numbers
5440 !
5441  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
5442  write(luq_prt,*)
5443  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Q_INIT: Additional information'
5444  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.1)') 'Q_depth (m):',q_depth
5445  write(luq_prt,'(a,i3)') 'Number of frequencies:',nkq
5446  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.4)') 'Geometric f-spacing factor:',q_ffac
5447  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.4)') 'Geometric k-spacing factor:',q_kfac
5448  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f8.3)') 'fmin fmax (Hz):',fqmin,fqmax
5449  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f8.3)') 'kmin kmax (Hz):',kqmin,kqmax
5450  write(luq_prt,*)
5451 !
5452  write(luq_prt,*) ' i f df sig '// &
5453  'dsig k dk cg'
5454 !
5455  do ikq=1,nkq
5456  write(luq_prt,'(1x,i4,7f10.4)') &
5457  ikq,q_f(ikq),q_df(ikq),q_sig(ikq),q_dsig(ikq),q_k(ikq), &
5458  q_dk(ikq),q_cg(ikq)
5459  end do
5460  end if
5461 !
5462 ! =============== D I R E C T I O N S ===============================================
5463 !
5464 ! the directions in the array ANGLE are running from 1 to NAQ
5465 ! for a sector definition the middle direction has index IAREF
5466 !
5467 ! compute index IAREF of middle wave direction for sector grids
5468 !
5469  if(iq_grid ==1 .or. iq_grid==2) then
5470  iaref = (naq/2)+1
5471  elseif(iq_grid==3) then
5472  iaref = 1
5473  end if
5474 !
5475  if(iq_prt >= 2) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') &
5476  'Q_INIT: Index of first direction for reference:',iaref
5477 !
5478 ! set loops indices
5479 !
5480  if(iq_grid==1) then ! symmetric sector
5481  iaq1 = iaref
5482  iaq2 = naq
5483 !
5484 ! non-symmetric sector and full circle
5485 !
5486  elseif(iq_grid==2 .or. iq_grid==3) then
5487  iaq1 = 1
5488  iaq2 = naq
5489  end if
5490 !
5491  if(iq_prt >= 2) write(luq_prt,'(a,2i4)') &
5492  'Q_INIT: Range of indices for loop over directions:',iaq1,iaq2
5493 !
5494 ! generate directions, given in degrees
5495 !
5496  q_sector = 0.5*(abs(q_dird1) + abs(q_dird2))
5497 !
5498  if(iq_grid==1 .or. iq_grid==2) then ! define symmetric sector
5499  q_deltad = 2.*q_sector/real(naq-1.) ! delta in degrees
5500  q_ang1 = -q_sector ! degrees
5501  q_ang2 = q_sector ! degrees
5502  if(iq_prt>0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
5503  'Q_INIT: take care of q_dird1 and check if sector is OK'
5504 !
5505  elseif(iq_grid==3) then ! full sector
5506  q_deltad = 360./real(naq) ! degrees
5507  q_ang1 = 0 ! degrees
5508  q_ang2 = 360.-q_delta ! degrees
5509  end if
5510 !
5511  q_delta = q_deltad*dera ! directional step in radians
5512  ncirc = 2.00001*2.*pih/q_delta ! number of directions on circle
5513 !
5514  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
5515  write(luq_prt,'(a,3f10.3)') 'Q_INIT: d(1),d(n),dsector:', &
5516  q_dird1,q_dird2,q_sector
5517  write(luq_prt,'(a,f6.2,a)') 'Q_INIT: Angular step :', &
5518  q_deltad,' degrees'
5519  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f8.2,i4,a)') 'Q_INIT: ang1 ang2 nang :', &
5520  q_ang1,q_ang2,naq,' degrees'
5521  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Q_INIT: #Angles on circle:', &
5522  ncirc
5523  write(luq_prt,*)
5524  end if
5525 !
5526 ! generate directions arrays, given in degrees and radians
5527 !
5528  do iaq=1,naq
5529  q_ad(iaq) = q_ang1 + q_deltad*(iaq-1.)
5530  q_a(iaq) = q_ad(iaq)*dera
5531  if(iq_prt >= 2) then
5532  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,f10.4,f10.2)') 'Q_INIT: iaq q_a q_ad:', &
5533  iaq,q_a(iaq),q_ad(iaq)
5534  if(iaq==naq) write(luq_prt,*)
5535  end if
5536  end do
5537 !
5538 ! set loop indices for generation of grid
5539 ! for sector grids and circle grids
5540 !
5541  if(iq_grid==1 .or. iq_grid==2) then
5542  iag1 = iaref
5543  iag2 = naq
5544 !
5545 ! circle grid
5546 !
5547  elseif(iq_grid==3) then
5548  iag1 = 1
5549  iag2 = naq/2+1
5550  end if
5551 !
5552  iamax = iag2-iag1+1
5553 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
5554  if(iq_test>=1) then
5555  write(luq_tst,'(a,3i4)') 'Q_INIT: iq_grid iaref iamax:', &
5556  iq_grid,iaref,iamax
5557  write(luq_tst,'(a,4i4)') 'Q_INIT: iaq1 iaq2 iag1 iag2:', &
5558  iaq1,iaq2,iag1,iag2
5559  end if
5560 !
5561  if(iq_trf>0) then
5562  write(luq_trf,'(a)') '#GRIDINFO#'
5563  write(luq_trf,'(2i4)') nkq,naq
5564  write(luq_trf,'(10f8.4)') q_k
5565  write(luq_trf,'(10f8.2)') q_a*rade
5566  end if
5567 !
5568  call q_stack('-q_init')
5569 !
5570  return
5571  end subroutine
5572 
5573 
5574 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5575  real function x_locus1(k2)
5576 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5577 !
5578 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
5579 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
5580 ! | +---+
5581 ! | | +---+ Last update: 9 AUg. 2002
5582 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
5583 ! +---+
5584 !
5585 !
5586 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
5587 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
5588 !
5589 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
5590 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
5591 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
5592 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
5593 !
5594 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
5595 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
5596 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
5597 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
5598 !
5599 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
5600 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
5601 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
5602 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
5603 !
5604 !
5605 ! do not use m_xnldata
5606  use m_constants
5607  implicit none
5608 !
5609 ! 0. Update history
5610 !
5611 ! Date Description
5612 !
5613 ! 23/11/1999 Initial version
5614 ! 9/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
5615 !
5616 ! 1. Purpose:
5617 !
5618 ! Compute locus function along symmetry axis
5619 !
5620 ! 2. Method
5621 !
5622 ! See ALKYON, 1999
5623 !
5624 ! 3. Parameter list:
5625 !
5626 !Type I/O name Description
5627 !-------------------------------------------------------
5628  real, intent(in) :: k2 ! Magnitude of wave number k2
5629 !
5630 ! 4. Error messages
5631 !
5632 ! 5. Called by:
5633 !
5634 ! Q_LOCPOS
5635 !
5636 ! 6. Subroutines used
5637 !
5638 ! x_disper
5639 !
5640 ! 7. Remarks
5641 !
5642 ! The routine assumes that w1 < w3 or q<0
5643 ! implying that the directions of k2 and P are opposite
5644 !
5645 ! 8. Structure
5646 !
5647 ! 9. Switches
5648 !
5649 ! 10. Source code
5650 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5651 ! Local variables
5652 !
5653  real k4 ! wave number magnitudes of k4
5654  real w2,w4 ! radian frequencies of wave numbers k2 and k4
5655  real z ! function value
5656 !
5657 !! real x_disper
5658 !
5659  select case(iq_disp)
5660  case (1)
5661  w2 = sqrtg * sqrt(k2)
5662  w4 = sqrtg * sqrt(abs(-pmag+k2))
5663  z = q + w2 - w4
5664 !
5665  case (2)
5666  k4 = abs(-pmag+k2)
5667  w2 = x_disper(k2,q_depth)
5668  w4 = x_disper(k4,q_depth)
5669  z = q + w2 - w4
5670 !
5671  case default
5672  z = -1
5673  end select
5674 !
5675  x_locus1 = z
5676 !
5677  return
5678  end function
5679 
5680 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5681  real function x_locus2(lambda)
5682 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5683 !
5684 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
5685 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
5686 ! | +---+
5687 ! | | +---+ Last update: 9 Aug. 2002
5688 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
5689 ! +---+
5690 !
5691 !
5692 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
5693 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
5694 !
5695 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
5696 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
5697 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
5698 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
5699 !
5700 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
5701 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
5702 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
5703 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
5704 !
5705 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
5706 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
5707 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
5708 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
5709 !
5710 !
5711 ! do not use m_xnldata
5712  use m_constants
5713  implicit none
5714 !
5715 ! 0. Update history
5716 !
5717 ! Date Description
5718 !
5719 ! 23/11/1999 Initial version
5720 ! 09/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
5721 !
5722 ! 1. Purpose:
5723 !
5724 ! Compute locus function perpendicluar to symmetry axis
5725 !
5726 ! 2. Method
5727 !
5728 ! See ALKYON, 1999
5729 !
5730 ! 3. Parameter list:
5731 !
5732 ! Name I/O Type Description
5733 !
5734  real, intent(in) :: lambda
5735 !
5736 ! 4. Error messages
5737 !
5738 ! 5. Called by:
5739 !
5740 ! Q_LOCPOS
5741 !
5742 ! 6. Subroutines used
5743 !
5744 ! x_disper
5745 !
5746 ! 7. Remarks
5747 !
5748 ! The routine assumes that w1 < w3 or q<0
5749 ! implying that the directions of k2 and P are opposite
5750 !
5751 ! 8. Structure
5752 !
5753 ! 9. Switches
5754 !
5755 ! 10. Source code:
5756 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5757 ! local variables
5758 !
5759  real kk2x,kk2y,kk2m ! wave number components and magnitude for k2
5760  real kk4x,kk4y,kk4m ! wave number components and magnitude for k4
5761  real w2,w4 ! radian frequencies of wave numbers k2 and k4
5762  real z ! function value
5763 !! real x_disper
5764  kk2x = kmidx - lambda*py
5765  kk2y = kmidy + lambda*px
5766  kk2m = sqrt(kk2x**2 + kk2y**2)
5767 !
5768  kk4x = kk2x + px
5769  kk4y = kk2y + py
5770  kk4m = sqrt(kk4x**2 + kk4y**2)
5771 !
5772  select case(iq_disp)
5773  case (1)
5774  w2 = sqrtg * sqrt(kk2m)
5775  w4 = sqrtg * sqrt(kk4m)
5776  z = q + w2 - w4
5777 !
5778  case (2)
5779 !
5780  w2 = x_disper(kk2m,q_depth)
5781  w4 = x_disper(kk4m,q_depth)
5782  z = q + w2 - w4
5783 !
5784  case default
5785  z = -1
5786  end select
5787 !
5788  x_locus2 = z
5789 !
5790  return
5791  end function
5792 
5793 
5794 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5795  subroutine q_locpos(ka,kb,km,kw,loclen)
5796 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5797 !
5798 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
5799 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
5800 ! | +---+
5801 ! | | +---+ Last update: 14 Oct. 2002
5802 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
5803 ! +---+
5804 !
5805 !
5806 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
5807 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
5808 !
5809 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
5810 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
5811 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
5812 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
5813 !
5814 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
5815 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
5816 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
5817 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
5818 !
5819 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
5820 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
5821 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
5822 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
5823 !
5824 !
5825 ! do not use m_xnldata
5826  use m_constants
5827  use serv_xnl4v5, only: z_root2
5828 !
5829  implicit none
5830 !
5831 ! 0. Update history
5832 !
5833 ! Version Date Description
5834 !
5835 ! 03/12/1999 Initial version
5836 ! 09/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4.0
5837 ! 29/08/2002 Error handling z_root2 relaxed and some write statements modified
5838 ! 07/10/2002 Initialisation of QSQ replaced
5839 !
5840 ! 1. Purpose:
5841 !
5842 ! Compute characteristics of locus used to optimize its acutal computation
5843 !
5844 ! 2. Method
5845 !
5846 ! 3. Parameter list:
5847 !
5848 !Type I/O Name Description
5849 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
5850  real, intent (out) :: ka ! minimum k along symmetry axis
5851  real, intent (out) :: kb ! maximum k along symmetry axis
5852  real, intent (out) :: km ! wave number at midpoint
5853  real, intent (out) :: kw ! half width of locus at midpoint
5854  real, intent (out) :: loclen ! estimated length of locus
5855 !
5856 ! 4. Error messages
5857 !
5858 ! 5. Called by:
5859 !
5860 ! Q_CMPLOCUS
5861 !
5862 ! 6. Subroutines used
5863 !
5864 ! z_zero2 Root finding method
5865 ! x_locus1 Function of locus geometry, along symmetry axis
5866 ! x_locus2 Function of locus geometry, perpendicular to symmetry axis
5867 ! x_flocus Locus function
5868 !
5869 ! 7. Remarks
5870 !
5871 ! 8. Structure
5872 !
5873 ! 9. Switches
5874 !
5875 ! /S enable subroutine tracing
5876 ! /T enable test output
5877 !
5878 ! 10. Source code
5879 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5880 ! Local variables
5881 !
5882  real kp ! wave number at peak
5883  real kpx,kpy ! wave number at peak maximum
5884  real zp ! value of locus function at maximum
5885  real za,zb ! (test) value of locus function at kmin & kmax
5886  real zz1,zz2 ! intermediate function values in interation process
5887  real kk1,kk2 ! start values for finding root of locus equation
5888  real kk1x,kk1y ! wave number components at one side of root
5889  real kk2x,kk2y ! wave number components at other side of root
5890  real beta1,beta2 ! parameters specifying cross component
5891  real betaw ! parameter specifying iterated cross component
5892  real kwx,kwy ! wave number at side of locus
5893  real zw ! function value at (kwx,kwy)
5894  real a1,a2,b1,b2 ! constants in polynomial approximation of elliptic function
5895  real aa,bb,mm,mm1 ! semi-major exis of ellips and derived parameters
5896 !
5897  real eps ! local machine accuracy for determination of roots
5898  real bacc ! accuracy for determination of beta
5899  real kacc ! accuracy for determination of wave number roots
5900  real qs ! (w1-w3)/sqrt(g)
5901  real qsq ! gs^2
5902 !
5903 ! Function declaration
5904 !
5905 ! real z_root2 ! root finding using Ridders method
5906 !
5907  integer ierr ! local error indicator, used in function Z-ZERO1
5908  integer itest ! local test level for test output
5909  integer lutest ! unit for test output in service routines
5910  integer iter ! local iteration number
5911  integer maxiter ! maximum number of iteration for determining starting points
5912 !
5913 ! function declarations
5914 !! real, external :: x_locus2 ! locus function perpendicular to symmetry axis
5915 !! real x_flocus ! 2-d locus function
5916 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5917 ! assign test options
5918 !
5919  itest = iq_test ! assign test level
5920  lutest = 0 ! assign default, no test output in service routines
5921 !
5922  itest = 0 ! reset local test level
5923  if(itest > 0) lutest=luq_tst ! assign unit for test output
5924 !
5925  call q_stack('+q_locpos')
5926 !
5927 ! set initial values
5928 !
5929  eps = epsilon(1.) ! determine machine accurcy
5930  maxiter = 20 ! maximum number of iterations
5931 !
5932 ! compute location of maximum, located at k_2 = P
5933 !
5934  kpx = -px
5935  kpy = -py
5936  kp = sqrt(kpx**2 + kpy**2)
5937  zp = x_locus1(kp)
5938 !
5939 ! find location of points A and B on locus
5940 ! for deep water, explicit relations are available
5941 !
5942  if(iq_disp==1) then
5943  qs = q/sqrtg
5944  qsq = qs*qs
5945  if(qs < 0) then
5946  ka = 0.5*(-qs+sqrt(2.0*pmag-qsq))
5947  ka = ka**2
5948  kb = (pmag+qsq)/(2.*qs)
5949  kb = kb**2
5950  za = x_locus1(ka)
5951  zb = x_locus1(kb)
5952  else
5953  ka = 0.5*(-qs+sqrt(2.0*pmag-qsq))
5954  ka = -ka**2
5955  kb = (pmag-qsq)/(2.*qs)
5956  kb = kb**2
5957  za = x_locus1(ka)
5958  zb = x_locus1(kb)
5959  end if
5960 !
5961  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,6e12.5)') &
5962  'Q_LOCPOS: q,pmag,ka,kb,za,zb:',qs,pmag,ka,kb,za,zb
5963 !
5964 ! find location of points A and B on locus
5965 ! for water of finite depth, an iteration process is applied to
5966 ! determine the zero-crossings of the locus function
5967 !
5968  else
5969 !
5970  if(q<0) then
5971 !
5972 ! set two start points to locate position of wave number ka
5973 !
5974  kk1 = 0.
5975  kk2 = kp
5976 !
5977 ! search root by Ridder's method
5978 !
5979  kacc = 10.*max(kk1,kk2)*eps
5980  ka = z_root2(x_locus1,kk1,kk2,kacc,lutest,ierr)
5981 !
5982  if(ierr > 0) then
5983  if(itest>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') &
5984  'Q_LOCPOS/Z_ROOT2/IERR/1=',ierr
5985  end if
5986 !
5987  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f12.5)') &
5988  'Q_LOCPOS: q kk1 kk2 kmin:',q,kk1,kk2,ka
5989 !
5990 ! determine start points to locate position of wave number kb
5991 !
5992  kk1 = kp
5993  kk2 = kp
5994  zz1 = zp
5995  zz2 = zp
5996  iter = 0
5997 !
5998 ! ensure that two points are found on either side of zero-crossing
5999 !
6000  do while (zz1*zz2 >= 0 .and. iter < maxiter)
6001  iter = iter + 1
6002  kk2 = kk2*2
6003  zz2 = x_locus1(kk2)
6004  if(itest >= 2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,3f12.5,2e13.5)') &
6005  'Q_LOCPOS iter q kk1/2 zz1/2:',iter,q,kk1,kk2,zz1,zz2
6006  end do
6007 !
6008  if(iter>=maxiter) then
6009  call q_error('e','Start kb','Too many iterations needed')
6010  goto 9999
6011  end if
6012 !
6013 ! search root by Ridders method
6014 !
6015  kacc = 10.*max(kk1,kk2)*eps
6016  kb = z_root2(x_locus1,kk1,kk2,kacc,lutest,ierr)
6017  if(ierr>0 .and. itest>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') &
6018  'Q_LOCPOS/Z_ROOT2/IERR/2=',ierr
6019 !
6020 !==================================================================
6021 ! find positions for ka and kb for the case q > 0
6022 !
6023  else
6024 !
6025 ! set two start points to locate position of wave number ka
6026 !
6027  kk1 = 0.
6028  kk2 = -kp
6029  zz1 = x_locus1(kk1)
6030  zz2 = x_locus1(kk2)
6031  iter = 0
6032 !
6033 ! ensure that two points are found on either side of zero-crossing
6034 !
6035  do while (zz1*zz2 >= 0 .and. iter < maxiter)
6036  iter = iter + 1
6037  kk2 = kk2*2
6038  zz2 = x_locus1(kk2)
6039  if(itest >= 2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,3f12.5,2e12.5)') &
6040  'Q_LOCPOS: iter q kk1/2 zz1/2:',iter,q,kk1,kk2,zz1,zz2
6041  end do
6042 !
6043  if(iter>=maxiter) then
6044  call q_error('e','Start ka','Too many iterations needed')
6045  goto 9999
6046  end if
6047 !
6048 ! search root by Ridder's method
6049 !
6050  kacc = 10.*max(abs(kk1),abs(kk2))*eps
6051  ka = z_root2(x_locus1,kk1,kk2,kacc,lutest,ierr)
6052  if(ierr > 0 .and. itest>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') &
6053  'Q_LOCPOS/Z_ROOT2/IERR/3=',ierr
6054 !
6055 ! determine start points to locate position of wave number kb
6056 !
6057  kk1 = 0
6058  kk2 = kp
6059  zz1 = x_locus1(kk1)
6060  zz2 = x_locus1(kk2)
6061  iter = 0
6062 !
6063 ! ensure that two points are found on either side of zero-crossing
6064 !
6065  do while (zz1*zz2 >= 0 .and. iter < maxiter)
6066  iter = iter + 1
6067  kk2 = kk2*2
6068  zz2 = x_locus1(kk2)
6069  if(itest >= 2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,3f12.5,2e12.5)') &
6070  'Q_LOCPOS: iter q kk1/2 zz1/2:',iter,q,kk1,kk2,zz1,zz2
6071  end do
6072 !
6073  if(iter>=maxiter) then
6074  call q_error('e','Start kb','Too many iterations needed')
6075  goto 9999
6076  end if
6077 !
6078 ! search root by Ridders method
6079 !
6080  kacc = 10.*max(kk1,kk2)*eps
6081  kb = z_root2(x_locus1,kk1,kk2,kacc,luq_tst,ierr)
6082  if(ierr>0.and.itest>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') &
6083  'Q_LOCPOS/Z_ROOT2/IERR/4=',ierr
6084 !
6085 ! find positions for ka and kb for the case q > 0
6086 !
6087  end if
6088 !
6089  za = x_locus1(ka)
6090  zb = x_locus1(kb)
6091 !
6092  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,6e12.5)') &
6093  'Q_LOCPOS: q,pmag,ka,kb,za,zb:',q,pmag,ka,kb,za,zb
6094  end if
6095 !
6096 ! compute position of mid point
6097 !
6098  kmid = 0.5*(ka+kb)
6099  km = kmid
6100 !
6101  if(q < 0) then
6102  kmidx = kmid*cos(pang+2.*pih)
6103  kmidy = kmid*sin(pang+2.*pih)
6104  else
6105  kmidx = kmid*cos(pang)
6106  kmidy = kmid*sin(pang)
6107  end if
6108 !
6109  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,3f12.6)') &
6110  'Q_LOCPOS: kmid,kmidx,kmidy:',kmid,kmidx,kmidy
6111 !
6112 ! compute width of locus near mid point of locus
6113 !
6114 ! set starting values for determination of crossing point
6115 !
6116  beta1 = 0.
6117  kk1x = kmidx
6118  kk1y = kmidy
6119  beta2 = 0.5
6120  kk2x = kmidx - beta2*py
6121  kk2y = kmidy + beta2*px
6122  zz1 = x_flocus(kk1x,kk1y)
6123  zz2 = x_flocus(kk2x,kk2y)
6124 !
6125  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f10.5,2e12.5)') &
6126  'Q_LOCPOS: k1 k2 z1/2:', &
6127  kk1x,kk1y,kk2x,kk2y,zz1,zz2
6128 !
6129  iter = 0
6130  do while (zz1*zz2 > 0 .and. iter < maxiter)
6131  iter = iter + 1
6132  kk2x = kmidx - beta2*py
6133  kk2y = kmidy + beta2*px
6134  zz1 = x_flocus(kk1x,kk1y)
6135  zz2 = x_flocus(kk2x,kk2y)
6136  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,4f12.5,2e12.5)') &
6137  'Q_LOCPOS: iter beta1/2 kk2x/y zz1/2:',iter,beta1,beta2, &
6138  kk2x,kk2y,zz1,zz2
6139  beta2 = beta2*2
6140  end do
6141 !
6142 ! call Ridders method to locate position of zero-crossing
6143 !
6144  if(itest >= 1) then
6145  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f10.4,2e13.5)') &
6146  'Q_LOCPOS: beta1/2 xlocus2(beta1/2):',beta1,beta2, &
6147  x_locus2(beta1),x_locus2(beta2)
6148  end if
6149 !
6150  bacc = 10.*max(beta1,beta2)*eps
6151  betaw = z_root2(x_locus2,beta1,beta2,bacc,lutest,ierr)
6152 !
6153  if(ierr>0) then
6154  if(itest>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') &
6155  'Q_LOCPOS/Z_ROOT2/IERR_W/5=',ierr
6156  call q_error('e','ROOT2','beta')
6157  goto 9999
6158  end if
6159 !
6160  kwx = kmidx - betaw*py
6161  kwy = kmidy + betaw*px
6162  zw = x_flocus(kwx,kwy)
6163  kw = betaw*pmag
6164 !
6165  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f12.6,e12.5)') &
6166  'Q_LOCPOS: betaw kwx kwy kw zw:',betaw,kwx,kwy,kw,zw
6167 !
6168 ! estimate circumference of locus, assuming it to be an ellips
6169 ! estimate axis, this seems to be a rather good estimate
6170 !
6171  aa = 0.5*abs(ka-kb)
6172  bb = kw
6173 !
6174  if (aa > bb) then
6175  mm = 1-(bb/aa)**2
6176  else
6177  mm = 1-(aa/bb)**2
6178  end if
6179 !
6180  mm1 = 1.-mm
6181  a1 = 0.4630151; a2 = 0.1077812;
6182  b1 = 0.2452727; b2 = 0.0412496;
6183 !
6184  if (mm1==0) then
6185  loclen = 4.*max(aa,bb)
6186  else
6187  loclen = 4.*max(aa,bb)*((1. + a1*mm1 + a2*mm1**2) + &
6188  (b1*mm1 + b2*mm1**2)*log(1/mm1))
6189  end if
6190 !
6191  if(itest >= 1) then
6192  write(luq_tst,'(a,4f10.5)')'Q_LOCPOS: aa,bb,mm,mm1:',aa,bb,mm,mm1
6193  write(luq_tst,'(a,4f10.5)')'Q_LOCPOS: length of ellipse:',loclen
6194  end if
6195 !
6196  9999 continue
6197 !
6198  call q_stack('-q_locpos')
6199 !
6200  return
6201  end subroutine
6202 !
6203 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6204  subroutine q_makegrid
6205 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6206 !

6209 ! | +---+
6210 ! | | +---+ Last update: 22 December 2003
6211 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
6212 ! +---+

6215 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
6216 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
6217 !

6219 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
6220 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
6221 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
6222 !
6223 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
6224 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
6225 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
6226 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
6227 !
6228 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
6229 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
6230 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
6231 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
6232 !
6233 !
6234 ! do not use m_xnldata
6235  use m_constants
6236  use serv_xnl4v5
6237 !
6238 ! 0. Update history
6239 !
6240 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
6241 ! 11/10/1999 Error handling improved; Bugs fixed when w1=w3
6242 ! 12/10/1999 Storage modified and non-geometric option included
6243 ! 16/10/1999 Equation for computing address of 2d array simplified
6244 ! 21/10/1999 Range of precomputed grid added to data file
6245 ! 22/10/1999 Renaming of some indices
6246 ! 25/10/1999 Header with grid info extended
6247 ! 12/11/1999 Output format modified of data to GRD file, adapted
6248 ! for use on UNIX systems at WES
6249 ! 08/12/1999 Interface with A_CMPLOC extended
6250 ! 28/12/1999 Routine A_CMPLOC renamed to Q_CMPLOC
6251 ! 03/01/2000 IQ_START replaced by IQ_LOCUS
6252 ! 05/01/2000 Interface with Q_CMPLOC modified
6253 ! 08/02/2000 Output to LUQLOC made conditional
6254 ! 09/08/2002 Name changed from Q_GRIDV1 to Q_MAKEGRID
6255 ! Upgrade to release 4.0
6256 ! 15/08/2002 Bug fixed in indexing bins below lowest wave number
6257 ! 20/08/2002 Sigma written to QUAD file, instead of wave numbers
6258 ! 22/08/2002 Data along locus compacted, elimate zero's
6259 ! 10/09/2002 Upgrade to release 5
6260 ! Value of LASTQUADFILE set
6261 ! 10/06/2003 Output to GRD file always without compacting
6262 ! 22/12/2003 Bug fixed in index for compacting secondary test data along locus
6263 ! Tail factor removed from compound parameter ZZ
6264 ! 24/12/2003 QUAD_T2 and QUAD_T4 always in database
6265 !
6266 ! 1. Purpose:
6267 !
6268 ! Set-up grid for computation of loci
6269 !
6270 ! Generate data file with basic loci for computation of
6271 ! nonlinear quadruplet interactions
6272 !
6273 ! 2. Method
6274 !
6275 !
6276 ! 3. Parameter list:
6277 !
6278 ! Name I/O Type Description
6279 !
6280 ! 4. Error messages
6281 !
6282 ! 5. Called by:
6283 !
6284 ! Q_CTRGRID
6285 !
6286 ! 6. Subroutines used
6287 !
6288 ! Q_STACK
6289 ! Q_CPMLOCUS
6290 ! Q_MODIFY
6291 ! Q_WEIGHT
6292 ! Q_CHKRES
6293 ! Q_NEAREST
6294 !
6295 ! 7. Remarks
6296 !
6297 ! 8. Structure
6298 !
6299 ! 9. Switches
6300 !
6301 ! 10. Source code
6302 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6303 ! Local variables
6304 !
6305  integer iloc,jloc ! counters
6306  integer iaq,ikq ! counters
6307  integer iaq3,ikq1,ikq3,nkq1 ! counters
6308  integer jaq1,jaq3 ! counters
6309  integer amem,kmem ! index of angle and wave number in grid
6310  real aa1,aa3,kk1,kk3 ! temporary wave number variables
6311 !
6312  integer nzloc ! counter for non-zero contributions along locus
6313  integer nztot1,nztot2 ! total number of zero and non-zero points on locus
6314  integer ik2,ia2 ! index of wave number k2
6315  integer ik4,ia4 ! index of wave number k4
6316 !
6317  real wk,wa ! weights
6318  real w1k2,w2k2,w3k2,w4k2 ! interpolation weights
6319  real w1k4,w2k4,w3k4,w4k4 ! interpolation weights
6320 !
6321  real ka,kb ! lower and higher wave number magnitude
6322  real km ! wave number at mid point
6323  real kw ! half width of locus
6324 !
6325  real tfac ! combined tail factor
6326 !
6327  logical lwrite ! indicator if binary interaction grid has been written successfully
6328  real smax ! maximum s-value
6329 !
6330  real, allocatable :: xloc(:),yloc(:)
6331  real qq
6332 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6333  call q_stack('+q_makegrid')
6334 !
6335 ! initializations
6336 !
6337  lwrite = .false.
6338  nztot1 = 0
6339  nztot2 = 0
6340 !%
6341  quad_nloc = -1 ! number of points on all loci
6342 !%
6343  if(allocated(xloc)) deallocate(xloc) ; allocate (xloc(mlocus))
6344  if(allocated(yloc)) deallocate(yloc) ; allocate (yloc(mlocus))
6345 !
6346 ! write header to grid file
6347 !
6348 !
6349 ! set range of do loops for computing interaction grid
6350 !
6351  if(iq_geom==0 .or. iq_disp/=1) then
6352  nkq1 = nkq ! loop over all k1 wave numbers, since no geometric scaling can be used
6353  else
6354  nkq1 = 1 ! use only first wave number for k1, since geometric scaling can be used
6355  end if
6356 !
6357  jaq1 = 1 ! index of direction of k1 in grid matrix
6358 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6359 ! compute components of reference wave number,
6360 ! for setting up interaction grid
6361 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6362  do ikq1=1,nkq1
6363 !
6364  if(iq_screen==2) write(iscreen,*) 'k1-ring:',ikq1
6365 !
6366  aa1 = q_ad(iaref)
6367  kk1 = q_k(ikq1)
6368  krefx = kk1*cos(q_ad(iaref)*dera)
6369  krefy = kk1*sin(q_ad(iaref)*dera)
6370 !
6371  k1x = krefx
6372  k1y = krefy
6373 !
6374  if(iq_test >=1) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,2x,2f8.4)') &
6375  'Q_MAKEGRID: ik1,krefx,krefy:',ikq1,krefx,krefy
6376 
6377  do ikq3 = ikq1,nkq !
6378  if(iq_screen==2) write(iscreen,*) 'k1-k3 indices:',ikq1,ikq3
6379 !
6380  kk3 = q_k(ikq3)
6381 !
6382  if(iq_test >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,3f12.6)') &
6383  'Q_MAKEGRID: kk1 kk3 kk3/kk1:',kk1,kk3,kk3/kk1
6384 !
6385  do iaq3 = iag1,iag2
6386 !
6387  if(iaq3 == iag1 .and. ikq3 == ikq1) cycle
6388 !
6389  aa3 = q_ad(iaq3)
6390  k3x = kk3*cos(aa3*dera)
6391  k3y = kk3*sin(aa3*dera)
6392 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6393 ! compute locus for a specified combination of k1 and k3
6394 !
6395  if(iq_test > 1) then
6396  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f10.4,2i4)') &
6397  'Q_MAKEGRID: k3 a3 ikq3 iaq3: ',kk3,aa3,ikq3,iaq3
6398  write(luq_tst,'(a,4f11.5)') &
6399  'Q_MAKEGRID: k1x/y k3x/y :',k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y
6400  end if
6401 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
6402  ia_k1 = iaq1; ik_k1 = ikq1
6403  ia_k3 = iaq3; ik_k3 = ikq3
6404  call q_cmplocus(ka,kb,km,kw,crf1)
6405 !
6406  if(iq_err/=0) goto 9999
6407 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6408 ! redistibute or filter data points along locus
6409 !
6410  call q_modify
6411  if(iq_err > 0) goto 9999
6412 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6413 ! compute weights for interpolation in computational grid
6414 !
6415  call q_weight
6416  if(iq_err > 0) goto 9999
6417 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6418 ! special storing mechanism for interactions per combination of k1 and k3
6419 !
6420  kmem = (ikq3-ikq1+1) - (ikq1-2*nkq-2)*(ikq1-1)/2;
6421  jaq3 = iaq3-iaref+1 ! ensure that data stored in matrix start at index (1,1)
6422  amem = jaq3 ! index of direction
6423 !
6424 !
6425 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6426 ! Convert real indices to integer indexing and real weights
6427 !
6428 ! 3-----------4 ja2p w1 = (1-wk)*(1-wa)
6429 ! | . | w2 = wk*(1-wa)
6430 ! |. . + . . .| wa2 A w3 = (1-wk)*wa
6431 ! | . | | w4 = wk*wa
6432 ! | . | wa
6433 ! | . | |
6434 ! 1-----------2 ja2 V
6435 ! jk2 wk2 jk2p
6436 !
6437 ! <-wk->
6438 !
6439 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6440  nzloc = 0
6441 !
6442  do iloc = 1,nlocus
6443 !
6444  ik2 = floor(wk_k2(iloc))
6445  ia2 = floor(wa_k2(iloc))
6446  wk = wk_k2(iloc)-real(ik2)
6447  wa = wa_k2(iloc)-real(ia2)
6448  w1k2 = (1.-wk)*(1.-wa)
6449  w2k2 = wk*(1.-wa)
6450  w3k2 = (1.-wk)*wa
6451  w4k2 = wk*wa
6452 !
6453  ik4 = floor(wk_k4(iloc))
6454  ia4 = floor(wa_k4(iloc))
6455  wk = wk_k4(iloc)-real(ik4)
6456  wa = wa_k4(iloc)-real(ia4)
6457  w1k4 = (1.-wk)*(1.-wa)
6458  w2k4 = wk*(1.-wa)
6459  w3k4 = (1.-wk)*wa
6460  w4k4 = wk*wa
6461 
6462  if(iq_interp==2) then
6463  call q_nearest(ik2,ia2,w1k2,w2k2,w3k2,w4k2)
6464  call q_nearest(ik4,ia4,w1k4,w2k4,w3k4,w4k4)
6465  end if
6466 !
6467 ! Take care of points that lie below lowest wave number
6468 ! when no geometric scaling is applied, then modify weights
6469 ! such that directional position is retained
6470 !
6471  if(iq_geom==0) then
6472  if(ik2 ==0) then
6473  ik2 = 1
6474  w1k2 = w1k2 + w2k2
6475  w2k2 = 0.
6476  w3k2 = w3k2 + w4k2
6477  w4k2 = 0.
6478  end if
6479  if(ik4 ==0) then
6480  ik4 = 1
6481  w1k4 = w1k4 + w2k4
6482  w2k4 = 0.
6483  w3k4 = w3k4 + w4k4
6484  w4k4 = 0.
6485  end if
6486  end if
6487 !
6488 ! compute combined tail factor and product of coupling coefficient, step size,
6489 ! symmetry factor, and tail factor divided by jacobian
6490 !
6491  tfac = wt_k2(iloc)*wt_k4(iloc)
6492  quad_zz(kmem,amem,iloc) = cple_mod(iloc)*ds_mod(iloc)* &
6493  sym_mod(iloc)/jac_mod(iloc)
6494 !
6495 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6496 ! compact data by elimating zero-contribution on locus
6497 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6498 !
6499  if(iq_compact==1 .and. &
6500  abs(quad_zz(kmem,amem,iloc)) > 1.e-15) then
6501  nzloc = nzloc + 1
6502  jloc = nzloc
6503  nztot1 = nztot1 + 1
6504  else
6505  jloc = iloc
6506  end if
6507  nztot2 = nztot2 + 1
6508 !
6509 ! shift data
6510 !
6511  quad_zz(kmem,amem,jloc) = quad_zz(kmem,amem,iloc)
6512 !
6513  quad_ik2(kmem,amem,jloc) = ik2 ! lower wave number index of k2
6514  quad_ia2(kmem,amem,jloc) = ia2 ! lower direction index of k2
6515  quad_ik4(kmem,amem,jloc) = ik4 ! lower wave number index of k4
6516  quad_ia4(kmem,amem,jloc) = ia4 ! lower direction index of k4
6517 !
6518  quad_w1k2(kmem,amem,jloc) = w1k2 ! weight 1 of k2
6519  quad_w2k2(kmem,amem,jloc) = w2k2 ! weight 2 of k2
6520  quad_w3k2(kmem,amem,jloc) = w3k2 ! weight 3 of k2
6521  quad_w4k2(kmem,amem,jloc) = w4k2 ! weight 4 of k2
6522 !
6523  quad_w1k4(kmem,amem,jloc) = w1k4 ! weight 1 of k4
6524  quad_w2k4(kmem,amem,jloc) = w2k4 ! weight 2 of k4
6525  quad_w3k4(kmem,amem,jloc) = w3k4 ! weight 3 of k4
6526  quad_w4k4(kmem,amem,jloc) = w4k4 ! weight 4 of k4
6527 !
6528  quad_t2(kmem,amem,jloc) = wt_k2(iloc) ! tail factor for k2
6529  quad_t4(kmem,amem,jloc) = wt_k4(iloc) ! tail factor for k4
6530 !
6531  quad_cple(kmem,amem,jloc) = cple_mod(iloc)
6532  quad_jac(kmem,amem,jloc) = jac_mod(iloc)
6533  quad_sym(kmem,amem,jloc) = sym_mod(iloc)
6534  quad_ws(kmem,amem,jloc) = ds_mod(iloc)
6535 !
6536  end do
6537 !
6538  if(iq_compact==1) then
6539  quad_nloc(kmem,amem) = nzloc ! store compacted number of points on locus
6540  else
6541  quad_nloc(kmem,amem) = nlocus ! store number of points on locus
6542  nzloc = nlocus
6543  end if
6544 !
6545 ! write(luq_prt,'(a,4i5)') 'Q_MAKEGRID kmem amem nlocus:',kmem,amem,nlocus,nzloc
6546 !
6547  end do
6548  end do
6549  end do
6550 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6551 ! Write locus information to binary file
6552 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6553 !
6554  write(luq_bqf) q_header
6555 !
6556 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6557 ! spectral interaction grid
6558 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6559 !
6560  write(luq_bqf) naq,nkq
6561  write(luq_bqf) q_sig
6562  write(luq_bqf) q_ad
6563  write(luq_bqf) iq_geom,iq_disp,iq_geom
6564  write(luq_bqf) q_depth
6565 !
6566 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6567 ! interaction grid
6568 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6569 !
6570  write(luq_bqf) quad_nloc
6571  write(luq_bqf) quad_ik2
6572  write(luq_bqf) quad_ia2
6573  write(luq_bqf) quad_ik4
6574  write(luq_bqf) quad_ia4
6575  write(luq_bqf) quad_w1k2
6576  write(luq_bqf) quad_w2k2
6577  write(luq_bqf) quad_w3k2
6578  write(luq_bqf) quad_w4k2
6579  write(luq_bqf) quad_w1k4
6580  write(luq_bqf) quad_w2k4
6581  write(luq_bqf) quad_w3k4
6582  write(luq_bqf) quad_w4k4
6583  write(luq_bqf) quad_zz
6584  write(luq_bqf) quad_t2
6585  write(luq_bqf) quad_t4
6586 !
6587  write(luq_bqf) quad_jac
6588  write(luq_bqf) quad_cple
6589  write(luq_bqf) quad_sym
6590  write(luq_bqf) quad_ws
6591 !
6592  lwrite = .true.
6593  lastquadfile = bqname
6594 !
6595  if(iq_screen >= 1 .and. iq_test>=1) write(iscreen,'(2a)') &
6596  'Q_MAKEGRID: LASTQUADFILE: ',lastquadfile
6597 !
6598  9999 continue
6599 !
6600  if(allocated(xloc)) deallocate(xloc,yloc)
6601 !
6602 ! check if BQF file has been written succesfully
6603 ! if not, deleted both the AQFILE and BQFILE
6604 !
6605  if(.not. lwrite) then
6606  close(luq_bqf,status='delete')
6607  if(iq_log > 0) then
6608  write(luq_log,*)
6609  write(luq_log,'(5a)') &
6610  'Q_MAKEGRID: Grid files ',trim(aqname),' and ',trim(bqname), &
6611  ' deleted'
6612  write(luq_log,'(a)') &
6613  'Q_MAKEGRID: Since an error occurred during the generation'
6614  write(luq_log,'(a)') 'Q_MAKEGRID: of the interaction grid'
6615  end if
6616  end if
6617 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6618 ! write statistics of compacting to print file
6619 !
6620  if(iq_prt >=1) then
6621  if(iq_compact==0) nztot1 = nztot2
6622  write(luq_prt,'(a,i10)') &
6623  'Q_MAKEGRID: Total number of points on loci :',nztot2
6624  write(luq_prt,'(a,i10)') &
6625  'Q_MAKEGRID: Total number of stored points on locus:',nztot1
6626  write(luq_prt,'(a,i10)') &
6627  'Q_MAKEGRID: Total number of zero points on locus :', &
6628  nztot2-nztot1
6629  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2)') &
6630  'Q_MAKEGRID: Reduction factor (%):',real(nztot2-nztot1)/ &
6631  real(nztot2)*100.
6632  end if
6633 !
6634  call q_stack('-q_makegrid')
6635 !
6636  return
6637  end subroutine
6638 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6639  subroutine q_modify
6640 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6641 !
6642 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
6643 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
6644 ! | +---+
6645 ! | | +---+ Last update: 11 June 2003
6646 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
6647 ! +---+
6648 !
6649 !
6650 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
6651 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
6652 !
6653 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
6654 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
6655 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
6656 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
6657 !
6658 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
6659 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
6660 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
6661 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
6662 !
6663 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
6664 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
6665 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
6666 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
6667 !
6668 !
6669 ! do not use m_xnldata
6670  use m_constants
6671  use serv_xnl4v5
6672  implicit none
6673 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6674 ! 0. Update history
6675 !
6676 ! 9/04/1999 Initial version
6677 ! 13/04/1999 New intermediate variables *_mod introduced
6678 ! 11/10/1999 Check on error messages in interpolation added
6679 ! 18/10/1999 Bug fixed in assigning new ds values to array DS_MOD
6680 ! 27/10/1999 Checked added on allocated of SOLD
6681 ! 8/12/1999 Test output added
6682 ! 29/12/1999 Bug fixed in assigning DS_MOD for first and last point on locus
6683 ! 1/10/2001 Components of k4-locus added
6684 ! No interpolation and modification if q==0
6685 ! 9/08/2002 Upgrade to version 4.0
6686 ! 15/08/2002 Step sizing improved
6687 ! 4/06/2003 Bug fixed in computing slen (length of locus)
6688 ! Locus closed to enable interpolation to finer resolution
6689 ! 6/06/2003 Activate output to XDIA configuration file
6690 ! 10/06/2003 Conversion to new indexing and lumping debugged
6691 ! 11/06/2003 Call to subroutine Q_SYMMETRY added
6692 !
6693 ! 1. Purpose:
6694 !
6695 ! Modify points along the locus, such that they are evenly distributed
6696 ! Only when intented, i.e. when IQ_LOCUS==2
6697 !
6698 ! 2. Method
6699 !
6700 ! Compute new spacing along locus
6701 ! Redistribute points and coefficient at new spacing using linear interpolation
6702 ! Output DIA configuration when also lumping active
6703 !
6704 ! If no redistribution is needed, then copy relevant data
6705 !
6706 ! 3. Parameter list:
6707 !
6708 ! Name I/O Type Description
6709 !
6710 ! 4. Error messages
6711 !
6712 ! 5. Called by:
6713 !
6714 ! Q_CMPLOCUS
6715 !
6716 ! 6. Subroutines used
6717 !
6718 ! Q_STACK
6719 ! Q_SYMMETRY
6720 ! Z_INTP1
6721 !
6722 ! 7. Remarks
6723 !
6724 ! 8. structure
6725 !
6726 ! 9. Switches
6727 !
6728 ! 10. Source code
6729 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6730 ! Local parameters
6731 !
6732  integer ierr,jerr ! error indicators
6733  integer nold,nnew ! old and new number of points on locus
6734  integer iold,inew ! counter for loop along points
6735  integer iloc ! counter for loop along locus
6736  integer jloc ! counter for loop over lumped locus
6737  integer itest ! local test level, by default equal to IQ_TEST
6738 !
6739  real k2a,k2m ! angle (deg) and wave number magnitude of wave number k2
6740  real k4a,k4m ! angle (deg) and wave number magnitude of wave number k4
6741  real w2,w4 ! radian frequencies of wave numbers
6742 !
6743 !
6744  real dk13,dk14 ! difference wave number
6745  real dsnew,slen ! new step size and length of locus
6746  real zero ! 0
6747  real q_eps ! accuracy to distinguish special case, with q=0
6748  real diold ! 'real' old number of indices between succeeding lumped bins
6749  real dinew ! 'real' new number of indices between succeeding lumped bins
6750 !
6751 !! real x_disper ! evaluate dispersion relation
6752  real, allocatable :: sold(:) ! old coordinate along locus
6753  real, allocatable :: snew(:) ! new coordinate along locus
6754 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
6755  call q_stack('+q_modify')
6756 !
6757 ! initialisations
6758 !
6759  zero = 0.
6760  q_eps = 1.e-5
6761  itest = iq_test
6762 !
6763 ! itest = 1 ! set local test level for test purposes
6764 !
6765  if(itest>=1) then
6766  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: iq_mod :',iq_mod
6767  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: iq_xdia :',iq_xdia
6768  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: iq_lump :',iq_lump
6769  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: iq_gauleg:',iq_gauleg
6770  end if
6771 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6772 ! do not modify data when IQ_MOD==0
6773 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6774 !
6775  if(iq_mod==0) then
6776  nlocus = nlocus1
6777  x2_mod = x2_loc
6778  y2_mod = y2_loc
6779  x4_mod = x4_loc
6780  y4_mod = y4_loc
6781  s_mod = s_loc
6782  ds_mod = ds_loc
6783  jac_mod = jac_loc
6784  cple_mod = cple_loc
6785  call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_mod,y4_mod,sym_mod,nlocus)
6786  else
6787 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6788 ! Modify spacing along locus
6789 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6790  nold = nlocus1
6791 !
6792 ! close locus by adding one point, equal to first point
6793 ! only for normal locus
6794 !
6795  if(abs(q)>q_eps) nold = nold+1
6796 !
6797 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6798 ! Determine new number of points along locus
6799 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6800 !
6801  if(iq_gauleg > 0) then
6802  nnew = iq_gauleg
6803  elseif(iq_lump > 0) then
6804  nnew = iq_lump
6805  else
6806  nnew = nlocus0
6807  end if
6808 !
6809  if(itest>=1) write(luq_tst,'(a,2i4)') &
6810  'Q_MODIFY nold nnew:',nlocus1,nnew
6811 !
6812  allocate (sold(nold),snew(nnew))
6813 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6814 ! Compute circumference of locus, distinguish 2 case, open or closed
6815 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6816 !
6817  if(abs(q)<q_eps) then
6818  slen = s_loc(nold)
6819  sold = s_loc
6820  else
6821  slen = 0
6822  do iold=1,nold-1 ! loop length minus one, since locus is closed
6823  sold(iold) = s_loc(iold)
6824  slen = slen + ds_loc(iold)
6825  end do
6826 !
6827 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6828 ! close locus by copying first value in last value
6829 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6830 !
6831  sold(nold) = slen
6832  x2_loc(nold) = x2_loc(1)
6833  y2_loc(nold) = y2_loc(1)
6834  x4_loc(nold) = x4_loc(1)
6835  y4_loc(nold) = y4_loc(1)
6836  jac_loc(nold) = jac_loc(1)
6837  cple_loc(nold) = cple_loc(1)
6838  end if
6839 !
6840 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6841 ! compute new spacing along loci and coordinates along locus
6842 ! Gauss-Legendre integration
6843 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6844 !
6845  if(iq_gauleg > 0) then
6846  if(iq_gauleg > nnew) stop 'Q_MODIFY: iq_gauleg > nlocus0'
6847  nnew = iq_gauleg
6848  call y_gauleg(zero,slen,snew,ds_mod,nnew)
6849 !
6850  if( itest >=1) then
6851  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f10.4,i4)') &
6852  'Q_MODIFY: GAULEG x1,x2,n:',zero,slen,nnew
6853  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: Gauss-Legendre spacing'
6854  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.4)') (snew(inew),inew=1,nnew)
6855  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: Gauss-Legendre weights'
6856  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.4)') (ds_mod(inew),inew=1,nnew)
6857  end if
6858  else
6859  if(abs(q)>q_eps) then
6860  dsnew = slen/real(nnew)
6861  do inew=1,nnew
6862  snew(inew) = (inew-1.)*dsnew
6863  end do
6864  else
6865  dsnew = slen/real(nnew-1.)
6866  do inew=1,nnew
6867  snew(inew) = (inew-1)*dsnew
6868  end do
6869  end if
6870  ds_mod = dsnew
6871  end if
6872 !
6873  if(itest >= 1) then
6874  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f12.5)') 'Q_MODIFY: Slen q:',slen,q
6875  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: nold /sold:',nold
6876  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.6)') sold
6877  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4)') 'Q_MODIFY: nnew /snew:',nnew
6878  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.6)') snew
6879  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: x2_loc'
6880  write(luq_tst,'(10f13.5)') (x2_loc(iloc), iloc=1,nold)
6881  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: y2_loc'
6882  write(luq_tst,'(10f13.5)') (y2_loc(iloc), iloc=1,nold)
6883  end if
6884 !
6885  jerr = 0
6886 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6887 ! Compute characteristics of locus for special case q=0
6888 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6889 !
6890  if(abs(q)<1.e-5) then
6891  call z_intp1(sold,x2_loc,snew,x2_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6892  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6893  jerr = jerr + ierr
6894 !
6895  call z_intp1(sold,y2_loc,snew,y2_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6896  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6897  jerr = jerr + ierr
6898  !
6899  call z_intp1(sold,x4_loc,snew,x4_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6900  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6901  jerr = jerr + ierr
6902 !
6903  call z_intp1(sold,y4_loc,snew,y4_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6904  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6905  jerr = jerr + ierr
6906 !
6907  call z_intp1(sold,s_loc,snew,s_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6908  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6909  jerr = jerr + ierr
6910 !
6911  call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_mod,y4_mod,sym_mod,nnew)
6912 !
6913 ! --- lumping along locus --------------------------------------------
6914 !
6915  if(iq_lump>0) then
6916  diold = slen/real(nold)
6917  dinew = slen/real(nnew)
6918  ds_mod = 0.
6919  call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_loc,y4_loc,sym_loc,nold)
6920 !
6921  do iloc=1,nlocus1
6922  jloc = floor((iloc-1.)*diold/dinew)+1
6923  ds_mod(jloc) = ds_mod(jloc) + cple_loc(iloc)* &
6924  ds_loc(iloc)/jac_loc(iloc)*sym_loc(iloc)
6925  if(itest>=1) &
6926  write(luq_tst,'(a,2i4,f8.3,3e12.4,f4.0,e12.4)') &
6927  'Q_MODIFY Q=0 iloc,jloc s jac cple ds sym ds_mod:',&
