6928  iloc,jloc,s_loc(iloc),jac_loc(iloc),cple_loc(iloc), &
6929  ds_loc(iloc),sym_loc(iloc),ds_mod(jloc)
6930  jac_mod(jloc) = 1.
6931  cple_mod(jloc) = 1.
6932  end do
6933 !
6934  sym_mod = 1 ! symmetry already taken account in lumping proces
6935 !
6936 ! --- No lumping -------------------------------------------------------------
6937 !
6938  else
6939  call z_intp1(sold,jac_loc,snew,jac_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6940  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 jac_loc, ierr=',ierr
6941  jerr = jerr + ierr
6942 !
6943  call z_intp1(sold,cple_loc,snew,cple_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6944  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 cp_loc, ierr=',ierr
6945  jerr = jerr + ierr
6946  end if
6947 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6948 ! compute characteristics for closed locus
6949 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6950  else
6951  call z_intp1(sold,x2_loc,snew,x2_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6952  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6953  jerr = jerr + ierr
6954 !
6955  call z_intp1(sold,y2_loc,snew,y2_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6956  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 y_loc, ierr=',ierr
6957  jerr = jerr + ierr
6958 !
6959  call z_intp1(sold,x4_loc,snew,x4_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6960  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 x_loc, ierr=',ierr
6961  jerr = jerr + ierr
6962 !
6963  call z_intp1(sold,y4_loc,snew,y4_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6964  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 y_loc, ierr=',ierr
6965  jerr = jerr + ierr
6966 !
6967  call z_intp1(sold,s_loc,snew,s_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
6968  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 s_loc, ierr=',ierr
6969  jerr = jerr + ierr
6970 !
6971  if(itest>=1) then
6972  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: s_loc'
6973  write(luq_tst,'(10f13.5)') (s_loc(iloc), iloc=1,nold)
6974  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: s_mod'
6975  write(luq_tst,'(10f13.5)') (s_mod(iloc), iloc=1,nold)
6976  end if
6977 !
6978  call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_mod,y4_mod,sym_mod,nnew)
6979 !
6980 ! ----- Lumping along locus -----------------------------------
6981 !
6982  if(iq_lump>0) then
6983  diold = slen/real(nold-1)
6984  dinew = slen/real(nnew)
6985  ds_mod = 0.
6986  call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_loc,y4_loc,sym_loc,nold)
6987 !
6988  do iloc=1,nold-1
6989  jloc = floor((iloc-1.)*diold/dinew + 1.49999)
6990  jloc = mod(jloc-1+nnew,nnew)+1
6991  ds_mod(jloc) = ds_mod(jloc) + cple_loc(iloc)* &
6992  ds_loc(iloc)/jac_loc(iloc)*sym_loc(iloc)
6993  if(itest>=1) &
6994  write(luq_tst,'(a,2i4,f8.3,3e12.4,f4.0,e12.4)') &
6995  'Q_MODIFY: q>0: iloc,jloc, s jac cple ds sym ds_mod:', &
6996  iloc,jloc,s_loc(iloc),jac_loc(iloc),cple_loc(iloc), &
6997  ds_loc(iloc),sym_loc(iloc),ds_mod(jloc)
6998  jac_mod(jloc) = 1.
6999  cple_mod(jloc) = 1.
7000  end do
7001 !
7002  sym_mod = 1 ! symmetry already taken account in lumping proces
7003 !
7004 !------------ No lumping along locus --------------------------------
7005 !
7006  else
7007  call z_intp1(sold,jac_loc,snew,jac_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
7008  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 jac_loc, ierr=',ierr
7009  jerr = jerr + ierr
7010 !
7011  call z_intp1(sold,cple_loc,snew,cple_mod,nold,nnew,ierr)
7012  if(ierr > 0) write(luq_err,*) 'Z_INTP1 cp_loc, ierr=',ierr
7013  jerr = jerr + ierr
7014  end if
7015 !
7016  if(jerr > 0) then
7017  iq_err = iq_err + 1
7018  call q_error('e','INTER','Problem in interpolation process')
7019  goto 9999
7020  end if
7021  end if
7022 !
7023  nlocus = nnew
7024 !
7025  end if
7026 !
7027 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7028 !
7029  if(itest >= 1) then
7030  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: x2_mod'
7031  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (x2_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7032  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: y2_mod'
7033  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (y2_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7034  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: x4_mod'
7035  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (x4_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7036  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: y4_mod'
7037  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (y4_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7038  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: s_mod'
7039  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (s_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7040  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: ds_loc'
7041  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (ds_loc(iloc),iloc=1,nold)
7042  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: ds_mod'
7043  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (ds_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7044  end if
7045 !
7046 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7047 !
7048 !! compute symmetry factor for reducing computational load
7049 !!
7050 !!call q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,x4_mod,y4_mod,sym,nnew)
7051 !!
7052  do iloc=1,nlocus
7053  k2x = x2_mod(iloc)
7054  k2y = y2_mod(iloc)
7055  k4x = x4_mod(iloc)
7056  k4y = y4_mod(iloc)
7057 !
7058  k2m = sqrt(k2x**2 + k2y**2)
7059  k4m = sqrt(k4x**2 + k4y**2)
7060  k2a = atan2(k2y,k2x)*rade
7061  k4a = atan2(k4y,k4x)*rade
7062 !
7063  k2m_mod(iloc) = k2m
7064  k4m_mod(iloc) = k4m
7065  k2a_mod(iloc) = k2a
7066  k4a_mod(iloc) = k4a
7067 !
7068 !
7069 !
7070  end do
7071 !
7072  if(itest >= 1) then
7073  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: k2m_mod'
7074  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (k2m_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7075  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: k2a_mod'
7076  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (k2a_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7077  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: k4m_mod'
7078  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (k4m_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7079  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: k4a_mod'
7080  write(luq_tst,'(10f12.5)') (k4a_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7081  write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_MODIFY: sym_mod'
7082  write(luq_tst,'(20f3.0)') (sym_mod(iloc),iloc=1,nlocus)
7083  end if
7084 !
7085  9999 continue
7086 !
7087  if(allocated(sold)) deallocate(sold,snew)
7088 !
7089  call q_stack('-q_modify')
7090 !
7091  return
7092  end subroutine
7093 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7094  subroutine q_nearest(ik,ia,w1,w2,w3,w4)
7095 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7096 !
7097 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
7098 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
7099 ! | +---+
7100 ! | | +---+ Last update: 29 April 2004
7101 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
7102 ! +---+
7103 !
7104 !
7105 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
7106 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
7107 !
7108 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
7109 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
7110 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
7111 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
7112 !
7113 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
7114 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
7115 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
7116 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
7117 !
7118 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
7119 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
7120 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
7121 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
7122 !
7123 !
7124 ! do not use m_xnldata
7125  implicit none
7126 !
7127 ! 0. Update history
7128 !
7129 ! 19/08/2002 Initial version
7130 ! 18/04/2003 Range of k-index limited
7131 ! 29/04/2004 Names of integer variables changes
7132 !
7133 ! 1. Purpose:
7134 !
7135 ! Compute corner point of spectral bin which is nearest to
7136 ! given bin
7137 !
7138 !
7139 ! 2. Method
7140 !
7141 ! The indexing is as in figure
7142 !
7143 !
7144 ! (ik,ia+1) (ik+1,ia+1)
7145 ! 3-----------4
7146 ! | . |
7147 ! |. . + . . .|
7148 ! | . |
7149 ! | . |
7150 ! | . |
7151 ! 1-----------2
7152 ! (ik,ia) (ik+1,ia)
7153 !
7154 ! Check all four corner points which has the maximum weight
7155 !
7156 ! 3. Parameter list:
7157 !
7158 !Type I/O name description
7159 !-------------------------------------------------------
7160  integer, intent(inout) :: ik ! Index of wave number
7161  integer, intent(inout) :: ia ! index of angle
7162  real, intent(inout) :: w1 ! weight of first corner point
7163  real, intent(inout) :: w2 ! weight of second corner point
7164  real, intent(inout) :: w3 ! weight of third corner point
7165  real, intent(inout) :: w4 ! weight of fourth corner point
7166 !
7167 ! 4. Error messages
7168 !
7169 ! 5. Called by
7170 !
7171 ! Q_MAKEGRID
7172 !
7173 ! 6. Subroutines used
7174 !
7175 ! 7. Remarks
7176 !
7177 ! 8. Structure
7178 !
7179 ! 9. Switches
7180 !
7181 ! 10. Source code
7182 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7183 ! Local parameters
7184 !
7185  integer ik_max ! k-index with maximum weight
7186  integer ia_max ! theta index with maximum weight
7187  integer iw_max ! index with highest weight
7188  real w_max ! maximum weight
7189 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7190  if(iq_test>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,2i4,4f10.5)') &
7191  'Q_NEAREST-A:',ik,ia,w1,w2,w3,w4
7192 !
7193  w_max = 0.
7194  ik_max = ik
7195  ia_max = ia
7196  iw_max = 1
7197 !
7198  if(w1 >= w_max) then
7199  iw_max = 1
7200  w_max = w1
7201  ik_max = ik
7202  ia_max = ia
7203  end if
7204 !
7205  if(w2 >= w_max) then
7206  iw_max = 2
7207  w_max = w2
7208  ik_max = ik+1
7209  ia_max = ia
7210  end if
7211 !
7212  if(w3 >= w_max) then
7213  iw_max = 3
7214  w_max = w3
7215  ik_max = ik
7216  ia_max = ia+1
7217  end if
7218 !
7219  if(w4 >= w_max) then
7220  iw_max = 4
7221  w_max = w4
7222  ik_max = ik+1
7223  ia_max = ia+1
7224  end if
7225 !
7226  w1 = 0.0
7227  w2 = 0.0
7228  w3 = 0.0
7229  w4 = 0.0
7230 !
7231  ik = ik_max
7232  ia = ia_max
7233 !
7234 ! 18/04/2003 Limit range of nearest k-indices
7235 !
7236  ik = min(ik,nkq)
7237  ik = max(1,ik)
7238 !
7239  if(iw_max==1) w1 = 1.0
7240  if(iw_max==2) w2 = 1.0
7241  if(iw_max==3) w3 = 1.0
7242  if(iw_max==4) w4 = 1.0
7243 !
7244  if(iq_test>=2) then
7245  write(luq_tst,'(a,2i4,4f10.5)') 'Q_NEAREST-B:',ik,ia,w1,w2,w3,w4
7246  write(luq_tst,*)
7247  end if
7248 !
7249  return
7250  end subroutine
7251 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7252  subroutine q_polar2(kmin,kmax,kx_beg,ky_beg,kx_end,ky_end,loclen, &
7253  ierr)
7254 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7255 !
7256 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
7257 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
7258 ! | +---+
7259 ! | | +---+ Last update: 8 Aug. 2003
7260 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
7261 ! +---+
7262 !
7263 !
7264 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
7265 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
7266 !
7267 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
7268 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
7269 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
7270 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
7271 !
7272 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
7273 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
7274 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
7275 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
7276 !
7277 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
7278 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
7279 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
7280 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
7281 !
7282 !
7283 ! do not use m_xnldata
7284  use m_constants
7285  use serv_xnl4v5, only: z_wnumb
7286 !
7287  implicit none
7288 !
7289 ! 0. Update history
7290 !
7291 ! Date Description
7292 !
7293 ! 03/12/1999 Initial version
7294 ! 09/08/2002 Geometric spacing of k added
7295 ! Upgrade to release 4.0
7296 ! 13/08/2002 reorganisation of loops generating points on locus
7297 ! 08/08/2003 Check included for maximum number of IPOL by using MPOL
7298 ! MPOL=MLOCUS/2+1-1 (-1 added regarding IPOL=IPOL+1 in Q_MODIFY)
7299 ! Check included on ARG=0 for IQ_LOCUS=2 and parameter dke added
7300 !
7301 ! 1. Purpose:
7302 !
7303 ! Compute position of locus for given k1-k3 vector
7304 !
7305 ! 2. Method
7306 !
7307 ! Explicit polar method, see Van Vledder 2000, Monterey paper
7308 ! Optionally using a fixed k-step, geometric k-step or adaptive stepping
7309 !
7310 ! 3. Parameters used:
7311 !
7312 !Type I/O Name Description
7313 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7314  real, intent(in) :: kmin ! minimum wave number on locus
7315  real, intent(in) :: kmax ! maximum wave number on locus
7316  real, intent(in) :: kx_beg ! x-coordinate of begin point
7317  real, intent(in) :: ky_beg ! y-coordinate of begin point
7318  real, intent(in) :: kx_end ! x-coordinate of end point
7319  real, intent(in) :: ky_end ! y-coordinate of end point
7320  real, intent(in) :: loclen ! estimated length of locus
7321  integer, intent (out) :: ierr ! error condition
7322 !
7323 ! Parameters with module
7324 !
7325 ! nlocus0 Preferred number of points on locus
7326 ! q w1-w3, difference of radian frequencies
7327 ! pmag |k1-k3| (vector form)
7328 ! pdir direction of difference vector k1-k3
7329 !
7330 ! 4. Error messages
7331 !
7332 ! 5. Called by:
7333 !
7334 ! Q_CPMLOCUS
7335 !
7336 ! 6. Subroutines used:
7337 !
7338 ! X_COSK
7339 !
7340 ! 7. Remarks
7341 !
7342 ! The type of locus computation is controlled by the parameter IQ_LOCUS
7343 ! Set in Q_SETCFG
7344 !
7345 ! 8. Structure
7346 !
7347 ! 9. Switches
7348 !
7349 ! /S enable subroutine tracing
7350 ! /T enable test output
7351 !
7352 ! 10. Source code
7353 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7354 ! Local variabels
7355 !
7356  integer ipol ! counter
7357  integer jpol ! counter
7358  integer iend ! indicates end of locus computation
7359  integer ipass ! counter for passes
7360  integer npol ! number of points on locus
7361  integer npass ! number of passes in iteration process
7362  integer mpol ! maximum number of points on locus, related to MLOCUS
7363 !
7364  real kold ! temporary wave number
7365  real knew ! temporary wave number
7366  real cosold ! 'old' cosine of angle
7367  real cosnew ! 'new' cosine of angle
7368  real dkpol ! step in wave number
7369  real dkold ! 'old' step in wave number
7370  real ang1 ! 'old' angle
7371  real ang2 ! 'new' angle
7372  real kk1 ! 'old' wave number
7373  real kk2 ! 'new' wave number
7374  real kratio ! ratio between succesive k-values when IQ_LOCUS=3
7375  real arg ! argument
7376  real dk ! step in wave number
7377  real dke ! estimate of new dk
7378  real dsnew ! new step size along locus
7379  real dsz ! estimated step size along locus
7380 !
7381  integer itest ! local test level
7382  integer lutest ! unit number for test output in service routine
7383 !
7384 ! function declarations
7385 !!!real z_wnumb ! compute wave number, via module SERV_XNL4V4
7386 !! real x_disper ! dispersion relation
7387 !
7388 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7389 ! initialisations
7390 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7391  call q_stack('+q_polar2')
7392 !
7393  ierr = 0 ! set error code to zero
7394  npol = (nlocus0+1)/2+1 ! first estimate of number k-values along symmetry axis
7395  mpol = mlocus/2 ! set maximum number of points along locus axis
7396 !
7397 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7398 !
7399  select case(iq_locus)
7400 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7401 ! CASE = 1: Linear spacing of wave numbers along symmetry axis
7402 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7403  case(1)
7404 !
7405  dk = (kmax-kmin)/real(npol-1)
7406  do ipol=1,npol
7407  k_pol(ipol) = kmin + (ipol-1)*dk
7408  c_pol(ipol) = x_cosk(k_pol(ipol))
7409  end do
7410 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7411 ! Case = 2: Variable k-stepping along symmetry axis,
7412 ! such that step along locus is more or less constant
7413 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7414  case(2)
7415 !
7416 ! set first point on locus
7417 !
7418  ipol = 1
7419  k_pol(ipol) = kmin
7420  c_pol(ipol) = -1.
7421  kold = kmin
7422  cosold = -1.
7423 !
7424 ! compute initial step size of polar wave number
7425 !
7426  dk0 = (kmax - kmin)/real(npol) ! estimate of step size of equidistant radii
7427  dsz = loclen/real(nlocus0) ! estimate of step size along locus
7428  npass = 3 ! set number of passes in iteration
7429  dk0 = dk0/2 ! reduce initial step
7430  dk = dk0
7431  iend = 0
7432 !
7433  if(iq_test>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,3f12.6)') &
7434  'Q_POLAR2: loclen dsz dk:',loclen,dsz,dk
7435 !
7436  do while (k_pol(ipol) < kmax .and. iend==0 .and. ipol < mpol)
7437  do ipass=1,npass
7438  knew = min(kmax,k_pol(ipol)+dk)
7439  dkold = knew - k_pol(ipol)
7440  cosnew = x_cosk(knew)
7441  ang1 = pang + acos(cosold)
7442  ang2 = pang + acos(cosnew)
7443  kk1 = kold
7444  kk2 = knew
7445  arg = kk1**2 + kk2**2 -2.*kk1*kk2*cos(ang1-ang2)
7446  dsnew = sqrt(abs(arg))
7447  if(dsnew>0) dke = dk*dsz/dsnew
7448  dk = dke
7449  end do
7450 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7451 ! assign new estimate and check value of IPOL
7452 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7453  ipol = ipol + 1
7454  k_pol(ipol) = k_pol(ipol-1) + dkold
7455  c_pol(ipol) = cosnew
7456  kold = knew
7457  cosold = cosnew
7458  if (abs(dkold) < 0.0005*(kmax-kmin)) iend=1
7459  end do
7460 !
7461 ! fill last bin with coordinates of end point
7462 !
7463  if(k_pol(ipol) < kmax .and. ipol < mpol) then
7464  ipol = ipol + 1
7465  c_pol(ipol) = -1.
7466  k_pol(ipol) = kmax
7467  end if
7468 !
7469 ! update the number of k-points on symmetry axis
7470 !
7471  npol = ipol
7472 !
7473 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7474 ! Case 3: Geometric spacing of wave numbers along symmetry axis
7475 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7476  case(3)
7477  kratio = (kmax/kmin)**(1./(npol-1.))
7478  if(iq_test>=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,3f11.6)') &
7479  'Q_POLAR2: npol kmin kmax kratio:',npol,kmin,kmax,kratio
7480  do ipol=1,npol
7481  k_pol(ipol) = kmin*kratio**(ipol-1.)
7482  c_pol(ipol) = x_cosk(k_pol(ipol))
7483  end do
7484 !
7485  end select
7486 !
7487 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7488 !
7489 ! compute actual number of points on locus
7490 ! this will always be an even number
7491 ! mirror image the second half of the locus
7492 !
7493  nlocus1 = 2*npol-2
7494 !
7495  a_pol(1) = pang + acos(c_pol(1))
7496  c_pol(1) = cos(a_pol(1))
7497 !
7498  do ipol=2,npol
7499  jpol = 2*npol-ipol
7500  a_pol(ipol) = pang + acos(c_pol(ipol))
7501  a_pol(jpol) = pang - acos(c_pol(ipol))
7502  c_pol(jpol) = cos(a_pol(jpol))
7503  k_pol(jpol) = k_pol(ipol)
7504  end do
7505 !
7506 ! compute x- and y-position along locus
7507 !
7508  do ipol=1,nlocus1
7509  x2_loc(ipol) = k_pol(ipol)*cos(a_pol(ipol))
7510  y2_loc(ipol) = k_pol(ipol)*sin(a_pol(ipol))
7511  end do
7512 !
7513  if(iq_test >= 1) then
7514  write(luq_tst,'(a,3i4)') &
7515  'Q_POLAR2: nlocus0 npol nlocus1:',nlocus0,npol,nlocus1
7516  write(luq_tst,'(a,2f12.6,i4)') &
7517  'Q_POLAR2: kmin kmax iq_locus :',kmin,kmax,iq_locus
7518  if(iq_locus==1) write(luq_tst,'(a,f10.4)') &
7519  'Q_POLAR2: dk :',dk
7520  if(iq_locus==3) write(luq_tst,'(a,f10.4)') &
7521  'Q_POLAR2: kratio :',kratio
7522  do ipol=1,nlocus1
7523  write(luq_tst,'(a,i4,4f13.7)') &
7524  'Q_POLAR2: i k(i) a(i) x(i) y(i):',ipol,k_pol(ipol),&
7525  a_pol(ipol),x2_loc(ipol),y2_loc(ipol)
7526  end do
7527  end if
7528 !
7529  9999 continue
7530 !
7531  call q_stack('-q_polar2')
7532 !
7533  return
7534  end subroutine
7535 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7536  subroutine q_setconfig(iquad)
7537 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7538 !
7539 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
7540 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
7541 ! | +---+
7542 ! | | +---+ Last update: 7 May 2004
7543 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
7544 ! +---+
7545 !
7546 !
7547 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
7548 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
7549 !
7550 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
7551 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
7552 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
7553 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
7554 !
7555 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
7556 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
7557 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
7558 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
7559 !
7560 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
7561 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
7562 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
7563 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
7564 !
7565 !
7566 ! do not use m_xnldata
7567  use m_fileio
7568  use serv_xnl4v5
7569 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7570 !
7571  implicit none
7572 
7573 !
7574 ! 0. Update history
7575 !
7576 ! 20/07/1999 Initial version
7577 ! 11/10/1999 Option iq_geom added, consistency checks added
7578 ! 15/10/1999 Option iq_trf added, keyword TRANSF
7579 ! 02/11/1999 Close(LUQCFG) added, implicit none added
7580 ! 08/12/1999 Option IQ_MOD added
7581 ! 24/12/1999 Extra output when *.cfg does not exist, and IQ_PRT=1
7582 ! 08/02/2000 Error message included for IQUAD
7583 ! 12/05/2002 Triplet settings added
7584 ! 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4
7585 ! 19/08/2002 Inclusion of various test option and interpolation
7586 ! 22/08/2002 Switch to compact data included
7587 ! 09/09/2002 Parameter q_dstep added
7588 ! 11/09/2002 Parameter qf_frac added
7589 ! 26/05/2003 Parameter iq_lump added
7590 ! 04/06/2003 Parameter IQ_INT renamed IQ_INTEG
7591 ! Switch IQ_GAULEG added
7592 ! 11/06/2003 name changed from Q_SETCFG to Q_SETCONFIG
7593 ! Parameter IQ_SPACE removed
7594 ! 13/06/2003 Set test output, from XNL_INIT
7595 ! 16/06/2003 Switch IQ_SYM added
7596 ! 09/09/2003 Variable ID_FACMAX added
7597 ! 30/12/2003 Parameters IQ_TAIL and FF_TAIL added
7598 ! 07/05/2004 Switch IQ_DSCALE configurbale via CFG file
7599 ! Parameters FQMAX & FQMIN not configurable via CFG
7600 !
7601 ! 1. Purpose:
7602 !
7603 ! Set settings for computing the nonlinear interactions
7604 ! set optimal basic settings
7605 ! Set some settings based on the value of IQUAD
7606 !
7607 ! 2. Method
7608 !
7609 ! Based on the value of IQUAD a number of settings are preset
7610 ! In the case the file [qbase].CFG exists, this file
7611 ! is analyzed and possibly some settings are reset
7612 !
7613 ! 3. Parameter list:
7614 !
7615 !Type, I/O Name Description
7616 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
7617  integer, intent(in) :: iquad ! Indicator for a specific choice of
7618 ! settings for computing the nonlinear
7619 ! interactions
7620 ! 4. Error messages
7621 !
7622 ! 5. Called by:
7623 !
7624 ! XNL_INIT
7625 !
7626 ! 6. Subroutines used
7627 !
7628 ! 7. Remarks
7629 !
7630 ! IF no valid value for iquad is given, a default choice is
7631 ! specified
7632 !
7633 ! The various options of the setting are specified in the general quads module
7634 !
7635 ! 8. Structure
7636 !
7637 ! 9. Switches
7638 !
7639 ! /S Enable subroutine tracing
7640 !
7641 ! 10. Source code
7642 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7643 ! Local variables
7644 !
7645  integer iend ! indicator for end of file
7646  integer iuerr ! error status of file io
7647  character(len=10) cpar ! character parameter
7648  real rpar ! real parameter
7649 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7650 !
7651  call q_stack('+q_setconfig')
7652 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7653 ! default settings, which always work
7654 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7655  nlocus0 = 30 ! Preferred number of points along locus
7656  id_facmax = 2 ! Factor for depth search in Q_SEARCHGRID
7657  iq_filt = 1 ! switch filtering on
7658  iq_gauleg = 0 ! No Gauss-Legendre interpolation
7659  iq_locus = 2 ! polar method, constant step with adaptive stepping
7660  iq_make = 1 ! make grid at each new run
7661  iq_mod = 1 ! Modify spacing to equidistant spacing of points along locus
7662  iq_compact = 1 ! Do not (yet) compact data along locus
7663  iq_interp = 1 ! bi-linear interpolation
7664  iq_lump = 0 ! no lumping of coefficient along locus
7665  iq_search = 0 ! No search is carried out for nearest quad grid
7666  iq_sym = 1 ! Activate symmetry reduction
7667  iq_tail = 1 ! Activate parametric tail for transfer rate and diagonal term
7668 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7669 ! set settings for special purposes
7670 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7671  iq_xdia = 0 ! Disable output to DIA configuration file
7672 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7673 ! set filtering values for retricting integration space
7674 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7675  qf_krat = 2.5 ! maximum ratio between wave numbers k1 and k3
7676  qf_dmax = 75.0 ! difference in degrees between k1 and k3
7677  qf_frac = 0.1 ! fraction of maximum energy density
7678 !
7679  q_sector = 120. ! set size of half-plane direction sector (120)
7680 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7681 ! setting for parametric tail
7682 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7683  ff_tail = 0.75 ! parametric tail starts at 0.75 of maximum frequency
7684 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7685 !
7686 ! Set specific parameter depending on IQUAD
7687 !
7688 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7689 ! deep water test version
7690 !
7691  if(iquad==1) then
7692  iq_geom = 0 ! apply geometric scaling (Geometric scaling is disabled)
7693  iq_dscale = 0 ! no depth scaling
7694  iq_disp = 1 ! deep water
7695  iq_cple = 1 ! Webb's coupling coefficient
7696 !
7697 ! 'deep' water computation and HH/WAM depth scaling
7698 !
7699  elseif(iquad==2) then
7700  iq_geom = 0 ! apply geometric scaling
7701  iq_dscale = 1 ! put depth scaling on
7702  iq_disp = 1 ! deep water
7703  iq_cple = 1 ! Webb's coupling coefficient
7704 !
7705 ! full finite depth computation of interactions
7706 !
7707  elseif(iquad==3) then
7708  iq_dscale = 0 ! no depth scaling
7709  iq_disp = 2 ! finite depth dispersion relation
7710  iq_geom = 0 ! no geometric scaling
7711  iq_cple = 2 ! finite depth coupling coefficient of H&H
7712  else
7713  if(iq_screen>0) write(iscreen,'(a,i4)') &
7714  'Q_SETCONFIG: iquad=',iquad
7715  call q_error('e','IQUAD', &
7716  'No valid value of iquad has been given, default settings')
7717  write(luq_err,'(a,i4)') 'Q_SETCONFIG: Value of IQUAD:',iquad
7718  goto 9999
7719  end if
7720 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7721 ! Optional test output
7722 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7723  iq_integ = 0 ! No test output of actual integration
7724  iq_trf = 0 ! No test output of transformed loci
7725  iq_t13 = 0 ! No test output of basic integration T13
7726 !
7727 ! set indices for test output of transformation and integration
7728 !
7729  mk1a = 34
7730  mk1b = 35
7731  mk3a = 34
7732  mk3b = 35
7733 !
7734 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7735 ! check if the configuration exists,
7736 ! and if so, override the settings
7737 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7738 !
7739  tempfile = trim(qbase)//'.cfg'
7740  call z_fileio(tempfile,'OF',iufind,luq_cfg,iuerr)
7741  if(luq_cfg > 0) then
7742  if(iq_log >= 1) then
7743  write(luq_log,*)
7744  write(luq_log,'(a)') 'Q_SETCONFIG: Configuration file '// &
7745  trim(qbase)//'.cfg has been found'
7746  write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') 'Q_SETCONFIG: '//trim(qbase)// &
7747  '.cfg connected to :',luq_cfg
7748  end if
7749 !
7750  iend = 0
7751 !
7752  do while (iend==0)
7753  read(luq_cfg,*,iostat=iend) cpar,rpar
7754 !
7755  call z_upper(cpar) ! Convert string to upper case
7756 !
7757  if(iend==0) then ! process the command
7758 !
7759 ! if(trim(cpar)=='DEPTH') q_depth = rpar
7760  if(trim(cpar)=='DSTEP') q_dstep = rpar
7761  if(trim(cpar)=='F_DMAX') qf_dmax = rpar
7762  if(trim(cpar)=='F_KRAT') qf_krat = rpar
7763  if(trim(cpar)=='FF_TAIL') ff_tail = rpar
7764  if(trim(cpar)=='F_FRAC') qf_frac = rpar
7765 ! if(trim(cpar)=='FMIN') fqmin = rpar
7766 ! if(trim(cpar)=='FMAX') fqmax = rpar
7767  if(trim(cpar)=='NLOCUS') nlocus0 = int(rpar)
7768  if(trim(cpar)=='SECTOR') q_sector = rpar
7769 !
7770  if(trim(cpar)=='GEOM') then
7771  iq_geom = int(rpar)
7772  if(iq_geom==1) then
7773  iq_geom=0
7774  if(iq_screen>0) write(iscreen,'(a)') &
7775  'Q_SETCONFIG: geometric scaling disabled'
7776  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
7777  'Q_SETCONFIG: geometric scaling disabled'
7778  end if
7779  end if
7780  if(trim(cpar)=='COMPACT') iq_compact = int(rpar)
7781  if(trim(cpar)=='COUPLING') iq_cple = int(rpar)
7782  if(trim(cpar)=='DISPER') iq_disp = int(rpar)
7783  if(trim(cpar)=='DSCALE') iq_dscale = int(rpar)
7784  if(trim(cpar)=='FILT') iq_filt = int(rpar)
7785  if(trim(cpar)=='GAULEG') iq_gauleg = int(rpar)
7786  if(trim(cpar)=='GRID') iq_grid = int(rpar)
7787  if(trim(cpar)=='INTEG') iq_integ = int(rpar)
7788  if(trim(cpar)=='INTERP') iq_interp = int(rpar)
7789  if(trim(cpar)=='LOCUS') iq_locus = int(rpar)
7790  if(trim(cpar)=='LOGGING') iq_log = int(rpar)
7791  if(trim(cpar)=='LUMPING') iq_lump = int(rpar)
7792  if(trim(cpar)=='MAKE') iq_make = int(rpar)
7793  if(trim(cpar)=='MODIFY') iq_mod = int(rpar)
7794  if(trim(cpar)=='PRINT') iq_prt = int(rpar)
7795  if(trim(cpar)=='SCREEN') iq_screen = int(rpar)
7796  if(trim(cpar)=='SEARCH') iq_search = int(rpar)
7797  if(trim(cpar)=='SYM') iq_sym = int(rpar)
7798  if(trim(cpar)=='T13') iq_t13 = int(rpar)
7799  if(trim(cpar)=='TAIL') iq_tail = int(rpar)
7800  if(trim(cpar)=='TEST') iq_test = int(rpar)
7801  if(trim(cpar)=='TRACE') iq_trace = int(rpar)
7802  if(trim(cpar)=='TRANSF') iq_trf = int(rpar)
7803  if(trim(cpar)=='XDIA') iq_xdia = int(rpar)
7804  end if
7805  end do
7806 !
7807  close(luq_cfg)
7808 !
7809  if(iq_log >= 1) write(luq_log,'(a,i4)') &
7810  'Q_SETCONFIG: '//trim(qbase)//'.cfg disconnected from :', &
7811  luq_cfg
7812 !
7813  else
7814 ! iq_prt = 1
7815  if(iq_log >= 1) then
7816  write(luq_log,*)
7817  write(luq_log,'(a)') 'Q_SETCONFIG: Configuration file '// &
7818  trim(qbase)//'.CFG has not been found'
7819  end if
7820  end if
7821 !
7822  9999 continue
7823 !
7824  call q_stack('-q_setconfig')
7825 !
7826  return
7827  end subroutine
7828 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7829  subroutine q_searchgrid(depth,igrid)
7830 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7831 !
7832 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
7833 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
7834 ! | +---+
7835 ! | | +---+ Last update: 28 April 2004
7836 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.03
7837 ! +---+
7838 !
7839 !
7840 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
7841 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
7842 !
7843 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
7844 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
7845 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
7846 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
7847 !
7848 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
7849 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
7850 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
7851 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
7852 !
7853 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
7854 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
7855 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
7856 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
7857 !
7858 !
7859 ! do not use m_xnldata
7860  implicit none
7861 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7862 ! 0. Update history
7863 !
7864 ! Version Date Modification
7865 !
7866 ! 20/08/2002 Initial version
7867 ! 29/08/2002 Write statements made conditionsl
7868 ! 5/09/2003 Search algorithm improved
7869 ! 09/09/2003 facotr ID_FACMAX introduced and extra test output created
7870 ! Input water depth saved for output
7871 ! 28/04/2004 Bug fixed in location of save input depth to s_depth
7872 !
7873 ! 1. Purpose:
7874 !
7875 ! Search nearest valid grid, read grid file and scale factor
7876 !
7877 ! 2. Method
7878 !
7879 ! Using the actual water depth
7880 ! all possible interaction grids are checked
7881 ! in upward and downward direction
7882 !
7883 ! 3. Parameters used
7884 !
7885  real, intent(in) :: depth ! depth for which grid file must be found
7886  integer, intent(out) :: igrid ! status of grid checking
7887 ! ==0: a proper grid exists
7888 ! ==1: grid file does not exist
7889 ! ==2: grid file exists, but it is incorrect
7890 ! ==3: read error in accessing grid information
7891 !
7892 ! 4. Error messages
7893 !
7894 ! 5. Called by:
7895 !
7896 ! Q_XNL4V4
7897 !
7898 ! 6. Subroutines used
7899 !
7900 ! Q_CTRGRID
7901 ! Q_STACK
7902 !
7903 ! 7. Remarks
7904 !
7905 !
7906 ! 8. Structure
7907 !
7908 !
7909 ! 9. Switches
7910 !
7911 ! 10. Source code
7912 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------
7913 ! Local variables
7914 !
7915  integer id ! counter
7916  integer idepth ! integer depth
7917  integer id_upper ! upper limit of search
7918  integer id_lower ! lower limit of depth search
7919 !
7920  real d_lower ! lower valid depth
7921  real d_upper ! upper valid depth
7922  real r_lower ! ratio with lower valid depth
7923  real r_upper ! ratio with upper valid depth
7924  real s_depth ! target depth in m, saved in this variable
7925  real dfac1,dfac2 ! depth scale factors
7926  real eps ! accuracy
7927 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7928 !
7929  call q_stack('+q_searchgrid')
7930 !
7931  eps = 0.0001
7932 !
7933 ! save depth for which nearest grid file is to be found
7934 !
7935  s_depth = depth
7936 !
7937 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7938 ! check if a depth exists for current grid
7939 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7940 !
7941  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.2)') &
7942  'Q_SEARCHGRID: Input target depth:',depth
7943 !
7944  q_depth = depth + eps
7945 
7946  call q_ctrgrid(1,igrid)
7947 !
7948  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4,f12.2)') &
7949  'Q_SEARCHGRID: First call of Q_CTRGGRID exit code & q_depth:', &
7950  igrid,q_depth
7951 !
7952  if(igrid==0) then
7953  if(iq_prt>=1) then
7954  write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.2)') 'Q_SEARCHGRID: target depth:', &
7955  q_depth
7956  write(iscreen,'(a)') &
7957  'Q_SEARCHGRID: grid accepted, read whole database'
7958  end if
7959  if(iq_screen>=1) write(iscreen,'(a)') &
7960  'Q_SEARCHGRID: grid accepted, read whole database'
7961 !
7962  call q_ctrgrid(2,igrid)
7963  goto 9999
7964  end if
7965 !
7966  idepth = int(s_depth*10+eps)
7967  id_lower = int(q_mindepth*10+eps)
7968  id_upper = int(q_maxdepth*10+eps)
7969 !
7970  id_upper = min(id_facmax*idepth,id_upper)
7971 !
7972 ! set 'not found' condition
7973 !
7974  d_lower = -1.
7975  d_upper = -1.
7976 !
7977  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,3i6)') &
7978  'Q_SEARCHGRID: idepth,id_lower/upper:', &
7979  idepth,id_lower,id_upper
7980 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7981 ! search downwards until a valid grid is found
7982 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7983 !
7984  do id = idepth-1,id_lower,-1
7985  q_depth = real(id)/10.+eps
7986  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,i6,f8.1)') &
7987  'Q_SEARCHGRID: downwards id q_depth:',id,q_depth
7988 
7989  call q_ctrgrid(1,igrid)
7990 
7991  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') &
7992  'Q_SEARCHGRID: igrid:',igrid
7993 
7994  if(igrid==0) then
7995  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2)') &
7996  'Q_SEARCHGRID: valid grid found for depth:',q_depth
7997  d_lower = q_depth
7998  exit
7999  end if
8000  end do
8001 !
8002 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8003 ! seach upwards until a valid grid is found
8004 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8005 !
8006  do id = idepth+1,id_upper
8007  q_depth = real(id)/10.+eps
8008 
8009  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,i6,f8.1)') &
8010  'Q_SEARCHGRID: upwards id q_depth:',id,q_depth
8011 
8012  call q_ctrgrid(1,igrid)
8013 
8014  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') &
8015  'Q_SEARCHGRID: igrid:',igrid
8016 
8017  if(igrid==0) then
8018  if(iq_prt>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2)') &
8019  'Q_SEARCHGRID: valid grid found for depth:',q_depth
8020  d_upper = q_depth
8021  exit
8022  end if
8023  end do
8024  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,*)
8025 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8026 !
8027 ! determine nearest grid
8028 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8029 !
8030  if(d_lower > 0) then
8031  r_lower = s_depth/d_lower
8032  else
8033  r_lower = -1.
8034  end if
8035 !
8036  if(d_upper > 0) then
8037  r_upper = d_upper/s_depth
8038  else
8039  r_upper = -1.
8040  end if
8041 !
8042  if(iq_prt>=1) then
8043  write(luq_prt,'(a,3f8.2)') &
8044  'Q_SEARCHGRID: d_lower d_target d_upper :', &
8045  d_lower,s_depth,d_upper
8046  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f8.2)') &
8047  'Q_SEARCHGRID: r_lower r_upper :', &
8048  r_lower,r_upper
8049  end if
8050 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8051 ! select nearest valid grid
8052 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8053  if(r_lower>0 .and. r_upper>0) then
8054  if(r_lower < r_upper) then
8055  q_depth = d_lower
8056  else
8057  q_depth = d_upper
8058  end if
8059 !
8060  elseif(r_lower > 0 .and. r_upper <0 ) then
8061  q_depth = d_lower
8062  elseif(r_lower < 0 .and. r_upper > 0) then
8063  q_depth = d_upper
8064  else
8065  call q_error('e','SEARCHGRID', &
8066  'No valid nearest grid could be found')
8067  goto 9999
8068  end if
8069 !
8070  if(iq_prt>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a,2f10.2)') &
8071  'Q_SEARCHGRID: target and nearest water depth :',s_depth,q_depth
8072  if(iq_screen>0) write(iscreen,'(a,f10.2)') &
8073  'Q_SEARCHGRID: nearest valid BQF depth:',q_depth
8074 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8075 ! compute depth scaling factors
8076 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8077 !
8078  call q_dscale(a,q_sig,q_a,nkq,naq,s_depth,q_grav,dfac1)
8079  call q_dscale(a,q_sig,q_a,nkq,naq,q_depth,q_grav,dfac2)
8080 !
8081  q_scale = dfac1/dfac2
8082 !
8083  if(iq_prt>=1) then
8084  write(luq_prt,'(a,2f8.4)') &
8085  'Q_SEARCHGRID: target and nearest scale factors:',dfac1,dfac2
8086  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.4)') &
8087  'Q_SEARCHGRID: compound scale factor :',q_scale
8088  end if
8089 !
8090 ! Read BQF for nearest valid water depth
8091 !
8092  call q_ctrgrid(2,igrid)
8093  if(iq_prt>=2) then
8094  write(luq_prt,'(a,f12.2)') &
8095  'Q_SEARCHGRID: Q_CTRGRID called with depth:',q_depth
8096  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') &
8097  'Q_SEARCHGRID: igrid of nearest grid operation:',igrid
8098  end if
8099 !
8100  9999 continue
8101 !
8102 ! restore water depth
8103 !
8104  q_depth = s_depth
8105  write(*,*) 'q_searchgrid q_depth on exit:',q_depth
8106 !
8107  call q_stack('-q_searchgrid')
8108 !
8109  return
8110  end subroutine
8111 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
8112  subroutine q_setversion
8113 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
8114 ! do not use m_xnldata
8115 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
8116 ! This subroutine has automatically been written by MODULE5
8117 ! Author: Gerbrant van Vledder
8118 !
8119  q_version = &
8120  'GurboQuad Version: 5.03 Build: 120 Date: 2004/05/07 [ST]'
8121 !
8122 ! Source code options:ST
8123 !
8124  return
8125  end subroutine
8126 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8127  subroutine q_stack(mod_name)
8128 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8129 !
8130 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
8131 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
8132 ! | +---+
8133 ! | | +---+ Last update: 11 June 2003
8134 ! +---+ | | Release: 5
8135 ! +---+
8136 !
8137 !
8138 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
8139 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
8140 !
8141 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
8142 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
8143 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
8144 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
8145 !
8146 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
8147 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
8148 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
8149 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
8150 !
8151 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
8152 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
8153 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
8154 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
8155 !
8156 !
8157 ! do not use m_xnldata
8158  use m_fileio
8159  implicit none
8160 !
8161 !
8162 ! 0. Update history
8163 !
8164 ! 20/07/1999 Initial version
8165 ! 13/10/1999 Error handling improved
8166 ! 08/08/2002 Upgrade to release 4
8167 ! 11/06/2003 Extra check on output to print or test file
8168 !
8169 ! 1. Purpose:
8170 !
8171 ! Add or remove mod_name name from module stack
8172 !
8173 ! 2. Method
8174 !
8175 ! mod_name must be preceeded by a '+' , '-'
8176 ! The module name is pushed to the stack when preceeded by '+'
8177 ! and removed if mname starts with '-'.
8178 ! In case an error is active,the module name is not removed
8179 ! from the stack if mname starts with a '-'.The module is
8180 ! always removed from the stack if mname starts with '!'.
8181 !
8182 !
8183 ! 3. Parameter list:
8184 !
8185 !Type I/O name description
8186 !-------------------------------------------------------
8187  character(len=*), intent(in) :: mod_name ! module name
8188 !
8189 ! 4. Error messages
8190 !
8191 ! 5. Called by
8192 !
8193 ! All q_** routines
8194 !
8195 ! 6. Subroutines used
8196 !
8197 ! q_error
8198 !
8199 ! 7. Remarks
8200 !
8201 ! 8. Structure
8202 !
8203 ! 9. Switches
8204 !
8205 ! 10. Source code
8206 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8207  character(len=1) mod_task ! task to do
8208  integer mod_len ! length of mod_name
8209 !
8210 !!\A
8211  if(iq_trace > 0) then
8212  if(iq_prt>0) write(luq_prt,'(2a)') 'TRACE -> ',trim(mod_name)
8213  if(iq_test>0) write(luq_tst,'(2a)') 'TRACE -> ',trim(mod_name)
8214  if(iq_screen >= 2) write(iscreen,'(2a)') 'TRACE -> ',trim(mod_name)
8215  end if
8216 !
8217 ! split MOD_NAME in two parts
8218 !
8219 ! MOD_TASK '+','-'
8220 !
8221  mod_len = len_trim(mod_name)
8222  mod_task = mod_name(1:1)
8223  sub_name = mod_name(2:mod_len)
8224 !
8225  if(mod_task(1:1) == '+') then
8226  iq_stack = iq_stack + 1
8227 !
8228  if(iq_stack > mq_stack) then
8229  call q_error('e','STACKMAX',' ')
8230  goto 9999
8231  else
8232  cstack(iq_stack) = mod_name(2:mod_len)
8233  end if
8234 !------------------------------------------------------------------------
8235 ! remove name from stack
8236 !------------------------------------------------------------------------
8237  elseif(mod_task(1:1) == '-') then
8238 !
8239  if(mod_name(2:mod_len) == cstack(iq_stack)) then
8240  iq_stack = iq_stack - 1
8241  else
8242  write(luq_err,'(a)') 'Module name:',mod_name
8243  call q_error('e','STACKNAME',' ')
8244  goto 9999
8245  end if
8246  else
8247  call q_error('e','STACKCALL',' ')
8248  goto 9999
8249  end if
8250 !
8251 !!\Z
8252 !
8253  9999 continue
8254 !
8255  return
8256  end subroutine
8257 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8258  subroutine q_summary
8259 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8260 !
8261 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
8262 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
8263 ! | +---+
8264 ! | | +---+ Last update: 30 December 2003
8265 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
8266 ! +---+
8267 !
8268 !
8269 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
8270 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
8271 !
8272 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
8273 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
8274 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
8275 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
8276 !
8277 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
8278 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
8279 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
8280 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
8281 !
8282 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
8283 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
8284 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
8285 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
8286 !
8287 !
8288 ! do not use m_xnldata
8289  use m_fileio
8290  use serv_xnl4v5
8291 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8292 !
8293  implicit none
8294 
8295 !
8296 ! 0. Update history
8297 !
8298 ! 11/06/2003 Initial version
8299 ! Parameter iq_space removed
8300 ! 16/06/2003 Switch IQ_SYM added
8301 ! 30/12/2003 Parameters IQ_TAIL and FF_TAIl added
8302 !
8303 ! 1. Purpose:
8304 !
8305 ! Write summary of GurboQuad settings to print file
8306 !
8307 ! 2. Method
8308 !
8309 ! Based on the value of IQUAD a number of settings are preset
8310 ! In the case the file [qbase].CFG exists, this file
8311 ! is analyzed and possibly some settings are reset
8312 !
8313 ! 3. Parameter list:
8314 !
8315 !Type, I/O Name Description
8316 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
8317 !
8318 ! 4. Error messages
8319 !
8320 ! 5. Called by:
8321 !
8322 ! XNL_INIT
8323 !
8324 ! 6. Subroutines used
8325 !
8326 ! 7. Remarks
8327 !
8328 ! 8. Structure
8329 !
8330 ! 9. Switches
8331 !
8332 ! /S Enable subroutine tracing
8333 !
8334 ! 10. Source code
8335 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8336 ! Local variables
8337 !
8338 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8339 !
8340  call q_stack('+q_summary')
8341 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8342 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8343 ! write summary of settings for computation of quadruplets
8344 ! to print file
8345 !
8346  if (iq_prt > 0) then
8347  write(luq_prt,*)
8348  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Summary of settings for QUAD computation'
8349  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8350  '------------------------------------------------'
8351  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Number of wave numbers :', &
8352  nkq
8353  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Number of directions :', &
8354  naq
8355  write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.5)') 'Minimum frequency (Hz) :', &
8356  fqmin
8357  write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.5)') 'Maximum frequency (Hz) :', &
8358  fqmax
8359  write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.2)') 'Water depth (m) :', &
8360  q_depth
8361  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Preferred number of locus points:', &
8362  nlocus0
8363 !
8364  write(luq_prt,*)
8365  write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.3)') 'Gravitational acceleration:',q_grav
8366 ! write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.3)') 'Density of water :',q_rhow
8367 ! write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.2)') 'Power spectral tail E(f) :',qf_tail
8368 ! write(luq_prt,'(a,f10.2)') 'Power spectral tail N(k) :',qk_tail
8369 !
8370  write(luq_prt,*)
8371  if(iq_type==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8372  'IQUAD = 1: Deep water'
8373  if(iq_type==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8374  'IQUAD = 2: Deep water & WAM depth scaling'
8375  if(iq_type==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8376  'IQUAD = 3: Direct finite depth calculation'
8377  write(luq_prt,*)
8378 !
8379  write(luq_prt,'(a,f5.2)') 'Step size in m of BQF coding:', &
8380  q_dstep
8381  write(luq_prt,*)
8382 !
8383  if(iq_grid==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Symmetric sector grid'
8384  if(iq_grid==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Non-symmetric sector grid'
8385  if(iq_grid==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8386  'Non-symmetric full circle grid'
8387 !
8388  write(luq_prt,*)
8389  if(iq_compact==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8390  'No compacting of data along locus'
8391  if(iq_compact==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8392  'Compact data along locus by eliminating zero contributions'
8393 !
8394  write(luq_prt,*)
8395  if(iq_dscale==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'No WAM depth scaling'
8396  if(iq_dscale==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8397  'WAM depth scaling of transfer'
8398 !
8399  write(luq_prt,*)
8400  if(iq_screen==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'No output to screen'
8401  if(iq_screen>=1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8402  'Intermediate output to screen'
8403  if(iq_screen>=2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8404  'Intermediate output to screen + subroutine tracing'
8405  write(luq_prt,*)
8406 !
8407  write(luq_prt,*)
8408  if(iq_search==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8409  'No search is carried out for nearest QUAD grid'
8410  if(iq_search==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8411  'A search is carried out for nearest QUAD grid'
8412 !
8413  write(luq_prt,*)
8414  if(iq_gauleg==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Rectangular integration'
8415  if(iq_gauleg>0) write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') &
8416  'Gauss-Legendre integration with N=',iq_gauleg
8417 !
8418  write(luq_prt,*)
8419  if(iq_cple==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8420  'Deep water coupling coefficient of Webb'
8421  if(iq_cple==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8422  'Finite depth coupling coefficient of H&H'
8423  if(iq_cple==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8424  'Finite depth coupling coefficient of Gorman'
8425  if(iq_cple==4) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8426  'Deep water coefficient of Zakharov'
8427  if(iq_cple==5) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8428  'Finite depth coefficient of Zakharov'
8429 !
8430  write(luq_prt,*)
8431  if(iq_disp==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8432  'Deep water dispersion relation'
8433  if(iq_disp==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8434  'Finite depth linear dispersion relation'
8435  if(iq_disp==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8436  'Non linear finite depth dispersion'
8437 !
8438  write(luq_prt,*)
8439  if(iq_filt==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8440  'Filtering of quadruplets off'
8441  if(iq_filt==1) then
8442  write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Filtering of quadruplets on'
8443  write(luq_prt,*)
8444  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2)') &
8445  'Maximum ratio of k1 and k3 :',qf_krat
8446  write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2)') &
8447  'Maximum directional difference :',qf_dmax
8448  write(luq_prt,'(a,e12.3)') &
8449  'Fraction of maximum energy density:',qf_frac
8450  end if
8451 !
8452 ! write(luq_prt,*)
8453 ! if(iq_geom==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Only directional scaling of loci'
8454 ! if(iq_geom==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Geometric scaling of loci using R-T method'
8455 !
8456  write(luq_prt,*)
8457  if(iq_locus==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8458  'Compute locus with polar method with fixed k-step'
8459  if(iq_locus==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8460  'Compute locus with polar method using adaptive k-step'
8461  if(iq_locus==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8462  'Compute locus with polar method using geometric k-step'
8463 !
8464  write(luq_prt,*)
8465  if(iq_sym==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8466  'Handling of symmetries disabled'
8467  if(iq_sym==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8468  'Handling of symmetries enabled'
8469 !
8470  write(luq_prt,*)
8471  if(iq_make==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8472  'Make quadruplet grid when necessary'
8473  if(iq_make==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8474  'Always make quadruplet grid'
8475  if(iq_make==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8476  'Stop after generation of quadruplet grid'
8477 !
8478  write(luq_prt,*)
8479  if(iq_interp==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8480  'Apply bi-linear interpotion to retrieve action density'
8481  if(iq_interp==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8482  'Take nearest bin to retrieve action density'
8483 !
8484  write(luq_prt,*)
8485  if(iq_lump==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8486  'Lumping of coefficients along locus disabled'
8487  if(iq_lump>0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8488  'Lumping of coefficients along locus enabled'
8489 !
8490  write(luq_prt,*)
8491  if(iq_mod==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8492  '?X? Spacing of point along locus as initially computed'
8493  if(iq_mod==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8494  'Equidistant spacing of points along locus'
8495 !
8496  write(luq_prt,*)
8497  if(iq_tail==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8498  'No parametric tail is added'
8499  if(iq_tail==1) write(luq_prt,'(a,f8.2,a)') &
8500  'Parametric tail is added from ', &
8501  ff_tail,' times maximum frequency'
8502 !
8503  write(luq_prt,*)
8504  if(iq_trace==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8505  'Subroutine tracing disabled'
8506  if(iq_trace>0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8507  'Subroutine tracing enabled'
8508 !
8509 !
8510  write(luq_prt,*)
8511  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'IQ_INTEG:',iq_integ
8512  if(iq_integ==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8513  'No test output of integration'
8514  if(iq_integ==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8515  'Summary output of integration per locus'
8516  if(iq_integ==2) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8517  'Extended output of integration along locus'
8518  if(iq_integ==3) write(luq_prt,'(a)') 'Line function along locus'
8519 !
8520  write(luq_prt,*)
8521  if(iq_t13==0) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8522  'No test output of T13 integration'
8523  if(iq_t13==1) write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8524  'Summary output of T13 integration'
8525 !
8526  write(luq_prt,*)
8527 !
8528 ! if(iq_disp==1 .and. iq_start==2) then
8529 ! write(luqprt,'(a)') 'Start point for locus according to Resio&Tracy'
8530 ! else
8531 ! write(luqprt,'(a)') 'Start point for locus equal to k3'
8532 ! end if
8533  write(luq_prt,*)
8534  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Level of printed output :', &
8535  iq_prt
8536  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Level of logging output :', &
8537  iq_log
8538  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Level of test output :', &
8539  iq_test
8540  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Level of trace output :', &
8541  iq_trace
8542  write(luq_prt,'(a,i4)') 'Level of transformation output :', &
8543  iq_trf
8544  write(luq_prt,'(a)') &
8545  '----------------------------------------------'
8546  end if
8547 !
8548  9999 continue
8549 !
8550  call q_stack('-q_summary')
8551 !
8552  return
8553  end subroutine
8554 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8555  subroutine q_symmetry(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,k4x,k4y,symfac,nloc)
8556 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8557 !
8558 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
8559 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
8560 ! | +---+
8561 ! | | +---+ Last update: 16 June 2003
8562 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
8563 ! +---+
8564 !
8565 !
8566 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
8567 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
8568 !
8569 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
8570 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
8571 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
8572 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
8573 !
8574 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
8575 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
8576 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
8577 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
8578 !
8579 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
8580 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
8581 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
8582 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
8583 !
8584 !
8585  implicit none
8586 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8587 ! 0. Update history
8588 !
8589 ! 10/06/2003 Initial version
8590 ! 16/06/2003 Switch iq_sym added
8591 !
8592 ! 1. Purpose:
8593 !
8594 ! Compute symmetry factor to reduce integration
8595 !
8596 ! 2. Method
8597 !
8598 ! Compute distance between k1 and k3, and between k4 and k1
8599 !
8600 ! 3. Parameter list:
8601 !
8602 ! Type i/o Name Description
8603 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8604  integer, intent(in) :: nloc ! number of points in array with wave number
8605  real, intent(in) :: k1x ! x-component of wave number k1
8606  real, intent(in) :: k1y ! y-component of wave number k1
8607  real, intent(in) :: k3x ! x-component of wave number k3
8608  real, intent(in) :: k3y ! y-component of wave number k3
8609  real, intent(in) :: k4x(nloc) ! x-components of wave number k4
8610  real, intent(in) :: k4y(nloc) ! y-components of wave number k4
8611  real, intent(out) :: symfac(nloc) ! symmetry factor
8612 !----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8613 ! 4. Error messages
8614 !
8615 ! 5. Called by:
8616 !
8617 ! Q_MODIFY
8618 !
8619 ! 6. Subroutines used
8620 !
8621 ! Q_STACK
8622 !
8623 ! 7. Remarks
8624 !
8625 ! 8. structure
8626 !
8627 ! 9. Switches
8628 !
8629 ! 10. Source code
8630 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8631  integer iloc ! counter
8632  real dk13 ! distance between k1 and k3
8633  real dk14 ! distance between k1 and k4
8634 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8635 !
8636  call q_stack('+q_symmetry')
8637 !
8638 !
8639 ! evaluate criterion |k3-k1| < |k4-k1|
8640 ! if true then symfac=1
8641 !
8642  symfac = 1.
8643  if(iq_sym==1) then
8644  dk13 = (k1x-k3x)**2 + (k1y-k3y)**2
8645  do iloc=1,nloc
8646  dk14 = (k1x-k4x(iloc))**2 + (k1y-k4y(iloc))**2
8647  if (dk13 >= dk14) symfac(iloc) = 0.
8648  end do
8649  end if
8650 !
8651  call q_stack('-q_symmetry')
8652 !
8653  return
8654  end subroutine
8655 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8656  subroutine q_t13v4(ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3,t13,diagk1,diagk3)
8657 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8658 !
8659 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
8660 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
8661 ! | +---+
8662 ! | | +---+ Last update: 27 April 2004
8663 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.04
8664 ! +---+
8665 !
8666 !
8667 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
8668 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
8669 !
8670 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
8671 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
8672 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
8673 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
8674 !
8675 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
8676 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
8677 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
8678 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
8679 !
8680 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
8681 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
8682 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
8683 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
8684 !
8685 !
8686 ! do not use m_xnldata
8687  use m_constants
8688  implicit none
8689 !
8690 ! 0. Update history
8691 !
8692 ! 25/02/1999 Initial version
8693 ! 14/04/1999 Extra check in GET_LOC if locus exists in internal database
8694 ! 12/10/1999 Error handling improved
8695 ! 15/01/2001 Interface extended with diagonal term
8696 ! 06/05/2002 Criterion f34_mod added to computational procedure
8697 ! 14/08/2002 Integration simplified
8698 ! 22/08/2002 Integration modified depending on actual number of non-zero points
8699 ! 26/09/2002 Boundary check for sector grid activated
8700 ! 15/04/2003 Bug fixed in handling of periodicity
8701 ! Nearest bin integration enabled, including diagonal term
8702 ! 25/04/2003 Output to triplet arrays for nearest bin
8703 ! 03/05/2003 Output of triplets for bi-linear interpolation enabled
8704 ! 04/06/2003 Parameter IQ_INT renamed IQ_INTEG
8705 ! 13/06/2003 Test of integration for case of nearest bin interpolation
8706 ! 25/06/2003 Bug fixed in computation of partial derivatives for contribution to
8707 ! diagonal term
8708 ! 27/08/2003 Short-cut when number of non-zero points on locus is ZERO
8709 ! 05/09/2003 Switches for test output in nearest bin approach modified
8710 ! 24/12/2003 Tail factors from BQF
8711 ! 27/04/2004 Double switches build in for /T & /R & /N
8712 !
8713 ! 1. Purpose:
8714 !
8715 ! Compute the function T13, defined as a line integral around a locus
8716 !
8717 ! 2. Method
8718 !
8719 ! See Tracy and Resio (1982) and Van Vledder (1999)
8720 !
8721 ! 3. Parameter list:
8722 !
8723 ! Type I/O Name Description
8724 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8725  integer, intent(in) :: ik1 ! Index of k-component of wave number k1
8726  integer, intent(in) :: ia1 ! Index of a-component of wave number k1
8727  integer, intent(in) :: ik3 ! Index of k-component of wave number k3
8728  integer, intent(in) :: ia3 ! Index of a-component of wave number k3
8729  real, intent(out) :: t13 ! Value of line integral over a specific locus
8730  real, intent(out) :: diagk1 ! Contribution to diagonal term of k1
8731  real, intent(out) :: diagk3 ! Contribution to diagonal term of k3
8732 !
8733 ! 4. Error messages
8734 !
8735 ! 5. Called by:
8736 !
8737 ! Q_XNL4V4
8738 !
8739 ! 6. Subroutines used
8740 !
8741 ! Q_GETLOCUS
8742 ! Q_PUT_BTRIPLETS
8743 ! Q_PUT_NTRIPLETS
8744 !
8745 ! 7. Remarks
8746 !
8747 ! The action density product term is given by:
8748 ! P = n1.n2.(n3+n4)-(n1+n2).n3.n4
8749 !
8750 ! This term is rewritten as:
8751 !
8752 ! P = n1.n2.n3 + n1.n2.n4 - n1.n3.n4 - n2.n3.n4
8753 ! = n1.n3.(n2-n4) + n2.n4.(n1-n3)
8754 
8755 !
8756 ! 8. Structure
8757 !
8758 ! 9. Switches
8759 !
8760 ! /S enable subroutine tracing
8761 ! /T enable test output
8762 ! /N enable interpolation using nearest point
8763 ! /R enable triplet output
8764 !
8765 ! 10. Source code:
8766 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8767 ! Local variables
8768 !
8769  integer iloc ! counter along locus
8770  integer ifnd ! indicator if correct locus is found
8771  integer ja2,ja2p ! direction indices for interpolation of k2
8772  integer jk2,jk2p ! wave number indices for interpolation of k2
8773  integer ja4,ja4p ! direction indices for interpolation of k4
8774  integer jk4,jk4p ! wave number indices for interpolation of k4
8775  integer ikq,iaq ! counters
8776 !
8777  real sumt13 ! sum along locus
8778  real qn1,qn2,qn3,qn4 ! action densities at wave numbers k1, k2, k3 and k4
8779  real nprod ! wave number product
8780  real t2,t4 ! tail factors for k2 and k4
8781  real qd1,qd3 ! contribution to diagonal term
8782  real rterm ! product term along locus
8783 !
8784  real qn13p ! product of N1 and N3
8785  real qn13d ! difference of N1 and N3
8786 !
8787  integer jq_int ! switch to activate test output
8788  real wk,wa ! weight for interpolation
8789  real vk2,va2 ! wave number and direction for k2
8790  real vk4,va4 ! wave number and direction for k4
8791 !
8792 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8793  call q_stack('+q_t13v4')
8794 !
8795  t13 = 0.
8796  diagk1 = 0.
8797  diagk3 = 0.
8798 !
8799  if(iq_test >=2) write(luq_tst,'(a,4i3)') &
8800  'Q_T13V4: ik1,ia1 ik3 ia3:',ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3
8801 !
8802  if(ik1==ik3 .and. ia1==ia3) goto 9999 ! skip routine if k1=k3
8803 !
8804 ! obtain information requested locus based on a information
8805 ! about a precomputed locus, as stored in the database file
8806 !
8807  call q_getlocus(ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3,ifnd)
8808  if(iq_err/=0) goto 9999
8809 !
8810  if(ifnd==0 .or. nlocusx==0) then
8811  t13 = 0.
8812  goto 9999
8813  end if
8814 !
8815 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8816  qn1 = nspec(ik1,ia1)
8817  qn3 = nspec(ik3,ia3)
8818 !
8819  qn13p = qn1*qn3 ! compute product
8820  qn13d = qn3-qn1 ! compute difference
8821 !
8822  sumt13 = 0
8823 !
8824 ! 3-----------4 ja2p w1 = (1-wk)*(1-wa)
8825 ! | . | w2 = wk*(1-wa)
8826 ! |. . + . . .| wa2 A w3 = (1-wk)*wa
8827 ! | . | | w4 = wk*wa
8828 ! | . | wa
8829 ! | . | |
8830 ! 1-----------2 ja2 V
8831 ! jk2 wk2 jk2p
8832 !
8833 ! <-wk->
8834 !
8835  jq_int = 0 ! temporary parameter
8836 
8837  if((ik1>=mk1a .and. ik1<=mk1b) .and. (ik3>=mk3a .and. ik3<=mk3b) &
8838  .and.iq_integ==2) jq_int=1
8839 
8840  if(jq_int ==1) then
8841  write(luq_int,'(a1,2i3.3,a1,2i3.3,a1)') '(',ik1,ia1,'-',ik3, &
8842  ia3,')'
8843  write(luq_int,'(4f10.4)') q_k(ik1),q_ad(ia1),q_k(ik3),q_ad(ia3)
8844  write(luq_int,'(4f10.4)') q_k(ik1)*cos(q_a(ia1)), &
8845  q_k(ik1)*sin(q_a(ia1)), &
8846  q_k(ik3)*cos(q_a(ia3)), &
8847  q_k(ik3)*sin(q_a(ia3))
8848  write(luq_int,'(2i4)') nlocusx,19
8849  end if
8850 !
8851  if(iq_interp==2) then
8852  do iloc=1,nlocusx
8853  jk2 = t_ik2(iloc)
8854  ja2 = mod(t_ia2(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8855  jk4 = t_ik4(iloc)
8856  ja4 = mod(t_ia4(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8857  qn2 = nspec(jk2,ja2)
8858  qn4 = nspec(jk4,ja4)
8859  nprod = qn13p*(qn4-qn2) + qn2*qn4*qn13d
8860  rterm = t_zz(iloc)
8861  t13 = t13 + nprod*rterm
8862 !
8863 ! add diagonal terms
8864 !
8865  qd1 = qn3*(qn4-qn2) + qn2*qn4*qn3
8866  qd3 = qn1*(qn4-qn2) - qn2*qn4*qn1
8867  diagk1 = diagk1 + qd1*rterm
8868  diagk3 = diagk3 + qd3*rterm
8869 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8870  end do
8871  goto 9999
8872  end if
8873 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8874 ! Main loop over the locus
8875 !
8876  do iloc=1,nlocusx
8877 !
8878  jk2 = t_ik2(iloc)
8879  jk2p = min(jk2+1,nkq)
8880  ja2 = mod(t_ia2(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8881  ja2p = mod(t_ia2(iloc)+naq,naq)+1
8882 !
8883  t2 = t_tail2(iloc)
8884 !
8885 ! if(jk2==nkq .and. jk2p==nkq) then
8886 ! wk = t_w2k2(iloc) + t_w4k2(iloc)
8887 ! vk2 = q_k(t_ik2(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik2(iloc))
8888 ! t2 = (vk2/q_k(nkq))**(-4)
8889 ! end if
8890 !
8891 !! if(iq_geom==1) then
8892 !! jk2 = max(1,jk2)
8893 !! jk4 = max(1,jk4)
8894 !! t2 = max(1.,q_kfac**real(t_ik2(iloc)-nkq))
8895 !! t2 = t2**qk_tail
8896 !! t4 = max(1.,q_kfac**real(t_ik4(iloc)-nkq))
8897 !! t4 = t4**qk_tail
8898 !! end if
8899 !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8900 ! check boundaries of sector grid
8901 !
8902  if(iq_grid < 3) then
8903  ja2 = max(ja2,1)
8904  ja2 = min(ja2,naq)
8905  ja2p = max(ja2p,1)
8906  ja2p = min(ja2p,naq)
8907  end if
8908 !
8909  qn2 = (t_w1k2(iloc)*nspec(jk2,ja2) + &
8910  t_w2k2(iloc)*nspec(jk2p,ja2) + &
8911  t_w3k2(iloc)*nspec(jk2,ja2p) + &
8912  t_w4k2(iloc)*nspec(jk2p,ja2p))*t2
8913 !
8914  jk4 = t_ik4(iloc)
8915  jk4p = min(jk4+1,nkq)
8916  ja4 = mod(t_ia4(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8917  ja4p = mod(t_ia4(iloc)+naq,naq)+1
8918 !
8919  t4 = t_tail4(iloc)
8920 !
8921 ! compute tail factor
8922 !
8923 ! if(jk4==nkq .and. jk4p==nkq) then
8924 ! wk = t_w2k4(iloc) + t_w4k4(iloc)
8925 ! vk4 = q_k(t_ik4(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik4(iloc))
8926 ! t4 = (vk4/q_k(nkq))**(-4)
8927 ! end if
8928 !
8929 ! special treatment for sector grids
8930 ! limit range of indices
8931 ! QQQ: in fact energy density should be set to ZERO
8932 !
8933  if(iq_grid < 3) then
8934  ja4 = max(ja4,1)
8935  ja4 = min(ja4,naq)
8936  ja4p = max(ja4p,1)
8937  ja4p = min(ja4p,naq)
8938  end if
8939 !
8940  qn4 = (t_w1k4(iloc)*nspec(jk4,ja4) + &
8941  t_w2k4(iloc)*nspec(jk4p,ja4) + &
8942  t_w3k4(iloc)*nspec(jk4,ja4p) + &
8943  t_w4k4(iloc)*nspec(jk4p,ja4p))*t4
8944 !
8945 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8946 !
8947  nprod = qn13p*(qn4-qn2) + qn2*qn4*qn13d
8948  rterm = t_zz(iloc)
8949  t13 = t13 + rterm*nprod
8950 !
8951 ! output to triplets
8952 !
8953 !
8954  dt13(iloc) = nprod *rterm
8955 !
8956 ! add diagonal terms
8957 !
8958 !! qd1 = qn3*(qn4-qn2) + qn2*qn4*qn3
8959 !! qd3 = qn1*(qn4-qn2) - qn2*qn4*qn1
8960 !
8961  qd1 = qn3*(qn4-qn2) - qn2*qn4
8962  qd3 = qn1*(qn4-qn2) + qn2*qn4
8963  diagk1 = diagk1 + qd1*rterm
8964  diagk3 = diagk3 + qd3*rterm
8965 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
8966 ! Test output of actual integration
8967 !
8968  if(jq_int == 1) then
8969 !
8970 ! reconstruct wave numbers along locus
8971 !
8972  wk = t_w2k2(iloc) + t_w4k2(iloc)
8973  wa = t_w3k2(iloc) + t_w4k2(iloc)
8974  ja2 = mod(t_ia2(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8975  vk2 = q_k(t_ik2(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik2(iloc))
8976  va2 = q_a(ja2) + wa*q_delta
8977 !
8978  wk = t_w2k4(iloc) + t_w4k4(iloc)
8979  wa = t_w3k4(iloc) + t_w4k4(iloc)
8980  ja4 = mod(t_ia4(iloc)-1+naq,naq)+1
8981  vk4 = q_k(t_ik4(iloc)) + wk*q_sk(t_ik4(iloc))
8982  va4 = q_a(ja4) + wa*q_delta
8983 !
8984  write(luq_int,'(1x,i4,5f8.3,11e12.4,2f11.6)') &
8985  iloc,vk2,va2*rade,vk4,va4*rade, &
8986  t_ws(iloc),qn1,qn2,qn3,qn4,nprod, &
8987  t_cple(iloc),t_jac(iloc),t_sym(iloc),t_zz(iloc), &
8988  dt13(iloc),t13, &
8989  t2,t4
8990  end if
8991  end do
8992 !
8993 !!/T if(iq_test>=4) then
8994 !!/T write(luq_tst,'(a)') 'Q_T13V4: NSPEC'
8995 !!/T do ikq=1,nkq
8996 !!/T write(luq_tst,'(100e12.4)') (nspec(ikq,iaq),iaq=1,naq)
8997 !!T end do
8998 !!T end if
8999  if(iq_integ==3 .and. ik1>=30 .and. ik1<=35 .and. ik3>=30 .and. &
9000  ik3<=35 ) &
9001  write(luq_int,'(a,4i3,i5,e13.5)') 'Q_T13V4:',ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3, &
9002  nlocusx,t13
9003 !
9004 !!/T if(iq_integ==3) write(luq_int,'(4i3,i5,1000e13.5)') ik1,ia1,ik3,ia3,nloc,
9005 !!/T & t_s(nloc),t13
9006 !!,(dt13(iloc),iloc=1,nloc)
9007 !
9008  9999 continue
9009 !
9010  call q_stack('-q_t13v4')
9011 !
9012  return
9013  end subroutine
9014 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9015  subroutine q_weight
9016 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9017 !
9018 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
9019 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
9020 ! | +---+
9021 ! | | +---+ Last update: 20 Aug. 2002
9022 ! +---+ | | Release: 4.0
9023 ! +---+
9024 !
9025 !
9026 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
9027 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
9028 !
9029 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
9030 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
9031 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
9032 ! the License, or (at your option) any later version.
9033 !
9034 ! This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
9035 ! but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
9036 ! MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
9037 ! GNU General Public License for more details.
9038 !
9039 ! A copy of the GNU General Public License is available at
9040 ! http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html#SEC3
9041 ! or by writing to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
9042 ! 59 Temple Place, Suite 330, Boston, MA 02111-1307 USA
9043 !
9044 !
9045 ! do not use m_xnldata
9046  implicit none
9047 !
9048 ! 0. Update history
9049 !
9050 ! 13/04/1999 Initial version
9051 ! 27/10/1999 Weight computed in the case that k2m < k(1)
9052 ! 01/11/1999 Use of Q_XK and Q_SK added to compute weights if k > kmax
9053 ! 26/11/1999 Bug fixed when checking conversion
9054 ! 8/12/1999 Use of SK_MAX introduced to handle very large loci
9055 ! 09/08/2002 Modification of weights
9056 ! 13/08/2002 storage of log-spacing replace by linear spacing
9057 ! 20/08/2002 Bug fixed when geometric scaling is assumed
9058 !
9059 ! 1. Purpose:
9060 !
9061 ! Compute interpolation weights of locus
9062 !
9063 ! 2. Method
9064 !
9065 ! Compute position of wave number in wave number grid
9066 ! Usable for linear interpolation
9067 !
9068 ! 3. Parameter list:
9069 !
9070 ! Name I/O Type Description
9071 !
9072 ! 4. Error messages
9073 !
9074 ! 5. Called by:
9075 !
9076 ! Q_MAKEGRID
9077 !
9078 ! 6. Subroutines used
9079 !
9080 ! 7. Remarks
9081 !
9082 ! The tail factors wt_k2 and wt_k4 are valid for the decay of the action density spectrum
9083 ! N(kx,ky). With p (qk_tail) the power p of the tail of the N(k) spectrum, and q the power
9084 ! of the tail of the N(kx,ky) spectrum, we have q=p-1
9085 !
9086 ! Since N(k) = k N(kx,ky) with k the Jacobian
9087 ! it follows that the tail functions are given by
9088 !
9089 ! k^p = k k^q => k^p = k^(q+1) => p=q+1 => q=p-1
9090 !
9091 ! 8. Structure
9092 !
9093 ! Initialisations
9094 ! do for all points on locus
9095 ! compute directional index for k2 and k4
9096 ! if geometric scaling then
9097 ! compute wave number index directly
9098 ! convert log-scaling to linear scaling
9099 ! else
9100 ! search position of wave number in k-array
9101 ! if k < kmin then
9102 ! k-index = 1 and factor is 0
9103 ! elsif k < kmax then
9104 ! compute k-index for k2 and k4
9105 ! else
9106 ! compute tail factor
9107 ! end if
9108 ! end if
9109 ! end do
9110 !
9111 !
9112 ! 9. Switches
9113 !
9114 ! /T enable test output
9115 !
9116 ! 10. Source code:
9117 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9118 ! Local variables
9119 !
9120  integer iloc ! counter along locus loop
9121  integer jpos ! index for interpolation and tracking of position in wave numebr array
9122  integer itest ! local test level
9123  real k2a,k2m ! angle (radians) and magnitude of wave number k2
9124  real k4a,k4m ! angle (radians) and magnitude of wave number k2
9125  real dk ! difference between two wave numbers
9126  real xtest ! test value for checking computation of weights, by inversion test
9127  real ff,gg ! variables in transformation of log-spacing to linear spacing
9128 !
9129 ! functions used
9130 !
9131 !! real x_kfunc ! function to invert computation of wieghts
9132 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9133  call q_stack('+q_weight')
9134 !
9135 ! initialisations
9136 !
9137  itest = iq_test ! set local test level
9138  itest = itest
9139 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9140  do iloc=1,nlocus
9141  k2m = k2m_mod(iloc)
9142  k2a = k2a_mod(iloc)
9143  k4m = k4m_mod(iloc)
9144  k4a = k4a_mod(iloc)
9145 !
9146  wt_k2(iloc) = 0.
9147  wt_k4(iloc) = 0.
9148 !
9149 ! compute directional weights
9150 !
9151  wa_k2(iloc) = (k2a-q_ang1)/q_deltad+1
9152  wa_k4(iloc) = (k4a-q_ang1)/q_deltad+1
9153 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9154 ! compute position of k2 in wave number grid
9155 ! and compute weight function
9156 !-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
9157  if(iq_disp==1.and. iq_geom==1) then ! deep water is assumed and loci have geometric scaling
9158 !
9159  wk_k2(iloc) = 1.+alog(k2m/kqmin)/alog(q_kfac)
9160  wt_k2(iloc) = 1.
9161  wk_k4(iloc) = 1.+alog(k4m/kqmin)/alog(q_kfac)
9162  wt_k4(iloc) = 1.
9163 !
9164 ! Replace log-spacing by linear spacing
9165 !
9166  ff = wk_k2(iloc)
9167  gg = floor(ff)
9168  wk_k2(iloc) = gg+(q_kfac**(ff-gg)-1.)/(q_kfac-1.)
9169 !
9170 !!/T if(iq_test>=3) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f10.5)') 'Q_WEIGHT: wlog gg wlin2:',
9171 !!/T & ff,gg,wk_k2(iloc),abs(wk_k2(iloc)-ff)/abs(ff)*100.
9172 !
9173  ff = wk_k4(iloc)
9174  gg = floor(ff)
9175  wk_k4(iloc) = gg+(q_kfac**(ff-gg)-1.)/(q_kfac-1.)
9176 !
9177 !!/T if(iq_test>=3) write(luq_tst,'(a,4f10.5)') 'Q_WEIGHT: wlog gg wlin4:',
9178 !!/T ff,gg,wk_k4(iloc),abs(wk_k4(iloc)-ff)/abs(ff)*100.
9179 !
9180 ! for finite depth a search is carried out to compute
9181 ! the position of the interacting wave number in the
9182 ! non-geometric k-grid
9183 !
9184  else
9185  jpos = 1
9186  do while (k2m > q_k(jpos))
9187  jpos = jpos + 1
9188  if(jpos > nkq) exit
9189  end do
9190 !
9191  if(k2m <= q_k(1)) then
9192  wk_k2(iloc) = k2m/q_k(1)
9193  wt_k2(iloc) = 0.
9194  elseif(k2m < q_k(nkq) .and. k2m > q_k(1)) then
9195  dk = q_k(jpos)-q_k(jpos-1)
9196  wk_k2(iloc) = real(jpos-1) + (k2m-q_k(jpos-1))/dk
9197  wt_k2(iloc) = 1.
9198  elseif(k2m >= q_k(nkq)) then
9199  wk_k2(iloc) = min(wk_max,real(nkq)+(k2m-q_k(nkq))/q_sk(nkq))
9200  wt_k2(iloc) = (k2m/q_k(nkq))**(qk_tail-1.)
9201 !
9202 ! minus 1 to account for Jacobian from kx,ky to polar k-grid
9203 !
9204  end if
9205 !
9206 ! compute position of k4 in wave number grid
9207 ! and compute weight function
9208 !
9209  jpos = 1
9210  do while (k4m > q_k(jpos))
9211  jpos = jpos + 1
9212  if(jpos > nkq) exit
9213  end do
9214 !
9215  if(k4m <= q_k(1)) then
9216  wk_k4(iloc) = k4m/q_k(1)
9217  wt_k4(iloc) = 0.
9218  elseif(k4m < q_k(nkq) .and. k4m > q_k(1)) then
9219  dk = q_k(jpos)-q_k(jpos-1)
9220  wk_k4(iloc) = real(jpos-1) + (k4m-q_k(jpos-1))/dk
9221  wt_k4(iloc) = 1.
9222  elseif(k4m >= q_k(nkq)) then
9223  wk_k4(iloc) = min(wk_max,real(nkq)+(k4m-q_k(nkq))/q_sk(nkq))
9224  wt_k4(iloc) = (k4m/q_k(nkq))**(qk_tail-1.)
9225  end if
9226 !
9227  end if
9228 !
9229  if(itest >= 1) write(luq_tst,'(a,i3,10f12.4)') &
9230  'Q_WEIGHT: i k2m k2a wk2 wa2 wt2(+4):', &
9231  iloc,k2m,k2a,wk_k2(iloc),wa_k2(iloc),wt_k2(iloc), &
9232  k4m,k4a,wk_k4(iloc),wa_k4(iloc),wt_k4(iloc)
9233 !
9234  end do
9235 !
9236  9999 continue
9237 !
9238  call q_stack('-q_weight')
9239 !
9240  return
9241  end subroutine
9242 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
9243  subroutine q_loc_w1w3(k1x,k1y,k3x,k3y,npts,k2x,k2y,k4x,k4y,s)
9244 !-----------------------------------------------------------------
9245 !
9246 ! +-------+ ALKYON Hydraulic Consultancy & Research
9247 ! | | Gerbrant van Vledder
9248 ! | +---+
9249 ! | | +---+ Last update: 11 June 2003
9250 ! +---+ | | Release: 5.0
9251 ! +---+
9252 !
9253 !
9254 ! SWAN (Simulating WAves Nearshore); a third generation wave model
9255 ! Copyright (C) 2004-2005 Delft University of Technology
9256 !
9257 ! This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
9258 ! modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as
9259 ! published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of
